GK16visa10cu:18: tathāhi rasādyadhyavasāyapṛthakyatnanivarttyasya yamakāderekarūpānubandhanavato 'nuprasāsyāsamīkṣya viniveśitasya rūpakādeśca rasānupakāritvādalaṅkāratā
GK16visa10cu:26: iti rūpakādeḥ samīkṣya niveśanaṃ ca tenaivoktam---
GK16visa10cu:33: muhuṛ kaṇṭhe laganaḥ taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe / na tu vayam” //
GK16visa10cu:49: vayaṃ priyā hitāḥ na bhavāmaḥ iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:50: atra patrālīmarddanavāyāpāreṇa saubhāgyahārī manyuḥ tava priyo jāta ityanena tvadanurodhakāriṇo vayaṃ tava hitā na bhavāma ityanena ca upālambho gamyate /
GK16visa10cu:56: mama tātapādānāṃ prabhāvatīpariṇaye prabhāvatīvarṇanaṃ yathā--- kalākulagṛhaṃ manaḥ--patagapañjaraṃ kāmināṃ vaśīkaraṇabheṣajaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:58: jagadvijayakarmaṇi smaramahībhujaḥ kārmaṇaṃ dṛśornigaḍabandhanaṃ trijagatāṃ paraṃ bhūṣaṇam //
GK16visa10cu:59: ityādau alaṅkāraṇāṃ nirvāhakarasasambandhākṣiptacetasaḥ kaverapṛthak-yatnanivarttyatvāt na doṣaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:61: yaduktaṃ dhvanikṛtā--- rasākṣiptatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakyakiyo bhavet /
GK16visa10cu:63: tathālaṅkārantaraṇi nirūpyamāṇadurghaṭanānyapi rasasamāhitacetasaḥ pratibhānavataḥ kaverahaṃpūrvikayā parāpatanti /
GK16visa10cu:70: “mitre kvāpi gate saroruhavane baddhānane tāmyati kandatsu bhramareṣu vīkṣya dayitā sannaṃ puraḥ sārasam /
GK16visa10cu:71: cakāhvena viyoginā bisalatā nāsvāditā nojjhitā kaṇṭhe kevalamargaleva nihitā jīvasya nirgacchataḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:72: ityatra coddīpanarūpāyā bisalatāyāḥ prayatnajīvaharaṇāvasānopakārakatvāt jīvananirodhārgalarūpotprekṣāyāṃ vipralambhaśṛṅgāratadābhāsayorananuguṇatvānnālaṅkāraḥ rasasyopakārakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:74: tadeva suṣṭhūktaṃ śabdārthaśobhātiśayadvāreṇa rasāderupakārakā alaṅkārā iti /
GK16visa10cu:76: alaṅkārā asthirā iti naiṣāṃ guṇavadāvaśyarakī sthitiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:79: (vi, kha) naiṣāṃ guṇavaditi---mādhuryyādīnāṃ śṛṅgārādivyāpakatvāt tatra teṣāmavaśyasthiteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:84: yathā guṇā rasasya sthiradharmāstathā naite śabdārthayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:85: evaṃ śabdārthayoranupacaritadharmatvenāsthiratvena śabdārthaśobhādhānadvāreṇa rasopakārakatvena ca guṇavyatiriktatvamalaṅkārāṇāṃ darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:87: śabdārthayoḥ prathamaṃ śabdasya buddhiviṣayatvācchabdālaṅkāreṣu vaktavyeṣu śabdārthālaṅkāsyāpi punaruktavadābhāsasya cirantanaiḥ śabdālaṅkāramadhye lakṣitatvātprathamaṃ tamevāha--
GK16visa10cu:90: (vi, ga) tatrādau punaruktavadābhāsasya śabdārthobhayālaṅkāratve śabdālaṅkāratayā kathanabījaṃ pradarśayaṃstamāha---śabdālaṅkārasyāpīti /
GK16visa10cu:119: tathā vyaktena śaśinaḥ śubhrāṃśunā śītaḥ śītalaḥ gaurvṛṣaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:125: paryyavasāne tu śaśinaḥ śubhrā ujjvalā yeṃ'śavaḥ tadvat śītā gāvaḥ kāntayo yasya iti /
GK16visa10cu:133: paryavasāne tu bhujaṅgarūpaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ vidyate yasyetyādyanyārthatvam /
GK16visa10cu:169: tatra bhavān sadā anatyā paranatirāhityena bhātīti /
GK16visa10cu:174: (lo, ṝ) tṛtīyādau ca dānatyāgābhyāṃ saha varttate iti paunaruktyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:190: tena “ke vāte sevayā deśe gehe ca lebhire yaśa“ityatra nānuprāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:200: (lo, ḷ) anuprāsa iti---svaravaiṣamye 'pi śabdasāmyamityatra śabdā vyañjanānyeva /
GK16visa10cu:202: tenaiṣā bālāyātītyādau svaramātrasya asakṛdāvṛttāvapi vyañjanavaisādṛśye cārutvābhāvasya sahṛdayasaṃvedyatvānnālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:204: kiñca svarasya vaiṣamye 'pi ityanena “kāverī vārī” tyāderetadavāhyatvam /
GK16visa10cu:207: darduradura ityādau prathamaduraśabdadakārasya mūrdhri rephalogānna yamakam /
GK16visa10cu:208: duradhyavasāya sāyamityādau cānusvārayogādanuprasā eva na yamakam /
GK16visa10cu:209: “ākarṇya karṇamadhurāṇī” tyādau ca prathamakarṇaśabdasya svataḥ svarāyoge 'pi dvitīyakarṇaśabdaniṣṭhasvabhāvāt svaravaiṣamyam /
GK16visa10cu:210: naitrānandena candreṇa māhendrī digalaṅkṛtetyādau nakārarapheyuktadakārayordūrāvasthānād anuprāsābhāvabuddhirna kāryyā,
GK16visa10cu:226: rasaḥ sara ityāde kramabhedena sādṛśyaṃ nāsyālaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:232: na caivaṃ varṇairānupūrvyācca sāmye 'nuprāsād yamakābhedaprasaktiriti vācyam;
GK16visa10cu:235: (lo, ai) rasa rasa ityatra rasayoḥ svarūpata eva sāmyaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:248: pāvanaḥ pavana iti vyañjanānāṃ bahūnāṃ sakṛdāvṛttiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:252: (vi, ḍa) varṇadvayasyāpi saṃghapadārthatvenātra vivakṣaṇattyoranekavarṇānāṃ cātra sakṛttvaṃ darśayati---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:255: evaṃ ca vṛttyanuprāsasyāpi vidagdhaprayojyatve 'pi tatra rūḍhyabhāvāt na chekapadaprayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:267: ekasya vyañjanasya sakṛdasakṛd vā sāmyamiti dvāviti caturddhā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:285: svarasādṛśyasattve tu tasyāpi sammato yathā “dhūtacūtaprasūna” ityatra /
GK16visa10cu:289: nīyante pathikaiḥ kathaṃ kathamapi dhyānāvadhānakṣaṇa- prāptaprāṇasamāsamāgamarasollāsairamī vāsarāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:293: “kākalī tu kalau sūkṣme dhvanau tu madhurā sphuṭe” ityamaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:312: samāsametyatra tu anekadhānekasya sakṛttvāccheka evetyatastanna darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:315: tadvatyāṃ vasturacanāyāṃ vastunor'thasya śabdena racanāyāṃ vṛttisaṃjñā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:321: yadyapi llāsairamī vāsarā ityatra ca sarayoranekadhā sāmyahetukena chekānuprāsenasahaikadhāsāmyabhedasya vṛttyanuprāsabhedasya ekavācakānupraveśarūpaḥ saṅkaro vakṣyate;
GK16visa10cu:327: tena nadvatī uktarītyā śṛṅgārādirasaupayikakomalaparuṣamadhyamavarṇārabdhā vāpi racanā vṛttirupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:337: (lo, ā) uccāryyatvāditi--dvayorbahūnāṃ vā vyañjanānāṃ tālavyatvena dantyatvenādiśabdāt kaṇṭhyatvādinā sāmyaṃ śrutyanuprāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:338: imaṃ ca śrutyanuprāsaṃ “niveśayati vāgdevī kasyacit pratibhāvataḥ ';
GK16visa10cu:346: (vi, da) dṛśā dagdhamiti---virūpākṣasya jayinīstā vāmalocanā ahaṃ stuve /
GK16visa10cu:348: hareṇa manasijasya dṛśā dāhastābhistu kaṭākṣarūpayā dṛśā jīvanamato 'pi jayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:362: anusvāreṇa visargeṇa vā viśiṣṭo 'viśiṣṭo vā yaḥ svaraḥ kevalo vā pūrvapādasya pūrvapadasya
GK16visa10cu:363: vā ante uccaritastādṛśasvaraviśiṣṭāvasthaṃ vyañjanaṃ cedādyena svareṇa svapūrvabhūtasvareṇa
GK16visa10cu:366: yathā ekapādānte dhīraḥ anyapādānte vīraḥ iti,
GK16visa10cu:371: eṣa ca prāyeṇa pādasya padasya cānte prayojyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:379: prāyeṇa ityanena pajjhaṭikādicchandaḥ svevāsya sambhavo nānuṣṭhubādāviti darśatam /
GK16visa10cu:386: kāśapuṣpastabakavad dhavalaḥ keśaḥ prakaṭitasya vakrasya kubjasya karabhasya kariśāvakasyaiva vilāso yasya kāyastādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:387: tathāpi ceto 'nalpaṃ bahu kāmamabhilāṣaṃ na tyajatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:394: keśa ityatra yathāsambhavamiti vacanāt saṃyuktākṣararahito vikāśa ityatra śakāraḥ svaravisargayuktaḥ kakārasthitenā'kāreṇa saha /
GK16visa10cu:399: prāyeṇa iti vacanāt mama tātapadānāṃ lakṣbhīstave yathā---
GK16visa10cu:401: natiprītā pītāmbarasupariṇītāmaravadhū- dṛśā pītā sphītā malaruciparītā vijayatām” //
GK16visa10cu:403: asya ca prācīnoktālaṅkārebhyaḥ pṛthaganubhavasiddhaścamatkāraviśeṣa iti pṛthagalaṅkāratvam /
GK16visa10cu:427: (vi, ba) smerarājīveti---nāyaṃkaṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhānnimīlitākṣīṃ māninīṃ pratisakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:428: rūpeṇa kandarpanirjetāpi tvadanurāgāt tvadvaśagastathā cātra mānānaucityamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:429: atra ādye nayanakandarpapade uddeśyatātparyyake 'ntye tatpade tu vidheyatātparyyake ityato bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:430: padārthau tu abhinnau mātrapadāt prakṛtyarthasya eva bhedavyāvṛttirna tu pratyayārthasya /
GK16visa10cu:432: atra vibhaktyarthasya paunaruktye 'pi mukhyatarasya prātipadikāṃśadyotyadharmirūpasya bhinnārthatvāllāṭānuprāsatvameva /
GK16visa10cu:439: tadvodhyasya dharmirūpasya nayanakandarpātmakasya arthasya prakṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvena asvatantrapratyayāpekṣayā svātantryād mukhyatarasyābhinnatvād ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:445: (vi, ma) yatra tu prakṛtyarthasyāpi bhedastatra na lāṭānuprāsatvamityāha---nayane iti /
GK16visa10cu:446: atra dvitīyanayanaśabdasya bhāgyavattādītyarthe tātparyāt tātparyyasyaiva prātipadikārthasyāpi bheda iti darśayati---atra hīti /
GK16visa10cu:447: tathā ca arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyalakṣaṇāviṣaya evāyaṃ na lāṭānuprāsa ityuktam /
GK16visa10cu:455: evaṃ supratipattaye 'sandigdhamudāharaṇaṃ darśayitvā sandigdhaṃ darśayati-nayane iti /
GK16visa10cu:458: na tu pratīyamāno viśeṣaḥ tasya gūḍhatvādiguṇībhāvahetutvābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:465: (vi, ya) asya ekapade iva anekapadeṣvapi sambhavaṃ darśayati---yathā vā /
GK16visa10cu:466: yasya teti---atra prathamārdhe davadahane tuhinadīdhititvaṃ vidheyamatāpakaratvāt /
GK16visa10cu:468: (lo, ū) eṣa ca bahupadaniṣṭho 'pi sambhavatīti tatrodāharaṇānyāha---yathā veti /
GK16visa10cu:469: yasya na savidhe dayitetyādau prathamārdhe tuhinadīdhitirdavadahanaḥ dvitīyārdhe davadahanaḥ tuhinadīdhitiriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:490: arthe sati pṛthagarthāyāḥ padasaṃhateḥ tenaiva krameṇa āvṛttirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:492: tathā ca śamarate 'maratejasītyatra yamakitabāgayoḥ dvayoḥ “samarasamaraso 'ya” mityatra ekatarasya nirarthakatve pṛthagarthāyā ityuktyanaucityamaḥ ator'the satyuktamityāha /
GK16visa10cu:501: dvayorekatarasya vā arthāsattve tu svaravyañjanasaṃhateḥ tenaiva krameṇa āvṛttirityevameva lakṣaṇāntaramityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:508: dvayorekasya vānarthakatve padatvābhāvāditi kvacid viṣaye sārthakatve svātantryeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:513: “tenaiva krameṇa” iti damo moda ityāderviviktaviṣayatvaṃ sūcitam /
GK16visa10cu:518: pādādītyādipadāt pādasyaiva tṛtīyacaturthabhāgasya aniyatatadbhāgasya ca parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:527: kīdṛśaṃ navaṃ palāśaṃ patraṃ yasya tādṛśaṃ palāśavanaṃ kiṃśukakānanaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:528: sphuṭaiḥ parāgaiḥ paragataṃ vyāptaṃ paṅkajaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:529: mṛduto mṛdutaraḥ eva klāntor'thāt raviraśmanā latayā antaḥ agrabhāgo yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:530: yadvā mṛdulaḥ mṛduḥ tāntaḥ arthāt yuvabhirākaṅkṣito latāyā anto agrabhāgo yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa10cu:546: “palāśapalāśa” iti “surabhiṃ surabhiṃ” ityatra ca dvayoḥ sārthakatvam /
GK16visa10cu:552: (vi, sa) atra sārthakayoḥ palāśaṃ surabhimityanayoḥ padayoḥ dvayauḥ āvṛttiḥ ityāha---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:556: atra pādāvṛttiryathā mama tātapādānāṃ kuvalayāśvacarite munyāśramavarṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:561: “ekaṃ kūpe nayanamaparaṃ manmukhe khelayantī māmuddiśya pratikṛtimapi svāṃ kimapyālapantī /
GK16visa10cu:578: anyaḥ śleṣeṇa kākvā vā sā vakroktistato dvidhā // VisSd_10.9 //
GK16visa10cu:582: (vi, ka) vakroktyalaṅkāramāha---anyasya vakturanyārthakaṃ vākyam anyaḥ śrotā tadvākyaśleṣeṇa
GK16visa10cu:583: svavākyakākkā vānyābhiprāyakatayā yadi yojayed yojanaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyāyayet tadā sā
GK16visa10cu:591: svaraviśeṣeṇa vā yadi yathārthato 'nyārthatvena prayojyate sā vakroktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:595: “ke yūyaṃ sthala eva samprati vayaṃ praśno viśeṣāśrayaḥ kiṃ brūte vihagaḥ sa vā phaṇipatiryatrāsti supto hariḥ /
GK16visa10cu:596: vāmā yūyamaho viḍambarasikaḥ kadṛk smaro vartate yenāsmāsu vivekaśūnyamanasaḥ puṃsveva yoṣidrabhramaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:600: avijñātanāmajātikaṃ kañcit prati ayaṃ vaktuḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:601: pṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaśca vidrāvakaḥ sa tadvākyaṃ tadvākyaśleṣeṇa ke jale yūyam ityabhiprāyakaṃ sthale evetyādi svottareṇa pratyāyayati /
GK16visa10cu:605: śeṣo 'nantanāgastadāśrayastaddvayoḥ praśra ityarthakatāṃ svottareṇa pratyāyayati---kiṃ vrūte iti /
GK16visa10cu:608: praṣṭā tat śrutvā krodhādāha---vāmā viparītabāddhṛtvena pratīkūlā yūyamiti /
GK16visa10cu:609: śrotā tu yūyaṃ vāmāḥ striyaḥ ityabhiprāyakatāṃ pratyāyayan taṃ nindati---aho viḍambeti /
GK16visa10cu:622: atra viśeṣapadasya “viḥ pakṣī” “śeṣo nāgaḥ” ityarthadvayayogyatvāt sabhaṅgaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:626: atra kayācitsakhyā niṣedhārthe niyukto nañ anyathā kākvā dūyata eveti vidhyarthe ghaṭitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:630: krodhānnāyikayā parityaktasya kṛtāmaso nāyakasya āśvāsajanakasakhīṃ prati sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:634: yadyapi tatprayuktaṃ vākyaṃ na śrutamasti yadantargataḥ nañ niṣedhārthaka. syāt /
GK16visa10cu:635: ato 'sya kāle ityādivākyasya kākkā yojanayā tadarthakavākyasyāsambhava eva,
GK16visa10cu:636: tathāpi prakaraṇādasya vākyasya nāyakaśvāsajanakavākyatvapratītau kākunañā eva tadupapattestadākṣiptavākyasthanañ eva svavākyasthanaño vidhyarthakatāghaṭanaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:646: tatra hi śocanābhiprāyakasya pūrvavākyasya kāmākulābhiprayakatvena dvitīyavaktryā yojanam /
GK16visa10cu:649: vākyaṃ yatra bhavetso 'yaṃ bhāṣāsama itīṣyate // VisSd_10.10 //
GK16visa10cu:661: bhāṣāsu samānyekarūpāṇi padāni vidyante yatreti vyutpattiyogādanvarthanām pṛthagalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:662: eṣa ca śleṣālaṅkāraviśeṣa iti yaduktaṃ caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitaistadasaṅgatam,
GK16visa10cu:672: he āli / mañjulamaṇimañjīre mañjulaṃ maṇiyuktaṃ mañjīraṃ yasyāḥ he tādṛśi /
GK16visa10cu:673: athavā mañjīre kalaśabdo gambhīro yatra tādṛśi /
GK16visa10cu:681: ityādau tu “sarasam” ityatra saṃskṛtaprākṛtayoḥ sāmye 'pi vākyagatatvābhāve vaicitryābhāvānnāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:684: (vi, ca) sarvabhāṣāsu ekavidhaiḥ padaiḥ vākyaghaṭitatve evāyamalaṅkāraḥ tādṛśaikapadena tu vākyaghaṭane tādṛśasthale nāyamalaṅkāra ityāha---sarasaṃ kaiṇa iti /
GK16visa10cu:695: aneketyanena dvayorvā bahūnāṃ vārthānāmabhidhāne prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādabhidhayā bodhane /
GK16visa10cu:703: “kāvyamārge svaro na gaṇyate” iti ca nayāt vācyabhedena bhinnairapi yugapaduccāraṇenāpagatabhedaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:704: tridhā khalu śabdābhivyaktiḥ rūpator'thataḥ svarataśceti darśanāt /
GK16visa10cu:705: evaṃ ca bhinnayorapi samānaśrutyoḥ śabdayostattannyāyena uccaritayoḥ kameṇa svasyārthabodhanaṃ yatra tatra śabdasvarūpaśleṣeṇa śabdaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:706: śabdaparivṛttisahatve tvarthaśleṣa iti niyamamaṅgīkurvatāṃ kāvyaprakāśakārādīnāṃ matamanusṛtya vyākhyānam /
GK16visa10cu:707: anye tvāhuḥ--na khalu ghaṭapaṭayoriva “vasudhāmahita purājita nirāgamanābhāvāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:714: kiṃ ca yadyubhayārthapratipādanasamīhayā vakturekadā śabdadvayodāharaṇasambhavastadā ghaṭasahastracikīrṣuḥ kulālo 'pi ekadā tat nirvāhayet /
GK16visa10cu:716: tenaikatraiva śabde nānāviṣayāṇāmarthānāṃ svaṃsvasāmagrīvaśena kameṇojjīvanamiti vādināṃ matamevāśrayitumucitam /
GK16visa10cu:717: kintvatra mate tatprathamaviruddhāyā dvitīyābhidhāyāḥ punarujjīvanamanupapannamiti dvitīyābhidhānāmnā“janasthāne bhrānta” mityādāvivātrāpi vyañjanaiva vṛttirupadiśyate /
GK16visa10cu:718: evaṃ ca dhvanitantre prakaraṇaniyamasthale tasmādeva śabdāduccāraṇādisāmagrīsahakṛtā tadvyāpārantareṇa sabhaṅgābhaṅgaśabdāntaralabhyārthapratītiḥ
GK16visa10cu:719: yatra tu yena dhvastetyādau prakaraṇādiniyamo nāsti tatra dvayorabhidhānasaṃśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:720: yatra ca śabdaparivartane 'pi dvyarthahānistatra śabdaśaktermūlatvena śabdaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:721: yatra ca śabdaparivarttane 'pi na tadarthakṣatistatrārthamātraṃ pratyevaṃśabdopayogādarthaśleṣatā /
GK16visa10cu:722: etanmatānusāreṇa tu śliṣṭāvarthau vidyete eṣviti matvarthoyapratyayāntatvena śliṣṭaiḥ padairityādi sautraṃ śliṣṭapadaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GK16visa10cu:725: asya sūtrasya śabdālaṅkāraprakaraṇe paṭhitatvādeva siddhaṃ padānāṃ parivṛttayasahatvam /
GK16visa10cu:726: ye tvāhuḥ “prati prasūte śabdaḥ śabdāntara“miti tadayuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:730: evaṃ ca varṇādigatatvena śleṣasya prācīnānurodhena vyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:731: tathoccāraṇāṅgīkāre hi śabdayoḥ “durgālaṅghita” ityādau janasthāna ityādāvapi vyañjanānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:732: “hṛdijñeṣu ca vakṣyati” ityādau “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām“ityādau ca yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohastasyopameyatā,
GK16visa10cu:746: (lo, i) iha ca varṇādigatatvena aṣṭavidhatvaṃ śleṣasyāsamīcīnamiti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitarāghavānandaprabhṛtīnāṃ matam /
GK16visa10cu:755: “yena dhvastamanobhavena” ityādau “syānnanditā virūpākṣapādapadmaniṣevaṇāt” ityādau ca prakaraṇājñāne kimahaṃ nanditānandakaḥ syāmiti kasyacid bhaktasya vacanam ?
GK16visa10cu:756: uta kasyacid bhaktasya nanditānandināmagaṇaviśeṣatvaṃ syāditi vacanamiti sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:761: ityatra puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgayoḥ śatakoṭidatāmityatra dadāti-dyatyoḥ dhātvoḥ prakṛtyoścaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:763: “sarvasvaṃ hara sarvasva” ityatrāpi vakṣyamāṇodāharaṇer'thadvayasyāpi sandehāspadatvād vibhaktiśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:764: “dadhate 'sya parāṃ śobhāmaho madhuratābhṛtaḥ” ityādau ca kiṃ madhuratāṃ bibhratīti madhuratābhṛto bahavo janāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:765: uta madhuratayā bhṛtaḥ kaścid varttata iti bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:767: dadhata ityatrāpi ca pakṣe dhādhātorbahuvacanaṃ pakṣe ca dadhadhātorekavacanaṃ śliṣṭaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:768: tadevamabhidhādūyasaṃvedyapratyayoktitaḥ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṣṭavidhaśleṣasya sambhavamavicāryya prācīnādhikṣepakāribhirupajīvyaiḥ sahālaṃ bahunā vivādena /
GK16visa10cu:769: nanvevaṃ “yena dhvasta” ityādāvapi yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohaḥ sa vācyo 'stu aparastu vyaṅgyo 'stu kiṃ tatrāpi śleṣālaṅkārakalpanairiti cennaivam /
GK16visa10cu:773: yattu caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitairuktaṃ “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām” ityādau ubhayābhidhānaṃ cetīti “sandhyāvandanavelāyāṃ mukto 'hamiti manyate
GK16visa10cu:779: “abalā acalā vā syuḥ“ityādau “āśīḥ paramparāṃvandyām” ityādau ca doṣasthale sandehavaśena vivakṣitaikārthānirddhāraṇādativyagratayā'svādaṃ prati prātikūlyam /
GK16visa10cu:781: ataeva pūrvatra mahākaveḥ skhalanamanyatra vahvarthapadanirvāhe prayuktasādhanaṃ sārvalaukikameva /
GK16visa10cu:786: evaṃ “vaurivaṃśadavānala” ityādau vaṃśaśabdāt vyañjanayā baudhitasya veṇurūpārthasyaikānvayarūpeṇārthena “gaurvāhīka';
GK16visa10cu:790: sa ca gavārtho mukhya iti tatra gauṇī lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa10cu:791: iha ca veṇurūpārtho vyaṅgya iti kathaṃ mukhyārthabādhajīvitā lakṣaṇeti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:793: yathā khalu “jātirekapadārtha” iti vādināṃ mate prācīnairasmābhiśca ihaiva dvitīyaparicchede
GK16visa10cu:794: saṅketitārthanirūpaṇe pradarśitena nayena jātimātrabodhanād abhidhāyāṃ viratāyāṃ
GK16visa10cu:795: vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagantavyayā vyakte rūpyamāṇānvayabodhe lakṣaṇā tathehāpi vyaṅgyatvenāha---tsaya
GK16visa10cu:818: vidhau vidhātari pratikūlatāmupagate bahusādhanatā bahūpāyatvaṃ viphalatvameti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:820: patiṣyataḥ dinabharttuḥ avalambanāya rakṣaṇāya karasahastraṃ raśmisahastrameva karasahastraṃ hastahasastraṃ nābhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:821: vidhau candre tasyaiva tatpratikūlatvānna tu vidhātuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:838: ubhayatraiva sarva iti kira iti ca /
GK16visa10cu:839: atra ca sarva ityatra pratyayaśleṣaṃ vinā vacanaśleṣa eva /
GK16visa10cu:841: ityatra tu vacanaśleṣaṃ vinā pratyayaśleṣa evetyataḥ pṛthak śleṣadvayam /
GK16visa10cu:843: artha ityanvaye tu ktapratyaye ubhayatra ekavacanam /
GK16visa10cu:845: (lo, u) sarva eva ityatra sarvaśabdo bahuvacanāntaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:847: tena sudhākiraḥ ityasya bahuvacanāntasya viśeṣaṇatve vikṣepārthāt kṛdhātoḥ kkipapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:857: tanvyā vikasantī netranīlābje stanadvayī ca tava modaṃ sadā dattām /
GK16visa10cu:871: lasat taralahāriṇīti padaṃ netranīlābjaviśeṣaṇatve dvivacanāntaṃ stanadvayyāstvekavacanāntaṃ strīliṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:874: “ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:888: sāmardhyakṛt cāmitrasambandhitve chedanārthaḥ kṛntati iti dhātoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:890: vibhaktyabhede 'pi prakṛtimātrasya bhedāt prakṛtiśleṣa eva ityata āha--prakṛtyoriti /
GK16visa10cu:900: atra prakṛtiśleṣatvaṃ nirasyati atra padabhaṅge iti /
GK16visa10cu:902: yadyapi nyūnādhiketyādilakṣaṇavaśādeva prakṛtiśleṣato bhedasiddhistathāpi prakārāntareṇāpi tatsiddhirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:910: iha tu vibhakteḥ pṛthvādiśabdeṣu pṛthukādiśabdeṣu ca bhinnatayā padadoṣa eva /
GK16visa10cu:923: tathā ca vanevṛddhānāṃ vṛddhamṛgaṇāṃ kamalānāṃ ca sadṛśe tasyā locane /
GK16visa10cu:925: bhūriśilīmukheranekabāṇaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ lubdhakairvyādhaiḥ karttṛbharākulībhāvaṃ nītā vanavṛddhāḥ mṛgāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:926: lubdhairmadhulubdhairbhūriśilīmukhairanekamadhukarairākulībhāvaṃ nītāni vane jale vṛddhāni kamalāni ca /
GK16visa10cu:946: śivabhaktastaṃ prati dasyośca putrādikaṃ prati coktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:949: nayasya nīteḥ upakārantarasya sāmmukhyaṃ sambhavo yasmāt tādṛśaṃ tanuvarttanaṃ śarīrasthitam āyāsi agacchasi prāproṣīti yāvat /
GK16visa10cu:960: āyāsi āyāsayuktaṃ tanordehasya varttanaṃ vṛttimupakārasāmmukhyaṃ naya prāpaya /
GK16visa10cu:964: upakārāt sāmmukhyaṃ naya upakāraṃ mā kurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:965: varttanaṃ vṛttim āyāsi āyāsayuktaṃ tanu vistāraya /
GK16visa10cu:970: asya ca bhedasya pratyayaśleṣeṇāpi gatārthatve pratyayāntarāsādhyasubantatiṅantagatatvena vicchittiviśeṣāśrayaṇātpṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:973: (vi, ta) atra āyāsi iti vinā sarvatra luptasuptiṅantatve 'pi āyāsi ityatra luptāluptadvayāntatve 'pi ca padayoraikarūpyaṃ darśayati---atra ceti
GK16visa10cu:976: svatulyatvena pratyayāntaram asādhyam abodhyaṃ yayoḥ tādṛśau yau suptiṅau tadantargatatvenāsya śleṣasya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:982: hara bahusaraṇaṃ taṃ cittamāhemavasara ume sahasā” //
GK16visa10cu:988: āgamasya vedasya āharaṇe vaśīkaraṇe me mama taṃ prasiddhaṃ samāsaṅgam ava rakṣa /
GK16visa10cu:990: samāsaṅgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ surasandhaṃ surāṇāṃ sandhaṃ sambandhikārakaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:992: tathā taṃ prasiddhaṃ cittamoham avasare 'parthānmaraṇarūpe sahasā hara nāśayaḥ kīdṛśaṃ cittamohaṃ bahusaraṇaṃ nānāvidhakāryyaviṣayam /
GK16visa10cu:994: prākṛtapakṣe--- mama dehi rasaṃ dharmeṃ tamovaśāmāśāṃ gamāgamād hara naḥ /
GK16visa10cu:995: haravadhu śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā //
GK16visa10cu:1007: me mama āgamāharaṇe āgamānāmākalane taṃ samāsaṅgam āsaktim ava sthirīkurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1009: āgamādhyāsasya svargahetutvād bahu bahulaṃ saraṇaṃ prasāro yasya evaṃbhūtaṃ cittamohaṃ manoniṣṭham ajñānam,
GK16visa10cu:1015: “mahyaṃ dehi rasaṃ dharme tamovaśāmāśaṃ gamāgamādvara naḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1016: haravadhu / śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā” //
GK16visa10cu:1017: gamāgamo vidyate yatra tasmāt mamāgamāt saṃsārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1024: apratimānaṃ kṣamate sa gaṇikānāṃ na rañjayitum //
GK16visa10cu:1037: (lo, au) evaṃ varṇādigatatvenāṣṭavidhaṃ śleṣamuktvā punaḥ prakārāntareṇa trividhamāhṛ---punariti /
GK16visa10cu:1054: “yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:1055: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarā /
GK16visa10cu:1063: tvāṃ sarvadā sa umādhavaḥ sarvado mādhavaśca pāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1065: abhavena anutpattinā yena anaḥ śakaṭaṃ dhvastaṃ nityaśarīrasya tasyaṃ rūpāntareṇāvirbhāvamātraṃ,
GK16visa10cu:1071: yaśca udvṛttasya durvṛttasya bhujaṅgasya aghāsurasya hantā /
GK16visa10cu:1072: ravasya nānātmakabrahmaṇo layo līnatā yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1074: kūrmavarāhamūrttyā ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:1075: śaśimathaḥ rāhoḥ śirohara iti stutyaṃ nāma yasyāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1078: umādhavapakṣe---dhvastamanobhavena dhvasto dalito manobhavo kāmo yasmāt /
GK16visa10cu:1079: yena balijito viṣṇoḥ kāyaḥ purasya tripurāsurasya nāśakāstrīkṛtaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1081: yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgarūpo hāraḥ valayaśca kaṅkaṇaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1084: hara iti stutyaṃ nāma cāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1092: udvṛttā ativarttulākārā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya /
GK16visa10cu:1099: ātmana eva kāyaḥ purā pūrvam amṛtāharaṇakāle 'suramohanārthaṃ strīrūpaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1100: udvṛttaḥ uddhato bhujaṅgaḥ kāliyaḥ taṃ hantīti /
GK16visa10cu:1102: agaṃ parvataṃ govarddhanākhyaṃ gāṃ pṛthvīṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:1103: śasinaṃ mathnāti iti śaśimadrāhuḥ tasya śiroharaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1104: andhakānām andhakavaṃśīyānāṃ kṣayo nivāso dvārakāpurasambhandhī tatkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1124: yathā-- “sārasavattā vihatā na bakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1126: iti atra hi rājapakṣe sā, iti, kam iti /
GK16visa10cu:1127: saraḥ pakṣe netītyatra tu sā nāsti /
GK16visa10cu:1129: yathā kāṣṭhayorbhinnayorapyupāyavaśena jaḍīkṛtayorekatā tathābhinnayoḥ padayoḥ śabdayorekatra varṇavyūhe sanniveśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1136: yathā ekasminneva vṛnte phaladvayaṃ tathā ekasminneva śabder'thadvayasaṃsargaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1138: yo hi yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:1145: kevalaṃ vibhinnatvena pratīyamānayorapi atyantasannidhānarūpa eva jatukāṣṭhayoriva śleṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1149: tāvataiva kathamarthālaṅkāratvam ityatrāha---yo hi yadāśraya iti /
GK16visa10cu:1154: yathā loke bhujāśrito bhujasthālaṅkāraḥ kaṇṭhaśritaḥ kaṇṭhasya tathāsau śabdāśrita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1161: tathāhi--atra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthagatatvena vyavasthiteranvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvena niyam iti /
GK16visa10cu:1168: arthaśaktimūlatve tu arthagatatvena doṣādīnāṃ tu śabdārthanvayādyavidhānaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:1169: tathā ca nānārthābhaṅgaśabdasyāpi śleṣeṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāta tatrāpi śabdaśleṣatvameva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1174: atra alaṅkāraprastāve yeṣāṃ dvandvārthānāṃ śabdānāṃ paryyāntareṇa pratipādane 'pi na kṣatista evārthagatāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1175: yeṣāṃna tu tathā te śabdagatā eveti niyamanāt prācīnairalaṅkārakārairiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1181: (vi, pha) mataviśeṣe tu yatra nānārthasthale 'pi śabdabhedastathā ca tatrāpi śliṣṭānekaśabdakṛtaḥ śabdālaṅkārastanmate nirbādha eveti tanmataṃ darśayati---na cāndhaka iti /
GK16visa10cu:1186: na ca tatkathaṃ nānārthakaśabdāḥ śrūyante iti vācyam--ekaprayatnoccāryyatvadoṣeṇa bhedāgrahāt /
GK16visa10cu:1194: visadṛśaśabdadvayasya bandhe cevaṃvidhasya vaicitryābhāvād vaicitryasyaiva cālaṅkāratvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1198: (vi, ba) nanu sabhaṅgaśleṣasthaler'thabhedāt tvadabhimatasvarabhedadṛṣṭāntena abhaṅgānekaśabdānāmarthabhedāt svarabheda eva syāt /
GK16visa10cu:1199: tathā ca svarabhedavailakṣaṇyagrahe kathaṃ bhedagrahaḥ syādator'thabhedasya śabdabhedavyāptiraprayojikaiva ityata ekaprayatnena nānāśabdoccāraṇamityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1201: nanu andhakādyakhaṇḍaśabdasya mukhyatve kiṃ pramāṇamityata āhavisadṛśaśabdadvayasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:1202: nahi hariṇaśabdasthale tadarthakendrādiśabdaprayoge hari naumītyatreva viṣṇivandrau naumītyatrāpi śleṣarūpavaicitryānanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1209: (lo, ṛ) ye 'pyāhuryo yadāśretaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra iti tanmate 'pyatra vaucitryasya śabdaniṣṭhatvācchabdālaṅkāratvamityāha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1220: rasādirūpasyārthasya tadabhivayañjakasya vibhāvādirūpasyārthasya vānusandhānamastyeveti tepi kathaṃ śabdālaṅkāramadhye yuṣmābhirapi gaṇyanta iti /
GK16visa10cu:1222: śabdasyābhinnaprayatnoccāryatvenārthālaṅkāratve “pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau” ityādau śabdabhede 'pyarthālaṅkāratvaṃ tathāpi prasajyata ityubhayatrāpi śabdālaṅkāratvameva /
GK16visa10cu:1225: (vi, bha) abhinnaprayatnoccāryyatvenārthālaṅkāratvasya taduktasya śabdālaṅkāratayā nirvivāde varṇaśleṣavarṇānuprāse 'pi atiprasāktimāha---pratikūlaṃtamiti
GK16visa10cu:1233: yatra tu śabdaparivarttane 'pi na śleṣatvakhaṇḍanā, tatra--
GK16visa10cu:1241: aho tulāyā mānatulāyāḥ koṭeragrabhāgasya khalasya ca susadṛśī vṛttiryataḥ stokenetyādi /
GK16visa10cu:1246: (lo, ḷ) tat kva nu punararthaśleṣa ityāha---yatra hīti /
GK16visa10cu:1254: (vi, ya) idānīṃ śleṣasya alaṅkārāntarāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayābhāvād alaṅkārāntarasya ca śleṣāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayasattvāt
GK16visa10cu:1255: sāmānyamalaṅkārāntaramapavādatvena bādhitvā śleṣa evālaṅkāraḥ alaṅkārāntaraṃ tu tat
GK16visa10cu:1259: alaṅkārāntaraviṣayiṇī pratibhā tasyā evotpattihetutvamasya śleṣasya tadviṣayabodhakatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1264: (lo, e) eṣa ca niyamādalaṅkāraṇāṃ vicchittimādāyaiva sambhavatītyetadviṣaye vidyamānānāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādha iti ye manyante teṣāṃ pakṣamupanyasya dūṣayati--asya ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1267: teṣāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādhakatvādavakāśāntarābhāvena tahyapadeśaṃ bādhitvā mukhyatvena vyapadeṣṭuṃ yogyatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1274: (vi, ra) tanmate 'pi sakalālaṅkārasaṃkare śleṣo na bādakaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1276: tatra samāsoktyaprastutapraśaṃsāsaṅkīrṇasya śleṣasya taddvayabādhakaprasaktireva nāsti ityāha---samāsektīti /
GK16visa10cu:1284: yathā--- “satataṃ yā madhyasthā kathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭitāsīti /
GK16visa10cu:1294: (lo, ai) itthamiti vakṣyamāṇasya buddhisthitayāṃ idamā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1299: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgād galitaṃ na lakṣitam” //
GK16visa10cu:1308: anabhidheyatayā abhidhāyāḥ prakṛtabodhanena viramād asya śleṣasya /
GK16visa10cu:1310: “vidvanmānasahaṃsa--” ityādau śleṣagarbhe rūpake 'pi mānasaśabdasya cittasarorūpobhayārthatve 'pi rūpakeṇa śleṣo bādhyate /
GK16visa10cu:1316: viduṣāṃ mana eva mānasaṃ sarastatra haṃseti rājñaḥ sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:1321: yathā “pṛthukārttasvarapātram” ityatra sadanadvayaviśeṣaṇayoḥ śliṣṭārthayoḥ viśrāntistadāha---śleṣe hīti /
GK16visa10cu:1326: ataevātra “rājanārāyaṇaṃ lakṣmīḥ samāliṅgati nirbharam” ityatra rājño nārāyaṇatvocitalakṣmīsamāliṅganaṃ varṇyate /
GK16visa10cu:1327: tathā “mukhacandra prakāśate” ityatra mukhaṃ candrarūpatāmāpadyata ityuparacitacandradharmasya tatra varṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:1328: samakakṣatvaṃ na khalu rūpakavad ekasya gauṇatānyasya prādhānyam /
GK16visa10cu:1330: yathā---“hṛdijñeṣu vakṣyati” ityādau vahanavacanayoḥ tathā “pṛthukārtasvara” ityādau pṛthukādīnām /
GK16visa10cu:1332: “sannihitabālāndhakārā bhāsvanmūrtiśca” ityādau virodhābhāse 'pi viruddhārthasya pratibhātamātrasya prarohābhāvānna śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1343: iti bādhasyāpi upasthitimātreṇa eva virodhābhāsālaṅkāratā śleṣasya tu śliṣṭārthasyānvaye
GK16visa10cu:1348: bhāsvataḥ kāntimato 'pīvā sūryyamūrttau andhakārasya sannidhānābhāvād virodhābhāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1354: (vi, śa) evaṃ punarurakteti---na hi bhujaṅgakuṇḍaliśabdayoḥ ekārthatvabodhaḥ paryntikaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1361: (vi, ṣa) itthamuktasthaleṣu śleṣālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā te te alaṅkārā evetyuktvā alaṅkārāntarasyaiva bādhakaḥ śleṣa iti tadabhipretaṃ vaktumāha---yena dhvastamiti /
GK16visa10cu:1363: svecchopajātetyādau dapike sakalakalamityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityagre 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1364: tena yena dhvastamityādau mādhavomādhavayordvayorapi prākaraṇikayoḥ yena dhvastetyādyekadharmānvayarūpastulyayogitālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1369: nītānāmityādau tu aprākaraṇikayoreva vanavṛddharakamalayoḥ nītānīmityādi pūrvārddhekte karmānvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1375: “svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
GK16visa10cu:1383: prasūnaviśikho 'lpabuddhiḥ prabhuśca svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi svecchayā sarvalokopari prāptādhikāro 'pi dehīti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visa10cu:1385: tathāpi mārgaṇaśataiḥ asaṃkhyabāṇaiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visa10cu:1386: uktarūpaḥ prabhustu lokeṣu dehīti dadasveti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visa10cu:1388: mārgaṇaśataiḥ paradhanānveṣaṇarūpamārgaṇaśataiḥ arthāt īdṛśapadātiśataiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visa10cu:1389: dehītyanuktvāpi padatidvārā sarvasaṃva hṛtvā duḥ khaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1390: adhikārasattvāddehītyuktvāpi sarvasvaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyasattve 'pi alpabuddhitvāttathā na karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1391: evaṃ prasūnaviśikhaḥ svadattamohād akāṇḍe 'kasmājjīvanamapi samākṣipati harati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1392: atra prākaraṇi ka uktarūpaḥ prabhuraprākaraṇikaḥ prasūnaviśikhaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1398: svecchayā upajāta āśritaḥ viṣayaḥ bhogaḥ yasya /
GK16visa10cu:1399: vaktuṃ na yātīti na tatra svārthanivedanaṃ vaktuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1401: iti mārgaṇaśataiḥ yācanaśataiḥ pradānābhāvāt punaḥ punaḥ kṛtaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1407: vaktuṃ na yātīdṛśaḥ samprati me kāma iti /
GK16visa10cu:1414: ityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣasyaitadviṣayaparihāreṇāsaṃbhavād eṣāṃ ca śaleṣaviṣayaparihāreṇāpi
GK16visa10cu:1415: sthiteretadviṣaye śleṣasya prādhānyena camatkāritvapratīteśca śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1420: tatra parasparavyabhicārasattvena dvayorapyalaṅkāratvaṃ draḍhayannubhayasattveṣu viṣayeṣu śleṣasyaivaucityamityāha---śleṣasyaitad ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:1421: pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau ityādiṣu etadviṣayaparihāreṇa śleṣasya śleṣarahitatulyayogitādīpakopamānāntu śleṣaparihāreṇa sthitirbahuṣvevodāharaṇeṣu draṣṭavyā /
GK16visa10cu:1433: eṣāṃ tulyayogitādīnāṃ trayāṇāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ prābalyena camatkāritvaṃ kavinā vdyarthaśabdasya vaicitryabodhopāyatvenopādānāt /
GK16visa10cu:1438: atra ca mādhavomādhavayorekasya vācyatvaniyame parasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:1445: śabdayostantratāṅgīkāreṇa dvayorvācaytvaniyamaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa dhvanitantravādimate caikasya vācyatvamitarasya vyaṅgyatvamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16visa10cu:1462: atra yena dhvastamityādau iti samīcīnaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1470: tathā ca vaktrā yadyekamevārthaṃ prakramyedaṃ padyamuktaṃ syāttadānyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena
GK16visa10cu:1471: tulyayogitāyā atra prasaktyabhāvenāyameva tulyayogitālaṅkāraviviktaḥ śleṣasya viṣayaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1472: naca tathāpi vyaṅgyopamālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇa evāyaṃ śleṣa iti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:1474: kevalaṃ tatrālaṅkāravyapadeśo brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyena vācyatādaśāyāmalaṅkāratvamādāya gauṇa eva /
GK16visa10cu:1476: nanu mādhavomādhavayoḥ dvayārapi tulyavibhaktiviṣayatvena prākarāṇakatvamevetyato dvayārvācyatvenātra tulyayogitaivetyata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1485: evaṃ ca yena dhvastetyādau nītānāmityādau ca yattulyayogitā---pradarśanaṃ prākkṛtaṃtatparakīyamapapradarśanamātraṃ kṛtamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1486: vastutastu taddvaye śleṣa eva tulyayogitārahita iti sādhitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1491: pracakame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya muneśca dhenuḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:1492: ityādau tulyayogitāyāmekasyaiva nilayagamanopakramarūpadharmasya saurabhīprabhayordharmiṇoḥ sambaddhatayā pratyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1493: iha tu śleṣeṣu punaranekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāṃ mādhavomādhavaprabhṛtīnāṃ yena dhvastamanobhavenetyādirūpapṛthagdharmasambaddhatayā pratyaya ityanvayaḥ
GK16visa10cu:1498: yadyapi tulyayogitāyāmapi dvayorna prakṛtāprakṛtatvaṃ tathāpi tad vivakṣā,
GK16visa10cu:1502: pūrṇopamāyā nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ “kamalamiva mukhaṃ manojñametat” ityādyasti pūrṇopamāyā viṣaya iti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:1503: na, yadi “sakala-” ityādau śabdaśleṣatayā nopamā tatkimaparāddhaṃ “manojñam” ityādāvarthaśleṣeṇa /
GK16visa10cu:1509: (vi, kha) tathā sakalakalamityādau ca yadupamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi apavādatvena śleṣasyaiva
GK16visa10cu:1510: prādhānyena vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityuktaṃ tatropamaivālaṅkāro na śleṣa iti pratipādayati---sakalakalamityādau ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1517: atra śleṣa eva tvalaṅkāra iti netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1518: tathā ca śliṣṭadharmasādharmyā upamā evālaṅkāra ityuktamanena /
GK16visa10cu:1520: upamānopameya sādhāraṇadharme vādicaturṇām upādāne hi pūrṇopamā /
GK16visa10cu:1527: tadvān viṣaya eva pūrṇopamāyā viṣayaḥ syādityāśaṅkate---kamalamiveti /
GK16visa10cu:1528: atra hi na śleṣo manojñatvaguṇakathanarūpakriyayoreva sādharmyād na tu śliṣṭaśabdasya iti /
GK16visa10cu:1531: yadi sakalakalamityatropamāṃ bādhitvā śleṣa eva śabdālaṅkārastadā kamalamiva mukhamityādāvapyupamāṃ
GK16visa10cu:1532: bādhitvā arthaśleṣālaṅkāre prasajati tena kimaparāddhaṃ manojñatvādidharmāṇāmubhayatrānvayarūpaśliṣṭatvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1533: ivaśabdasadbhāvādupamāyā eva tatrānubhavikatve tu sakalakalamityādāvapi śabdasādharmyodanubhūyamānopamaivetyabhiprāyeṇātra rudraṭoktamapi pramāṇayati---sphuṭamartheti
GK16visa10cu:1535: hṛdaye ca me” ityatra śabdāsādharmyāt samuccayālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1539: pūrṇopamāprakaraṇe lakṣyamāṇārthaśleṣeṇa kamala mivetyādau manojñatvadharmasya kamalamukharūpapratisambandhibhedāṅgīkāraprayojitena kimaparāddham
GK16visa10cu:1540: tulyenāparādhena śabdaśleṣaviṣaye pūrṇopamāmanaṅgīkṛtya etad viṣaye kiṃ tasyāḥ parigraho 'bhimato yuṣmākaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:1547: kriyāsāmyaṃ candra iva mukhaṃ śobhate ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:1553: tataśca pūrṇopamāyā anyathānupapattyā guṇakriyāsāmyasyaivārthaśleṣaviṣayatayāḥ parityāge pūrṇopamāviṣayatā yuktā,
GK16visa10cu:1562: na tu sakalakalamityādau śabdasādharmyasya ityatra upamāprayojakatvamityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1564: śabdasya sādharmyaṃ ca vācakatāsambandhena iti yadvṛttitvāditibhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1566: (lo, ṛ) tatra guṇakriyāsāmye vāstavatvāt svābhāvikatvāt avāstavatvāt atāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1571: tadā kathaṃ “vidvanmānasa--” ityādāvādhārabhūte cittādau sarovarādyāropo rājādehasādyāhopaprayojakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1574: (vi, gha) yadi hi vācakatāsambandhasya vṛttiniyāmakatvābhāvena śabdarūpasādharmyasya
GK16visa10cu:1575: avāstavatvānnālaṅkāraprayojakatvaṃ tadā paramparitarūpake eva śabdavācyatvena sāmyena
GK16visa10cu:1579: ayamarthaḥ-yadi śabdasāmyasya sakalakalamityādau nopamāprayojakatā kathaṃ tarhi “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādau rājño haṃsāropasya mānasāsādhāraṇaprayojakatā ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1585: (vi, ṅa) nanu sādharmyaṃ tāvat samāno dharmastasyāvāstavatve tadanupapannam /
GK16visa10cu:1586: vidvanmānasetyādau tvabhedāropa āhāryye 'vāstavatve 'pi śliṣṭaśabdarūpadoṣeṇa sambhavatyeva ityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1598: ityupamāyā evāṅgitvena vyapadeśo jyāyān “pradhānena hi byapadeśā bhavanti” iti nyāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1599: nanu śabdālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvasaṅkaro nāṅgīkriyate tatkathamatra śleṣopamayoraṅgāṅgabhāvaḥ saṅkara iti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:1604: (vi, ca) nanu tatraiva śabdabodhyatvarūpasādṛśyāttatropamāpadaṃ gauṇamevetyata āhakiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1612: tathā ca śliṣṭapadārthānusandhānena sāmyapratītau tato 'ṅginyupamā pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:1624: śleṣādestvarthānusādhānāt sāpekṣatvena parasparāpekṣāsambhavāt kathaṃ vā na svīkriyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1634: (vi, cha) itthaṃ sakalakalamityatropamaiva na śleṣa iti sādhite śleṣādhīnavastudhvanāvapi na śleṣālaṅkāra ityāha---satpakṣā iti /
GK16visa10cu:1636: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrāḥ kṛṣṇavarṇacañcūcaraṇā haṃsaviśeṣāḥ śaratkālavaśāt medinīpṛṣṭe nipantītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1642: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭrāputrā duryyodhanādayaḥ prasādhitāśāḥ śāsitadiṅmaṇḍalāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1644: satpakṣāḥ prakṛṣṭasahāyāḥ kālavaśād yamavaśāt madhuragiraḥ kāntavācaḥ medinīṣṭe nipatanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1652: atra śaradvarṇanayā prakaraṇena dhārtarāṣṭrādiśabdānāṃ haṃsādyarthābhidhāne niyamanādduryodhanādirūpor'thaḥ śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1653: iha ca prakṛtaprabandhābhidheyasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvādupamānopameyabhāvo na vivakṣita iti nopamādhvanirna vā śleṣa iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16visa10cu:1656: (vi, ja) atra copamādhvanitvaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraśca na prasajyata ityāha---iha ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1657: prakṛtaprabandho veṇīsaṃhāranāṭakaṃ tadabhidheyasya tatpratipādyasya kurūṇāṃ maraṇarūpasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vyaṅgyatayetyarthaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1664: sakalakalamityādau ca śleṣaghaṭita upamālaṅkāra evetyādikaṃ viśaditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1667: sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvāt yaduktamatraiva nāṭakalakṣaṇāvasare “sūcayed vastubījaṃ vā mukhyapātramathāpivā“iti upameyopamānabhāvo haṃsādīnāṃ duryodhanādibhaiḥ sahetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1673: (lo, au) samprati rasānupakārakamapi kavibhisteṣu teṣu śaktipradarśanārthamupanibaddhatvātprācyairalaṅkāramadhye lakṣitaṃ citraṃ nirūpayati---padmeti
GK16visa10cu:1674: asya cālaṅkāratāyāṃ tathāvidhanaipuṇyādisaṃskāravaśena vismayāveśo yathākathañcid bījam /
GK16visa10cu:1677: asya ca tathāvidhilipisanniveśaviśeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyināmapi varṇānāṃ tathāvidhaśrotrākāśasamavāyavi śeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyibhirvarṇerabhedenopacārācchabdālaṅkāratvam
GK16visa10cu:1681: atra varṇasmārakalipīnāṃ sanniveśasyaiva padmādyākārakatvāllipīnāṃ cāśabdatvāt śabdālaṅkāratvamasyānupapannamityāśaṅky samādhatte---tathāvidhaśrotreti
GK16visa10cu:1682: tathāvidhalipismāryyavarṇasya yaḥ śrotrarūpa ākāśe samavāyaviśeṣaḥ tadvaśena camatkārādhāyibhirvarṇaiḥ saha lipeḥ abhedopacārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1683: tādṛśasamavāyasya varṇānubhavajanakatvaṃ tajjanitasaṃskāreṇa lipito varṇasmaraṇaṃ tataścamatkāra ityetatparamparayā śrotrākāśasamavāyasya camatkārajanakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1690: atra hiśabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvamātreṇa śabdalaṅkāratvāṅgīkāre 'nuprasāntaḥ- pātitvameva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1694: māttadhūrtatamāvāsā sā vāmā me 'stu mā ramā” //
GK16visa10cu:1699: māttadhūrttatamā vāsā sā vāmā me 'stu māramā” //
GK16visa10cu:1709: pūrvatrānvitasyāpi āvṛttyā paścādapyanvayena sā vāmā me māramā kāmalakṣmīrastu /
GK16visa10cu:1710: āvṛttivaśena sā vāmā ityasya paścādapyanvayena tasya vā parakīyapadatvādapi tatparatvād me ityādeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1721: karṇikāyāmādyavarṇaṃ likhitvā dale dvau dvau varṇau lekhyau /
GK16visa10cu:1724: (lo, ā) mārameti---māyā lakṣmyā ramaṇāt māramo viṣṇustasya asusamā praṇasamā /
GK16visa10cu:1727: ātto gṛhīto dhūrttatamasyāvāso yathā evaṃbhūtā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1728: tathābhūtā sā prasiddhā ramā lakṣmīrme vāmā,
GK16visa10cu:1731: karṇikāyām “mā” śabdaṃ vinyasya “ramā” ityasyākṣaradvayaṃ tatra digdale liśitvā,
GK16visa10cu:1732: “su'; “ṣa'; iti akṣaradvayaṃ vidigdalena praveśya “cāru” ityakṣarābhyāmitaradigradalena nirgamapraveśau /
GK16visa10cu:1734: iti akṣaradvaṃya dattvā tadanantaradigdale “dhūrtta” ityakṣaradvayena praviśya punaḥ karṇikākṣarāt prabhṛti tenaiva nirgamya “tamā” ityakṣaradvayena,
GK16visa10cu:1738: taditaradigdale “me 'stu” ityakṣaradvayena nirgatya punaḥ prāk nirgamya digdale “māra” ityakṣaradvayena praviśya karṇikātāṃ gate “mā” ityatra viśrāntiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1742: “sānandaṃ devadaityadvijabhujagamukhaiḥ praṇibhiḥ sevyamānā nāśaṃ tāpaṃ nayantī śaradi śaśikalāṃ śyāmayantī svabhāsā /
GK16visa10cu:1743: sā sakhyaḥ sādharāre sakalajagadadhīśena saṃyuktahārā sā dhvastāśeṣapātā salilanidhisutā santaṃ pātu yuṣmān” //
GK16visa10cu:1756: tathā ca vaicitryamalaṅkāra iti alaṅkārasāmānyalakṣaṇākrāntatvād uktyalaṅkāra eva sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1757: sā cyutadattetyāditriprakārā kriyā guptyādikā ca bhavatītyāha---vyutadatteti /
GK16visa10cu:1769: atra yathāśruter'thasambhavepi anupayuktakathanarūpatvena cyutadattākṣaratve eva tātparyyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1770: prahelikātvaṃ tatra yathāśrute 'partho yathā---kokilāḥ śālavṛkṣe kūjanti /
GK16visa10cu:1772: nipīḍitā kuraṅgākṣī vadanena kiṃ karotu iti /
GK16visa10cu:1776: ebhiruddīpakairmadanena nipīḍitā satī kuraṅgākṣī kiṃ karotviti /
GK16visa10cu:1784: tasmai gāṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca sarvāṇyābharaṇāni ca” //
GK16visa10cu:1794: iti atra mayūraṃ jayati ityatra luptaḥ karttā /
GK16visa10cu:1795: siddhānte tu mayusturaṅgavadano giriśaṅgasthitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ rañjayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1800: siddhānte tu vāḥ jalaṃ puruṣo 'yamayati yāti /
GK16visa10cu:1801: akṣaralopaguptiḥ viruddhapradarśanaṃ ca yathā--- “mukundenāmunā nūnaṃ śubhreṇa varavarṇini /
GK16visa10cu:1803: ” atra mukundena śbhreṇa hasitenāsitena iti viruddhadharmavattvam /
GK16visa10cu:1805: siddhānte tu mukundapadasya mukārarāhityāt kundena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1806: tathā ca tena kundavaiśiṣṭyena yad hasitaṃ tena rājamānāsītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1808: athāvasaraprāpteṣvarthālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamūleṣu lakṣitavyeṣu teṣāmapyupajīvyatvena prādhānyāt prathamamupamāmāha--
GK16visa10cu:1813: upamārūpakotprekṣādayo bahavo 'laṅkārāḥ sādṛśyamūlā anyālaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā camatkārādhikyāt prathamaṃ te lakṣitumucitāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1823: sāmyaṃ vācyamavaidharmyaṃ vākyaikya upamā dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.14 //
GK16visa10cu:1828: dvayorupameyopamānayoḥ sāmyaṃ vākyaikye vācyaṃ sad upamā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1843: atra ca sāmyamityasya samāno dharma iti nār'thaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1846: kintūpameyopamānayoḥ sāmānyasādṛśyarūpasya dharmasya tayoranuyogitapratiyogitākhyaḥ sambandha eva atra sāmyapadārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1847: yandra iva mukhamityatra candrapratiyogisādṛśyavanmukhamiti bodhe sādṛśyasya pratiyogitāyāścandre 'nupayogitāyāśca mukhe pratīteḥ sādṛśyasambandha evopametyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1848: etaeva sādharmyamupamābhede itikāvyaprakāśoktalakṣaṇe samānena dharmeṇa sambandha upamā ityeva tatra vyākhyātam /
GK16visa10cu:1850: iti tatra likhanāt sādṛśyapratiyogitākhyaḥ sambandha eva tanmate upamānānuyogitākhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1851: granthakṛnmate tu upamānopameyagataṃ sanbandhaṃ bodhayantītyagre likhanāt pratiyogitānuyogitākhyasambandhadvayamevopamā /
GK16visa10cu:1852: kāvyaprakāśe ca tādṛśapratiyogitāyā ivādyavyayapadavācyatvena upamāyāśca śrautītvaṃ tulyādyanavyayapadavācyatvena tasyā ārthotvam /
GK16visa10cu:1854: prakṛtagranthakṛttuḥ ivādayaḥ śrutamātrā eva śīghramupamāṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve śrotī upamā /
GK16visa10cu:1855: tulyādayo 'navyayaśabdāstu praṇidhānena vilambādeva upamāṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve ārthoti vakṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:1858: yadi cānvitābhidhānavādāvalambena vācyatvasvīkārastathāpi ivāderupamānasya vānupādāne yā luptopamā tatra tādṛśasambandhasyāvācyatvāttatrāvyāptiḥ
GK16visa10cu:1859: ataeva kāvyaprakāśe tādṛśasambandharūpāyā upamāyā vācyatvaghaṭitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:1863: ataeva rūpakādau sādharmyasya vyaṅgyatvādeva tatra vācyapadena tadvyāvṛttirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:1867: tadanabhyupagame tu ivādyupādāne tulyādyupādāne vā saṃsargamaryyādayaiva tallābha iti /
GK16visa10cu:1874: sā pūrṇā yadi sāmānyadharma aupamyavāci ca /
GK16visa10cu:1883: (vi, da) sā ca pūrṇā luptā ceti dvidhā /
GK16visa10cu:1894: sāmānyadharma ityasya vivṛttiḥ sādhāraṇadharma iti dvayorupamānopameyayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1903: ārtho tulyasamānādyāstulyārtho tatra vā vatiḥ // VisSd_10.16 //
GK16visa10cu:1904: yathevavādayaḥ śabdā upamānānantaraprayuktatulyādipadasādhāraṇā api śrutimātreṇopamānopameyagatasādṛśyalakṣaṇasambandhaṃ bodhayantīti tatsadbhāve śrautyupamā /
GK16visa10cu:1909: iyaṃ pūrṇopamā sarvaprakāraiva śrautrī ārtho cetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1919: tasya tulyādipadānāmapi vācyatvāt śīghrapratīyamānatvena ivādito 'viśeṣeṇa śrautyārthovibhāgānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1922: tatra tasyeveti vatividhāyakaṃ pāṇinisūtram . tatraiva tasyeva ityarthakaṃ ṣaṣṭhyantāt saptamyantād vā ivārthe vatirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1925: nanu mukhaṃ candratulyamityādyākāreṇa upamānānantare yāni prayuktāni tulyasadṛśāni padāni tatsādhāraṇāstatprāyāḥ yadyapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1927: ayamāśayaḥ---mukhaṃ kamalamiva ityādeḥ śabdasya prayogādeva mukhamupameyaṃ kamalaṃ copamānamiti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1928: na tvevaṃ tulyādipadopādāna iti samanantarameva vakṣyati--evamiti /
GK16visa10cu:1935: “kamalaṃ mukhaṃ ca tulyam” ityādāvabhayatrāpi viśrāmyantītyarthānusandhānādeva sāmyaṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve ārtho /
GK16visa10cu:1944: upameyopamānaniṣṭhapratiyogyanuyogirūpāyā upamāyā api pratisandhānagamyatvāt tatsadbhāve ārthotyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1946: kamalaṃ mukhasyeti---nacātra mukhamupamānaṃ kamalamupameyamevaiti kathamupamāne viśrāntiriti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:1948: tulyārthe 'pi vatividhāyakaṃ “tena tulyam” iti pāṇineraparaṃ sūtram /
GK16visa10cu:1951: (lo, ḷ) upameye ityādibhiḥ saptamyantaiḥ viśrāmyantīti kriyāyāḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1962: hṛdayaṃ madayati vadanaṃ tava śaradinduryathā bāle /” //
GK16visa10cu:1966: (vi, pa) tatra pūrṇāyāḥ ṣaḍvidhatvaṃ darśayati--dve iti /
GK16visa10cu:1978: kumbhāvivetyatra “ivena nityasamāso vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca” iti nityasamāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1982: cakitamṛgalocanābhyāṃ sadṛśī capale ca locane tasyāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:1986: atra sudhayā tulya ityarthe tṛlyārthe vatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1993: luptā sāmānyadharmāderekasya yadi vā dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.17 //
GK16visa10cu:2001: sāpi yathāsambhavaṃ śrautī ārtho ca bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2008: pūrṇāvaddharmalope sā vinā śrautīṃ tu taddhite // VisSd_10.18 //
GK16visa10cu:2009: sā luptopamā dharmasya sādhāraṇaguṇakriyārūpasya lope pūrṇāvaditi pūrvoktarītyā ṣaṭprakārā,
GK16visa10cu:2010: kiṃ tvatra taddhite śrautyā asambhavāt pañcaprakārā /
GK16visa10cu:2033: vācaḥ sudhā ivetyatra madhuratvaṃ dharmo luptaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2043: karmakartrorṇamuli ca syādevaṃ pañcadhā punaḥ // VisSd_10.19 //
GK16visa10cu:2047: dvivedhe ityasya kyaci ityatraivānvayo na tu kyaṅaītyatrāpi /
GK16visa10cu:2057: sutīyasi tvaṃ pauraṃ janaṃ tava sadā ramaṇīyate śrīḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2058: dṛṣṭaḥ priyābhiramṛtadyutidarśamindra- sañcāramatra bhuvi sañcarasi kṣitīśa /” //
GK16visa10cu:2066: atra strehaviṣayatvaṃ dharmo luptaḥ anayorādhārakarmaṇoḥ kyac /
GK16visa10cu:2094: (vi, la) atra kyaṅaditraye tadarthācārasya ṇamuldvaye ca dhātvarthadarśanasañjārayośca
GK16visa10cu:2095: sādhāraṇadharmāṇāṃ sattvād dharmaluptodāharaṇāni etāni na sambhavantītyataḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā
GK16visa10cu:2101: nanu kyaṅādiṣu samyagaupamyapratītirnāsti pratyayatvenāsvatantratvād ivādiprayogābhāvācceti na vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:2107: nanu tādṛśārthe vidhānasattve 'pi ivādivanna tebhyaḥ svata aupamyapratītiḥ;
GK16visa10cu:2109: ataḥ kyajādayaḥ svata aupamyapratipādakatvābhāvānna svata aupamyapratipādakāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2110: tathā ca tatsattve 'pi vivakṣitaḥ svata aupamyapratipādakalopo nāstītyāśaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16visa10cu:2113: teṣāṃ tādṛśārthakatve tu tadvivarakevaśabdaprayoga eva nāsiti /
GK16visa10cu:2115: tathā ca kyajādaya ivādivanna svata aupamyapratipādakāḥ ityāpātata eveyaṃ vicārasahāpyāśaṅkā /
GK16visa10cu:2116: tatraṃ svatastu avivakṣaiva na sambhavatīti samādhatte---neti /
GK16visa10cu:2135: vinigamakābhāve 'pi svatantramukhyatayā yadi kasyacitpratyayasya vācakatvaṃ kasyacitpratyayasya
GK16visa10cu:2136: vyañjakatvamucyate tadā ivādayo 'pi na vācakāḥ syuruktimātreṇaiva pramāṇakhaṇḍane
GK16visa10cu:2139: vācakatve vā “samuditaṃ padaṃ vācakam” “prakṛtipratyayau svasvārthabodhakau” iti ca matadvaye 'pi vatyādikyaṅādyoḥ sāmyameveti /
GK16visa10cu:2144: vā vācakatvamiṣyate tadā mamāpi kyajādīnāmapi matabhadena svato 'svato vā vācakatvaṃ
GK16visa10cu:2146: tava yathā vācakatvaṃ mamāpi tathā vācakatvamiti sāmyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2156: (lo, u) dhūṣaṇāntaramāha kalpabādāvapīti---ayamarthaḥ---yadi kvacit kyaṅādīnāṃ sadbhāve
GK16visa10cu:2158: tadā kalpabādīnāṃ sadbhāve api tathā syāt /
GK16visa10cu:2163: kyaṅādīnāṃ tu dyotakatvamaṅgīkriyate ityata āha--- vācakatve vā iti /
GK16visa10cu:2168: ayamāśayaḥ- yadi vatyādīnāṃ vācakatvāṅgīkāraḥ tadā kyaṅādīnāmapi vācakatvam /
GK16visa10cu:2170: sarvairapi vatikalpabādisadbhāve aupamyavācakasadbhāvaṅgīkārāt pratyayatvena tatsadṛśaiḥ kyaṅādibhiḥ kimaparāddhaṃ yadeṣāṃ sadbhāve aupamyavācakalopaḥ syāditi /
GK16visa10cu:2174: tadapi na ; na khalu kyaṅādaya ācāramātrārthāḥ api tu sādṛśyācārārthā iti /
GK16visa10cu:2182: tasya ca ivārthakatve 'nuśāsanābhāvoktidūṣaṇāyoktatvena pūrvoktena saha na paunaruktyamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:2189: ayamarthaḥ-kyaṅādīnāmācāramātrārthatve eva sādṛśyārthatvaṃ na syāt na ca tathā /
GK16visa10cu:2200: “tasyā mukhena sadṛśaṃ ramyaṃ nāste na vā nayanatulyam /
GK16visa10cu:2205: atra ramyatvaṃ sādhāraṇadharma ukta ityatra upamānamātralopaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2206: naca kathamatropamānalopaḥ mukhena sadṛśamityuktau mukhasyeva upamānatāpratītesyasya coktatvadeveti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:2210: tathā ca tasyā mukhasya nyūnaṃ samānaṃ vā nāstītyukte 'dhikatvākāṅkṣānivṛttau mukhapraśaṃsānupapattyā
GK16visa10cu:2211: sadṛśapadasyātropamānaparatvādeva upameyāpekṣayā upamānasyādhikatvena tasyā mukhasyādhikyaṃ nāstītyevārthāt /
GK16visa10cu:2223: (vi, kha) nanvevaṃ sadṛśapadenaiva upamānakathanāt kathaṃ tallopa ityata āha---atra mukhapratinidhīti /
GK16visa10cu:2227: evaṃ cādhyāhāralabhye tatra sādṛśyapratiyogitārūpasāmyaṃ vācyamityatra vācyapadasya vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ yad vyākhyātaṃ tadatrāpi upapannaṃ bodhyam
GK16visa10cu:2230: atraiva ca “mukhena sadṛśam” ityatra “mukhaṃ yathedaṃ” nayanatulyam” ityatra “dṛgīva” iti pāṭhe śrautyapi saṃbhavatīti /
GK16visa10cu:2231: anayorbhedayoḥ pratyekaṃ śrautyārthotvabhedena catuvidhatvasaṃbhave 'pi prācīnānāṃ rītyā dviprakāratvamevoktam /
GK16visa10cu:2235: tatpadadvayasthāne yathā ivādipadadāne tu śrautyau apyupamāne lupte bhavataḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2239: aupamyavācino lope samāse kvipi ca dvidhā // VisSd_10.20 //
GK16visa10cu:2254: gardabhatīti---mahātmanāṃ purato vyaktaṃ śrutiparuṣaṃ ninadannayaṃ gardabha ivācaratītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2256: luptayostayoḥ pratisandhānāccaupamyasya prataītirityato na tasya vyaṅgyatvamityato niruktaṃ vācyatvamastyeva /
GK16visa10cu:2264: yadyapi luptasya eva kkipaḥ kkipparebhāṣā ityataḥ tasya lopa ityuktisambhavaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:2265: tathāpi bhaviṣyallopasya kkipa eva kkipatvamuktaṃ tasyaivaupamyavācitvaṃ tu evetyuktameva /
GK16visa10cu:2269: dvidhā samāse vākye ca lope dharmopamānayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2271: (lo, ḷ) evemavaikalope luptopamāṃ darśayitvā dvilope darśayati /
GK16visa10cu:2273: iyamapi pūrvavat autyārtho ceti caturdhā sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:2275: “tasyā mukhena” ityādau “ramyam” iti sthāne “loke” iti pāṭhe 'nayorudāharaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:2279: upamānānupādāne ca dve aupamyavacilope ca dve iti caturdaśavidhāmekaluptāmuktvā dviluptāprabhedānāha---dvidheti /
GK16visa10cu:2294: upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge iti pāṇinisūtreṇa sādhāraṇadharmāprayoge rūpakabādhayā upamānavidhānāt /
GK16visa10cu:2300: upameyasya lope tu syādekā pratyaye kyaci /
GK16visa10cu:2302: (lo, ai) punarekalope luptopamāṃ prācīnānurodhād dvilopaprakaraṇe lakṣayati--upameyasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:2309: (vi, jha) itthaṃ dviluptāścātastraḥ ekaluptāścaturddaśoktā ityaṣṭādaśoktvā punarekaluptāmekāmāha---upameyasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:2317: atra kecidāhuḥ--“sahastrāyudhena saha vartata iti sasahastrāyuvaḥ sa ivācaratīti vākyātsasahastrāyudhīyatīti padasiddhau viśeṣyasya śabdānupāttatvādihopameyalopaḥ”
GK16visa10cu:2322: (vi, ña) naca sahastrāyudhīyate ityevamapi sambhavāt kyaṅā cāpi asyāḥ sambhava iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:2326: nanu kyajarthasya ācārasya sādhāraṇadharmatvamanavadhāya pauraṃ sutīyatītyādikaṃ dharmaluptatvena prāgudāhṛtaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:2328: ācārasya sādhāraṇadharmatvānavadhānena tasyāpi lopād iti cenna,
GK16visa10cu:2333: tathā ca kartaivātropameyastasya ca viśeṣyatāvacchedakena rūpaemānanupādānāllopa ityāhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2336: tanmate karttari vihitasya kyaca ākhyātasya ca karttṛtvena rūpeṇa vācakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2340: tathā ca darśitārthe īdṛśaprayogo 'sādhurevetyuktaṃ pukṣīyatītyādau karttṛbodhastu kartrākhyātādeveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:2341: sa ityanena viśeṣyatāvacchedakena rūpeṇa kartturupādrānamastyevetyapi tanmate dūṣaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:2346: kiñca “sa sahastrāyudhīyati” ityatra kkipapratyayasya aupamyavācakatvādupakame upagamaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2348: utprekṣā yathā--- kastūrītilakanti bhālaphalake devyā mukhāmbhoruhe rolambanti tamālavālamukulottaṃsanti maulīṃ prati /
GK16visa10cu:2349: yāḥ karṇe vikacotpalanti kucayoraṅke ca kālagurū- sthāsanti prathayantu tāstava śivaṃ śrīkaṇṭhakaṇṭhatviṣaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:2355: atra kṣīrodamivātmānamācarantītyupameya ātmā sādhāraṇadharma śuklatā ca luptau /
GK16visa10cu:2358: (vi, ṭa) kṣīrodīyantītyatra sādhāraṇadharmalopapradarśanamādhārasya sādhāraṇadharmatvānavadhānāditi prāgeva darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:2360: kṣīrodaṃ yathā carati tathātmānamiti pratītyā karmatvenobhayadharmatvādācārasya /
GK16visa10cu:2365: atra mṛgasya locane iva cañcale locane yasyā iti samāse upamāpratipādakasādhāraṇadharmopamānānāṃ lopaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2388: trilope ekaprakāra iti gaṇanayā ekaviśatiprakārā luptopamā /
GK16visa10cu:2389: kiṃ copamānānupādāne dharme vādilopeneti militvā prakāracatuṣṭayaṃ śrautamārthaṃ ca sambhavatītyaṣṭavidhamiti pañcaviṃśatiprakārā /
GK16visa10cu:2391: eṣu copamābhedeṣu madhye 'luptasādhāraṇadharmeṣu bhedeṣu viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate--
GK16visa10cu:2397: ekarūpaḥ kvacitkvāpi bhinnaḥ sādhāraṇo guṇaḥ // VisSd_10.23 //
GK16visa10cu:2402: tena “tvaṃ sudhāvanmadhura” ityatra tadudāharaṇe vyaktaikyasya śakyatāvacchedakasyābhāve 'pi manoharatvasya lakṣyatāvacchedakasyaikyenaikarūpyaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:2411: sā ca prakṛteḥ sadṛśatā yathā śmaśrulatvasaraghāvyāptatvayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2415: tatra ekarūpe yathā udāhṛtam-“madhuraḥ sudhāvadadharaḥ--” ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:2421: (vi, ṇa) bhalleti---sa raghusteṣāṃ pārasīkānāṃ yavanānāṃ bhallarūpāstraviśeṣeṇāpavarjitaistyajitaiḥ śirobhiḥ mahī tastāra vyāpārayāmāsa /
GK16visa10cu:2431: atra śmaśrulatvasaraghāvyāptatvayoḥ dharmayorbhede 'pi svagatapiṅgalatvādidharmasājātyena sādṛśyādekarūpatayā samānatā śiraḥ kṣaudrapaṭalayordharmiṇoḥ sāmyabījam /
GK16visa10cu:2437: “smeraṃ vidhāya nayanaṃ vikasitamiva nīlamutpalaṃ mayi sā /
GK16visa10cu:2444: yadyapi smeratvaṃ mukhasyaiva dharmaḥ na nayanasyetyato vistāratvameva lakṣatāvacchedakam /
GK16visa10cu:2445: vikasitatvaṃ tu nīlotpaladharma ityavacchedakasyāpi bhedastathāpi vikāsasyāpi vistāraviśeṣatvād abhedo bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2459: (lo, ī) vācyatvagamyatve ekadeśe vācyatvamekadeśe gamyatvamityekadeśe viśeṣeṇa varttamānād ekadeśavivarttinītyanvarthaṃ nāma kvacit rūpakavat samastavastuviṣayāpyupamā dṛśyate /
GK16visa10cu:2463: tanmadhye 'pi tavāmarāyata iyaṃ bhūmaṇḍalālambinī hārakṣīrapaṭīrasodararuciḥ svargaukasāmāpagāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:2468: pade pade vibhānti sma cakravākaiḥ stanairiva” //
GK16visa10cu:2469: atrotpalādīnāṃ netrādīnāṃ sādṛśyaṃ vācyaṃ saraḥ śrīṇāṃ cāṅganāsāmyaṃ gamyam /
GK16visa10cu:2473: saraḥ śrīyaḥ sarovaralakṣmyāḥ pade pade deśe deśe utpalaiḥ padmaiścakravākaiśca vibhānti sma /
GK16visa10cu:2479: avyaṅgyatvasyaiva vācyapadārthatvena prāk pratipāditatvād anvitābhidhānapakṣe vācyamanyathā tu saṃsargamaryyādagamyam /
GK16visa10cu:2494: kāntāyate sparśasukhena vāri vārīyate svacchatayā vihāyaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:2511: vibhinnadharmāpyeṣā sambhavati---yathā “vijño gururivāsi tvaṃ kandarpa iva sundaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2528: atra prakṛtaśaradvarṇane taddharmā haṃsacandrādayaḥ sarva eva prakṛtāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2532: “asya rājño gṛhe bhānti bhūpānāṃ tā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2534: atropameyabhūtavibhūtibhaiḥ “kalpavṛkṣabhavā iva ” ityupamānabhūtā vibhūtaya ākṣipyanta ityākṣepopamā /
GK16visa10cu:2535: atraiva “gṛhe” ityasya “bhavane” ityanena pratinirdeśātpratinirdesyopamā ityādayaśca na lakṣitāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:2539: (vi, ba) ākṣepopamā--pratinirdeśyopamayoḥ sūtreṇanuktibījaṃ darśayituṃ taddvayamāha--asya rājña iti /
GK16visa10cu:2546: (lo, ṝ) bhūpānītāḥ rājabhirupahārīkṛtāḥ gṛhe ityasya upameyavākyagatasya bhavana ityanena upamānavākyagatena /
GK16visa10cu:2548: ayamāśayaḥ yaditthaṃ kvacidapi vicchittyābhāsamādāya viśeṣato lakṣitavyaṃ tena tasya tathāvidhasya sahastradhāsambhavād granthagauravaṃ vinā na kiñcitphalamiti /
GK16visa10cu:2549: tathāvidhasyāpi likhitavyatve vā yadyuktaprakāravailakṣyaṇyaṃ tadā lakṣitavyam /
GK16visa10cu:2558: vākyabhede uktarasanopamāyā vakṣyamāṇopameyopamāyāśca prasaktyā tadbhedasyātra praveśāt /
GK16visa10cu:2562: na vidyata upameyasya upamānāntareṇānvayaḥ sambandho 'tretyanvarthanāmānanvayālaṅkāraḥ, arthāditi /
GK16visa10cu:2585: mukhaṃ candra ityatra yathā bhede 'bhedāropād vyadhikaraṇenā'ropitena candratvena
GK16visa10cu:2600: (lo, e) nanvekasyaiva upamānopameyabhāvaḥ kathaṃ na viruddha ityata āha---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:2643: aravindasyaivopari khelatā khañjanena mañjulamaravindaṃ vīkṣya cārucañcalalocanaṃ tasyā vadanaṃ smarāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2651: aravindamityādyudāharaṇe smṛtirupāyā vipralambhāṅgatvena preyo 'laṅkāraviṣayatve 'pi smaraṇālaṅkārasyāvādatvena tadvādhakatā /
GK16visa10cu:2657: “śirīṣamṛdvī giriṣu prapede yadā yadā duḥ khaśatāni sītā /
GK16visa10cu:2658: tadā tadāsyāḥ sadaneṣu saukhyalakṣāṇi dadhyau galadastru rāmaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:2667: śirīṣamṛdvī sītā yadā yadā giriṣuduḥ khaśatāni prapede tadā tadā rāmo 'syāḥ sadaneṣu saukhyalakṣāṇi galadaśru yathā syāttathā dadhyāvityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:2686: (lo, ā) evaṃ sādharmye 'bhedaprādhānye alaṅkāran nirṇoya bhedaprādhānye lakṣayati--rūpakamiti /
GK16visa10cu:2692: evaṃ ca nirapahnavasyānigīrṇasya viṣayasya viṣayiṇā tādātmyād yadrūpavattvaṃ tadrūpakākhyamalaṅkaraṇamanyarūpeṇānyasya rūpavattvādityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:2701: yathā---“stanopapīḍamāśleṣaḥ kṛto dyūte paṇastayā“iti pariṇāmodāharaṇe rūpaṇādhikaraṇā'śleṣatayaiva
GK16visa10cu:2702: rūpyamāṇasya paṇasya pariṇāmādivāstava eva praṇā'śleṣayorabheda ityataḥ paṇo na rūpati
GK16visa10cu:2704: apahnutivyavacchedāyeti--“nāyaṃ śaśī kuṇḍalitaḥ phaṇīndraḥ” ityādau śaśini kuṇḍalitaphaṇīndrāropa eva,
GK16visa10cu:2707: tatparamparitaṃ sāṅgaṃ niraṅgamiti ca tridhā // VisSd_10.28 //
GK16visa10cu:2724: yatra rūpake gṛhyamāṇe kvacit kasyacidāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2730: (lo, ī) parasya mukhyasya tathāvidhasamyagarthāntararūpaṇaṃ vinānupapadyamāne āropaṇe kāraṇaṃ nimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2749: kīdṛśāya---āhave yuddhe jagatyuddaṇḍaṃ rājamaṇḍalaṃ nṛpatimaṇḍalameva rājamaṇḍaṃla candramaṇḍalaṃ tadīyarāhave saihikeyāya tattiraskārakatvāt
GK16visa10cu:2753: atra ca mukhyarūpakanirvāhāya dvayornṛpaticandrayoḥ prākaraṇikatvādādāveva nṛpacandro rājapadavācyo na tu candro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2756: yatra tu kasyacidāropaṃ vinaiva prathamaṃ mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati paścāttādṛśanirūpyamāṇasyāparapadārthānvayānupapattistatraprākaraṇike
GK16visa10cu:2760: yathā--- “bhramimaratimatvasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:2761: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām” //
GK16visa10cu:2762: ityatra śyāmatvenopakārakatvena ca jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ prathamaṃ siddhyatyeva /
GK16visa10cu:2763: paścācca syamāṇasya bhujagasya viṣapadārthe prākaraṇikajalajanakatvānupapattyā tannirāsāya viṣapadadvitīyārtho halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16visa10cu:2765: tato bhujagasya halāhalajanakatvenānupapattyabhāvād bhujagarūpeṇa siddhiriti viṣayasya vibhāgaḥ sudhībhiravadheyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2766: evaṃ ca mukhyarūpakasādhakaviśeṣyasya vācyatve paramparitaṃ rūpakaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:2767: tasya vyaṅgyatve tu vācyasiddhyaṅgamiti sthite “dīpayane rodasīrandhrameṣa jvalati sarvataḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2769: “ityatra kule veṇvāropaṇasya vyaṅgyatayā vācyadāvānalarūpasiddhyaṅgatvamiti granthakṛtā prāguktaṃ cintyam /
GK16visa10cu:2770: rājamaṇḍalarāhave ityatra iva tatrāpi mukhyadavānalarūpakasādhakatvena veṇvāropaṇasya vācyatvādeva /
GK16visa10cu:2775: atra rājamaṇḍalaṃ nṛpasamūha eva candrabimbamityāropo rājabāhau hāhutvārope nimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2781: bhūbhṛto rājāna eva parvatā ityādyāropo rājñaḥ sūryatvādyāropanimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2801: vairiṃcaṃ brāhmaṃ vatsaraśatam uccaiḥ sāmrājyaṃ kriyāḥ kuryyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2803: viduṣāṃ mānasaṃ manaḥ eva mānasasaraḥ tat haṃsa,
GK16visa10cu:2807: samitāṃ yuddhānāṃ svīkāra eva samidhāṃ svīkāraḥ tatra vaiśvānara /
GK16visa10cu:2808: satye prītividhānameva satyām aprītividhānaṃ tatra dakṣa prajāpate /
GK16visa10cu:2809: vijayaḥ paraparābhava eva vijayor'junastat prāgbhāve pūrvotpattau bhīmasena /
GK16visa10cu:2810: he prabho ityatra rājñi haṃsādyāropamukhyarūpakāraṇyanekāni pratyekaṃ tatsādhakāni manaādau mānasasarovarādirūpakāṇyanekāni /
GK16visa10cu:2811: prakṛte api rājñi dinādhīśādyanekarūpakasādhakāni lakṣmyādīnāmudayādau paṅkajodayādirūpakāṇīti /
GK16visa10cu:2817: sadvaṃśaḥ satkulameva sadvaṃśaḥ sadveṇuḥ tatra muktāratnaṃ bhāvān kairna stūyate ?
GK16visa10cu:2820: alaukiko 'nyalokavilakṣaṇo yo mahāloko mahādṛṣṭipātaḥ sa eva mahāloko mahājyotistena prakāśitaṃ jagattrayam arthān muktāmaṇḍitaṃ yena he tādṛśa
GK16visa10cu:2821: atra hi rājñi muktāropo mukhyarūpakaṃ tatsādhakaṃ kule veṇvāropaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:2830: ityatra lokatrayātmakatvamityādi rūpaṇaṃ pātālamityādi rūpaṇaṃ hetuḥ //
GK16visa10cu:2835: atra trailokyasya maṇḍapatvāropo haribāhūnāṃ stambhatvārope nimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2838: (vi, ga) aśliṣṭaṃ kevalamāha---pāntu vo jaladaśyāmā iti /
GK16visa10cu:2850: “tatra ca rājabhujādīnāṃ rāhutvādyāropo rājamaṇḍalādīnāṃ candramaṇḍalatvādyārope nimittam” iti kecit /
GK16visa10cu:2861: eṣu caturṣu rūpakayornimittanaimittakabhāva uktaviparīta eveti keṣāñcinmataṃ darśayati---eṣviti /
GK16visa10cu:2866: aṅgino yadi sāṅgasya rūpaṇaṃ sāṅgameva tat // VisSd_10.30 //
GK16visa10cu:2872: yo rūpyate tasya dharmā api yadi rūpyante tadā sāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2890: rāvaṇarūpeṇāvagraheṇa vṛṣṭivighātena klāntaṃ marudrūpaṃ śasyaṃ vāgrūpāmṛtena sa kṛṣṇo viṣṇurmegho śasyamabhivṛṣya abhiṣicya tirodadhe /
GK16visa10cu:2903: iha hi mukhe paṅkajatvarūpaṇānantaraṃ punā raṅgatvarūpaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:2909: ekadeśe viśeṣeṇa śābdatayā sphuṭatvena virttituṃ śīlamasya rūpakasyetyekadeśavivarti /
GK16visa10cu:2917: na ceyamekadeśavivartinyupamā vikasvaratvadharmasyāropyamāṇe padme mukhyatayā vartamānāt mukhe vopacaritatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2924: lāvaṇyarūpairmadhubhiḥ pūrṇaṃ vikasvaraṃ cāsyā āsyaṃ lokalocanarūpāṇāṃ rolambānāṃ bhramarāṇāṃ kadambaiḥ kairna pīyate /
GK16visa10cu:2931: nacetyādi lāvaṇyaṃ madhu iva ityādyupamānasambhavāt tadvaśena mukhe 'pi padmopamāpratīteḥ ityāśaṅkārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2933: vikasvaratvaṃ puṣpadharma evetyastaddharmaṇi puṣpe eva mukhyatayā sākṣāt sambandhena varttamānatvāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2934: mukhe ceti padmatulye mukhe svāśrayasādṛśyasambandhenetyevaṃ paramparāsambandharūpādupacārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2940: viṣayiṇaḥ padmarūpeṇa rūpavattāpādane tasya vikasvarākhyadharmaparigrahaḥ sādhakaṃ prāmāṇam /
GK16visa10cu:2941: etacca saṃkaranirūpaṇaprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatīti neha tanyate /
GK16visa10cu:2943: niraṅgaṃ kevalasyaiva rūpaṇaṃ tadapi dvidhā // VisSd_10.32 //
GK16visa10cu:2963: “dāse kṛtāgasi bhavatyucitaḥ prabhūṇāṃ pādaprahāra iti sundari / nātra dūye /
GK16visa10cu:2964: udyatkaṭhorapulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrai- ryadbhidyate mṛdu padaṃ nanu sā vyathā me” //
GK16visa10cu:2977: atra kevalamiti niravayavarūpaṃ samānāntararūpaṇaṃ vinā ekatraiva nirūpaṇaṇānibandhanāt,
GK16visa10cu:2994: atrārthaḥ kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvāropaḥ khaḍge sauvidallatvārope nimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2998: (vi, ṭa) khaḍgaḥ kṣmeti---khaḍga eva strītvenānāropitāyāḥ kṣamāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sauvidallaḥ antaḥ purasthanapuṃsakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3005: iti atra hi prasūnabāṇādeḥ rājatvādyāropaḥ candrasya sitātapatrādyāropahetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3006: yadi caikasya vācyasya rūpyasya sādhakānyanekānyanyāni rūpakāṇyeva mālā ityabhiprāyaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:3007: tadā “rākāyā nabhasaścandraḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ śaśasya ca” ityudāhāryyam /
GK16visa10cu:3008: atra hi śaśini rūpyamāṇe puṇḍarīke vācye rākāyāḥ padahastalakṣmītvaṃ gaganasya saroratvaṃ śaśasya bhramaratvaṃ cārthasādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:3014: iha ca kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvarūpaṇaṃ vinā khaḍgasya sauvidallatvarūpaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
GK16visa10cu:3019: “asti svastyayanaṃ śriyaḥ sucaritaṃ drāghīyasaḥ śreyasaḥ saundaryyasya rasāyanaṃ niravadheḥ śīlasya līlāyitam /
GK16visa10cu:3020: vidyānāmadhidaivataṃ nirupadheḥ śauryyasya visphūrjitaṃ śrībhānustrikaliṅgamaṅgalapadaṃ gaṅgānvaye bhūpatiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3021: atra śrīprabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇiviśeṣatvarūpaṇam ārthaṃ svastyayanarūpaṇe hetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3023: dṛśyante kvacidāropyāḥ śliṣṭāḥ sāṅge 'pi rūpake // VisSd_10.33 //
GK16visa10cu:3029: (lo, u) kvacidekadeśe āropyā āropaviṣayavācake pade vyaṅgyatayā nirdiṣṭāḥ
GK16visa10cu:3034: samastavastuviṣayaṃ yathā--atraiva “vicumbati-” ityādau “cucumbe haridabalāmukhamindunāyakena” iti pāṭhe /
GK16visa10cu:3040: kiṃ kṛtvā ? udāmahīdhararūpasya stanasyāgre karaṃ raśmimeva karaṃ pāṇiṃ nidhāya,
GK16visa10cu:3041: stanāgre kīdṛśe galitaṃ tama. paṭalarūpamaṃśukaṃ yatna tādṛśe /
GK16visa10cu:3048: dvitīyasyodāharaṇaṃ spaṣṭam ” cucumbe haridabalāmukhamindunāyakena” iti pāṭhe /
GK16visa10cu:3054: atra hi “bhūbṛdāvalidambholiḥ--” ityādau rājādau parvatatvādyāropa vinā varṇanīyasya rājāderdambholitādirūpaṇaṃ sarvathaiva sādṛśyābhāvādasaṅgatam
GK16visa10cu:3056: rājādeḥ sūryādinā sādṛśyasya tejasvitādihetukasya saṃbhavāditi na vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3060: iha tu mahīdharādeḥ stanādinā sādṛśyaṃ pīnotuṅgatvādinā suvyaktameveti na śliṣṭaparamparitam /
GK16visa10cu:3066: paramparitaṃ yad rūpakaṃ tadeva mukhyarūpakasādhakaṃ natu sādṛśyaṃ tatsādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:3067: yatra tu sādṛśyādapi mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati na tatra paramparitarūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:3084: evaṃ ca “bhramimarati ” mityādau viṣaṃ jalameva viṣamityāropo jalade prasiddhasādṛśyabhujagasyārope nimittamiti śliṣṭaparamparitameva /
GK16visa10cu:3085: atra “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādau rājādau haṃsatvāropo mānase mānasatvārope heturiti
GK16visa10cu:3086: manyamānā āhuḥ--“neha viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatā “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādāviva jalade bhujagāropahetukā,
GK16visa10cu:3087: kintu etatpadyāvasthitavaidyaśāstraprasiddhabhramādimaraṇāntāṣṭavidhagaralakāryyaviśeṣotthāpiteti dvyarthatāyāstādātmyāropaṇaṃ vinā prasiddheriha śleṣālaṅkāra eveti /
GK16visa10cu:3089: jalade bhujagasādṛśyasya sakalakalaṃ puramityādāviva viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatāṃ vinānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3090: kiñca jaladabhujagajaṃ viṣaṃ jalamiti na ghaṭate /
GK16visa10cu:3092: tasmād viṣameva viṣamiti rūpaṇamākṣipyaiva vācyarūpaṇaṃ saṃgacchate /
GK16visa10cu:3099: indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtti- rānīya yatra ramate taruṇapratāpaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3100: iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:3101: tātrālaṅkārikacaṇḍidāsapaṇḍitādayaḥ rājani parvatatvāropaṇaṃ nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:3106: apitu haṭhakāmukakāryye 'pīti pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:3108: kiñca śliṣṭaparamparite vidvanmānasahaṃsetyādau rājño haṃsatvaṃ mānasasya mānasatvāropaṇasādṛśyaṃ vināsiddham /
GK16visa10cu:3109: iha tu nistriṃśasya tamālavanāntatvaṃ nīlimādināpi prasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:3113: kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ haṃsatvādisādhakamātram /
GK16visa10cu:3114: ataevātra kṣaṇadānibhetyasyāpi padasya rātrikālākṣepeṇa aniḥ śeṣaṃ bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /
GK16visa10cu:3115: tadevaṃ kṣitibhṛta ityādi sarveṣāṃ rūpyamāṇānāṃ haṭharamaṇopakaraṇatvād yathoktameva jyāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3118: āntarnimagnacarapuṣpaśaro 'tipātā-- tkiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //
GK16visa10cu:3119: ityatra nayanāgneḥ taruṇatvasya prauḍhatvarūpamarthamādāya prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:3120: iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ śābdam /
GK16visa10cu:3124: haṭhādānīya ramata ityatra kāryyasāmye 'pi na samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3125: yadi hi kāryyaleśasāmyaṃ vā samāśritya samāsoktiraṅgīkāryyā tadekadeśavivartirūpakasya viṣayāpahāra eva syāt,
GK16visa10cu:3127: yatra vācā rūpaṇaṃ nāsti dyāmāliliṅgetyādi samāsoktyudāharaṇavat kāryyasāmyabāhulyasamvalitatvam,
GK16visa10cu:3129: ābhātītyādau ca vācyarūpaṇānāṃ bahutvena kāryyādisāmyaṃ svalpatayā tatsahāyyamevācarati iti /
GK16visa10cu:3131: anayośca samāsoktyekadeśavivartirūpakayoraparamapi yuktijātamihaiva samāsoktiprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatītyalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:3141: “rājamaṇḍalarāhave” ityādiṣu sarvatra samāsa eva tasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3146: tathā cātra bhrūlatayā hetunā madhupaśreṇīṃ vidhirvidadhe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3147: bhrūlatāṃ vidhātuṃ madhupaśreṇīṃ vidadhe iti paryyavasitor'thaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3151: vidadha ityādau tava bhrūlatā madhupaśreṇī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3155: yaireṣāpi durāśayā kaliyuge rājāvalī sevitā teṣāṃ śūlini bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam” //
GK16visa10cu:3162: atra kaliyuge yairdurāśayā eṣā rājāvalī nṛpaśreṇī sevitā bhaktimātrasulabhe śūlini teṣāṃ sevā kiyat kauśalam /
GK16visa10cu:3184: atra ca keṣāñcidrūpakāṇāṃ śabdaśleṣamūlatve 'pi rūpakaviśeṣatvādarthālaṅkāramavye gaṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:3187: (lo, au) nanu padmodayetyādau paramparitādeḥ śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvātkathaṃ vār'thālaṅkāramadhye gaṇanamityata āha---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:3197: ime netre rātrindivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe sukhataraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3205: evamuttaratra sudhādhārāyā ādhāro 'dharaścirakālasthameva pariṇataṃ pakkaṃ bimbam /
GK16visa10cu:3209: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:3213: (lo, a) adhikārūḍhaṃ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ viśeṣa ārthādāropyamāṇādāropaviṣayasya yatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3214: avagāhe sukhatara ityatra lavaṇedadhirmakarataraṅgalavaṇādisadbhāvādavagāhakānāṃ sukhāvaho na bhavatītyāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3218: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:3225: tatkāryyasya śarīraśobhākaraṇasya madanoddīpanasya ca prastutvena kenacid anusandhīyamānatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3231: ityādivad atiśayoktireva bhavituṃ yukteti māmakaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3252: rūpake vidyamānāyā api tādātmyapratīterna paryyantaṃ gantumākāṅkṣā ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3253: pariṇāmālaṅkārasya tathābhūto rūpyamāṇo vidyate yad etaddviprakāraṃ pariṇāmaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GK16visa10cu:3258: natu sato dharmiṇo vai pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3274: atrā'śleṣe āropyamāṇaḥ paṇo vāstavaśleṣatayaiva pariṇataḥ anuṣṭhīyamānadyūtopayogī /
GK16visa10cu:3283: iha tūpāyanoderviṣayeṇa tādātmyaṃ prakṛte ca nāyakasaṃbhāvanādāvupayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3288: (vi, na) rūpake āropyamāṇasyānuṣṭhīyamānārthopayogo nāstīti darśayati---rūpake iti /
GK16visa10cu:3296: upāyanena sambhāvanasya paṇena dyūtasya ca nirvāhāt /
GK16visa10cu:3309: tādātmyaṃ tatra niveśaḥ smitādeḥ upāyanatvamasti tadviśeṣakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3318: (vi, pa) dāse kṛtāgasītyādiślokīyarūpake tu pariṇāmāprasaktiṃ darśayati---dāse iti /
GK16visa10cu:3319: nanvatra kathaṃ rūpakamevetyuktaṃ sūkṣmāgratvena kaṭhoratvena ca pulakāṅkurāṇāṃ kaṇṭakabhedasya vāstavatvādevetyāha---āropyamāṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:3321: atra yadyapi pulakasya kaṇṭakāropaviṣayatvameva kaṇṭakatvenāropyamāṇatvaṃ yathāpi pādabhedakāryyakatve 'nāropyamāṇasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3322: tathāca tatkāryyanirvāhakatvaṃ yatastasyāropyamāṇamatastasya kaṇṭakatvamapi na vāstavam /
GK16visa10cu:3331: ityatrāpi gurudakṣiṇāyāḥ suratinaipuṇyena pariṇāmāt pariṇaāmālaṅkāra eveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:3341: yatra himālaye auṣadhaya eva rajanyāṃ vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ suratapradīpā bhavanti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3357: pratibhayā utthito 'nyasyāprastutārthakoṭeḥ prastute vastuni yaḥ saṃśayaḥ sa sandehālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3364: evaṃca saṃśaya ityetāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryāpte prakṛte anyasyeti vacanaṃ “madhyaṃ tava ” ityādi vṛttyudāhariṣyamāṇavyavacchedārtham /
GK16visa10cu:3368: evañca kavivarṇitasyāpi “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” iti saṃśayasya nālaṅkāratā /
GK16visa10cu:3372: yatra saṃśaya eva paryavasānaṃ sa śuddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3374: “kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabhahodbhinnā navā vallarī velāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3375: udrāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3379: iyaṃ nāyikā kiṃ lāvaṇyataroḥ navā vallarī /
GK16visa10cu:3381: kīdṛśī rasabharodbhinnā śṛṅgararasa eva rasojalaṃ tenodbhinno jalasekena latodbhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:3382: kiṃvā velayā nīreṇa procchalitasya ucchalitasya lāvaṇyarūpasya vārāṃnidheḥ samudrasyalaharikā taraṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3384: kiṃ vā śṛṅgāriṇo devasya kandarpasya arthāt śṛṅgārārthamuddamotkalikānatāṃ gāḍhotkaṇṭhāvatāṃ janānāṃ sthāne upadeśasya arthāt śṛṅgāropadeśsya sākṣād vaṣṭiṇalambanabhūtā yaṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3386: devasya kīdṛśasya svasamayasya vasantasya upanyāsena viśrammiṇo viśvastasya mamedānīmupadeśo yogya ityaveṃ viśvāsavata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3399: tathāhi---yasyāḥ kasyā api vidyāyā upadeṣṭāraḥ capalacittanivāraṇāya tāḍanārthaṃ yaṣṭimādadate iti lokaprasiddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3401: yatrādāvante ca saṃśaya eva madhye niścayaḥ sa niścayamadhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3403: “ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16visa10cu:3404: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti punaḥ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3416: ājau yuddhe tvāṃ samālokya pratibhaṭāḥ pratikūlavīrā ityevaṃ vitarkān vidadhati kurvānti /
GK16visa10cu:3428: yatrādau saṃśayo 'nte ca niścayaḥ sa niścayāntaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3439: kīdṛśaiḥ bakasahavāsināṃ parokṣaiḥ--bakā hi matsyaniścayārthaṃ dhyāyinastatsahavāsinastataḥ śikṣitadhyānāsteṣāmapi parokṣaiḥ apratyakṣaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3442: apratibhotthāpite tu “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” ityādisaṃśaye nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3452: asti nāstīti saṃdehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate” //
GK16visa10cu:3458: sandehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3459: tatrātiśayoktiḥ iti vakṣyamāṇāyāḥ pañcavidhāyā atiśayokterbhede 'pyabhedāroparūpaprabheda evātretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3469: bhrāntiścittadharmaviśeṣo vidyate yatra bhramaprakāre sa bhrāntimān ityanvarthanāmālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3472: “mugdhā dugdhadhiyā gavāṃ vidadhate kumbhānagho vallavāḥ karṇe kairavaśaṅkayā kuvalayaṃ kurvanti kāntā api /
GK16visa10cu:3473: karkandhūphasamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalāśaṅkayā sāndrā candramaso na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃ candrikā” //
GK16visa10cu:3479: candramasaḥ sāndrā candrikā kasya janasya cittavibhramaṃ na kurute ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3481: ballavāḥ gopāḥ mugdhā bhrāntāḥ santaḥ dugdhadhiyā gavāmadhaḥ kumbhān vidadhate dugdhamādātumityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3502: saṅge saiva tathaikā tribhuvanamapi tanmayaṃ virahe” //
GK16visa10cu:3510: na cātrāpi tribhuvane tatsādṛśyabhramāttadbhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3512: tathāca saṅgamād virahasyādhikyād vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ evāyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3513: evaṃ ca lobhādinā bhrame 'pi na bhrāntimān /
GK16visa10cu:3526: ekasyānekadhollekho yaḥ sa ullekha ucyate // VisSd_10.37 //
GK16visa10cu:3537: “priya iti gopavadhūbhiḥ śiśuriti vṛddhairadhīśa iti devaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3546: “āpo hi nārāḥ” tadayanaḥ tatstho nārāyaṇaḥ jalaśāyī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3548: atraikasyāpi bhagavatastattadguṇayogādanekadhollekhe gopavadhūprabhṛtīnāṃ rucyādayo yathāyogaṃ prayojakāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3559: tathāca tādṛśarucimanto grahītāro bhinnā iti darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:3567: ekasminnarthe anusandhānena manoniveśena sādhita ābhāsaḥ jñānaṃ buddhirapi yathārucyādi---bhedāt bhidyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3576: evaṃ ca priya ityādau bhagavataḥ priyatve gopavadhūnāṃ rucyāditritayamapi prayojakam /
GK16visa10cu:3580: atra bhagavataḥ priyatvādīnāṃ vāstavatvād grahītṛbhedācca na mālārūpakam,
GK16visa10cu:3584: na ceha bhagavati gopavadhūprabhṛtibhiḥ priyatvādyadhyavasīyate priyatvāderbhagavati tatkāle tāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3587: (vi, ka) atra mālārūpakaprasāktiṃ nirasyati---atra bhagavata iti /
GK16visa10cu:3590: yadyapi vāstavatvena rūpakāprasaktau mālārūpakaprasaktirapi tata eva nirastā tathāpi grahītṛbhedapradarśanaṃ mālāpariṇāmaprasaktivāraṇasūcanārtham
GK16visa10cu:3600: kintu priyatvādyadhyavasīyate iti kvacit prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3601: sa cādhyavasīyata ityatra nirasyate ityevaṃ lakṣaṇayā samarthanīyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3605: (lo, i) bhagavatastatkāle tāttvikatvād grītṛbhedācceti hetordvayamapi mālārūpakabhrāntimatordvayorapi vivekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3609: grotṛbhedasya ca dvayorapi sambhave 'pi apavādatvena ullekhākhyabhinnālaṅkārasya na prayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3615: uktodāharaṇe ca śiśutvādīnāṃ niyamanābhiprāyātpriyatvādīnāṃ bhinnatvādhyavasāya ityatiśayoktirasti,
GK16visa10cu:3619: (vi, kha) alaṅkārāntarasaṅkarāt tadbhaṅgimūla eva niyamenāyamalaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ taddarśayati---keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:3625: tathāca yūni deve śiśubhinne 'pi niyamataḥ śiśvabhedāropād bhede 'pyabhedāropārūpātiśayoktirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:3626: atra ca niyamapradarśanaṃ teṣāṃ tathātvena bhāvanātiśayapradarśanārthameva,
GK16visa10cu:3630: tathā ca bhinnārthādhyavasāya ityatra bhinnatvavatyadhyavasāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3632: tathā ca asvāmini deve svāmitvāropa eva svāmyabhedāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3637: nanvevamatiśayoktisattve sa evātrāṅkāro 'stu nollekha ityata āha---tatsadbhaṇepīti /
GK16visa10cu:3647: “api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartate iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:3649: iha tu vātikānāṃ śrīkaṇṭhajanapadavarṇane bhrāntikṛta evāmbaravivarādyāropa iti /
GK16visa10cu:3653: śrīkaṇṭhanāmā rājaviśeṣaḥ tasya nagaraṃ śaraṇāgataiḥ śatruto bhītaiḥ vajrapañjaramityabodhītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3667: āropādhikaraṇasya praṅnirdeśe rūpakaṃ yathā---ayaṃ candra ityatra /
GK16visa10cu:3673: tatra mūlakatvapradarśanaṃ ca tatpūrvake pariṇāmālaṅkāre tathātvābhāvapradarśanāya /
GK16visa10cu:3678: lakṣyamāṇo jñāyamāno ya āropasya guṇo dharma āropādhikaraṇasya tadyogenetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3680: gaurvāhīka ityādau gauṇīlakṣaṇāsthale tu lakṣaṇayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3682: saṃpratipattiryatra śabde prayoktṛpratipatroḥ sa śabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3689: ayamarthaḥ--bhagavataḥ śiśutvādibhedeṣu satsvapi gopavadhūbhiḥ priya ityevāyaṃ gṛhyate na śiśuriti /
GK16visa10cu:3690: yathā priyatvādau satyapi vṛddhaiḥ śiśurityeva gṛhyate /
GK16visa10cu:3692: yadi tvayaṃ pratyetṛbhedena bhede 'tiśayoktisadbhāva eva syāttadātiśayoktiprakāraviśeṣa eva syāt naca tathā,
GK16visa10cu:3704: mugdhā dugdhadhiyetyādau mithyājñānasya kavipratibhāhṛtatvena kavinā ballavādiniṣṭhatvena satyatvenopanibaddhatvād rūpakādītyādiśabdenāpahnutyādisaṃgrahaḥ
GK16visa10cu:3707: tathāpi kathaṃ tatrāropasya bhedapratītipuraḥ saratvamityatrācāryyasammatiṃ śārīramīmāṃsābhāṣyaṃ śrīmadācāryyaśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:3708: paraśabdo 'gnirmāṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādiśabdaḥ paratra māṇavakādau tanmate lakṣyamāṇo guṇastekṣṇayapiṅgalādiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3713: bhrāntikṛta eva prācyānāṃ mate bhrāntikṛtatvābhāve punā rūpakamasti iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3714: atra bhrāntimato 'laṅkāratve 'pi nālaṅkārāntaravicchittimūlatvaṃ hīyata iti prakṛte na kācit kṣatiḥ /
