GK16visa10cu:3716: atraiva ca “capovanamiti munibhiḥ kāmāyatanamiti veśyābhiḥ” ityādau pariṇāmālaṅkārayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3719: śrīkaṇṭhajanapade tapovanatvādyāropasya munyādeḥ prakṛte tapaḥ prabhṛtāvupayogāt /
GK16visa10cu:3721: munyādīnāṃ tu tapovanādibhinnarūpasya tadrūpatāpratīteriha bhrāntimāniti ye /
GK16visa10cu:3722: apyāhuḥ teṣāmayamāśayaḥ--- śrīkaṇṭhajanapade ekadeśasya tapovanāditvepyavayavāvayavinorabhedātsamudāyasya tathātvapratītiriha na tāttvikīti na pariṇām iti /
GK16visa10cu:3724: vicchittiviśeṣasya sambhavāt tatprayojitasya ullekhālaṅkārasyāpalāpo na śakyakriya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3734: naca tapovanatvasya kathaṃ tatra vāstavatvamiti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3742: arjuno yaśasi-” ityādiṣu cāsya rūpakādvivikto viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:3761: naca durgālaṅghitavigraha ityādivadupamādhvanirayamiti vācyam tatra viśeṣyasya śliṣṭomāvallabhapadasyevātra
GK16visa10cu:3764: (lo, ū) evaṃ grītṛbhede udāhṛtya viṣayabhede udāharati---gambhīryyeṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:3788: naca niṣidhyeti katvānirdeśādapahnavapūrvakatvameva labhyate kathaṃ dvaividhyamiti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3794: nāyaṃ śaśī kuṇḍalitaḥ phaṇīndro nāsau kalaṅkaḥ śayito murāriḥ” //

GK16visa10cu:4272: darśayitvā phalotprekṣāṃ hetūtprekṣāñca dravyaṃ vihāya jātyāditriṣu darśayituṃ kriyāgāminīṃ

GK16visa10cu:4306: ” atra nityāyā api sukhatvajāterduḥ khe āropyatvarūpavāñchāyāḥ phalamutprekṣitam /
GK16visa10cu:4310: '; ityādiṣu dravoyatprekṣāyā api hetugāmitvaṃ sambhavati tathāpi viralatvād vaicitryaviśeṣānāvahatvācca tadasambhavo darśitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4314: yadvā nūpumaunitvahetuścaladdravyasaṃyogābhāva evaṃduḥ khatādātmyena adhyavasitaḥ tatra ca pakṣe 'tiśayoktivad viṣayasya gamyamānatā etaccāgre sphuṭībhaviṣyati /

GK16visa10cu:4325: teṣu catvāriṃśatsaṃkhyākeṣu bhedeṣu madhye ye svarūpagāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhedāste utprekṣānimittasyopādānānupādānābhyāṃ dvātriṃśadbhedā iti militvā ṣaṭpañcāśadbhedā vācyotprekṣāyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4326: tatra nimittasyopādānaṃ yathā pūrvodāhṛte “snātīva” ityutprekṣāyaṃ nimittaṃ pātakitvamupāttam /

GK16visa10cu:4333: ye svarūpagāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhedāḥ jātigāminyo jātyā catastro,
GK16visa10cu:4339: naca nimittānu pādāne kathaṃ taddvaividhyaghaṭitaṃ ṣoḍaśatvam aṣṭatvasyaivaucityāditi vācyam /

GK16visa10cu:4377: tathā hi, “tatvaṅgyāḥ“ityādau hārāya sthānādānaṃ lajjotprekṣāyā hetuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4378: tadanupādāne tu lajjāhetvadarśanāllajjotprekṣā pramātrā boddhā niścetumaśakyaivetyarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4425: anuktau yathā mama prabhāvatyāma--“pradyumnaḥ--iva hi samprati digantaramācchādayatā timirapaṭalena--
GK16visa10cu:4440: atra tamaso lepanasya vyāpanarūpo viṣayo nopāttaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4442: anayorutprekṣānimittaṃ ca tamaso 'tibahulatvaṃ dhārārūpeṇādhaḥ saṃyogaśca yathāsaṃkhyam /
GK16visa10cu:4443: kecittu--“alapanakartṛbhaūtamapi tamo lepanakartṛtvenotprekṣitaṃ vyāpanaṃ ca nimittam,
GK16visa10cu:4459: saṃyogaviśeṣasyeva hi vyāptināmnāretiśayasthāganasāmyena rūpasambhāvanā utprekṣābhedaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:4461: sa ca yadi svarūpotprekṣāyāmeva syāttadā ko doṣa ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:4465: “varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ” ityatra ca dhārārūpeṇādhaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4473: tathā hi atiśayoktau kamalamanambhasītyādāvivātra viṣayanimittayordvayorapyatra gamyamānatvameva /

GK16visa10cu:4489: hutapāvakadhūmakaluṣākṣyāḥ sudṛśo 'ṅge mānamavakāśamaprāpya lāvaṇyavāripūra iva aśrucchalena vigalatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4502: atra guṇavattve śleṣaḥ kambugrīvādhivāsādiveti hetūtprekṣāyā hetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4507: āvaraṇayantritatvena saṃkaṭād duḥ khadrāyakāt śuktimādhyād vinirgato muktotkaraḥ sārasākṣyā asyā kamanīyakambugrīvādhivāsād guṇaṃvattvaṃ tantamattvameva,
GK16visa10cu:4511: atra tantorvāstavatvānna tatprāptihetūtprekṣā sambhavatītyato guṇapadaśleṣāj jyotirviśeṣaprāptihetūtprekṣā ityataḥ śleṣanirvāhyā iyamutprekṣā
GK16visa10cu:4519: (lo, u) jānīmahe iti manye ityādayo 'pyutprekṣāvācakā jñeyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4521: tatra kiṃśabdasya prayoge yathā gopīnāthasya gaṅgāvarṇana---
GK16visa10cu:4523: vikrīya kaivalyamamuṣya mūlyaṃ varāṭasaṃkhyāṃ kimiyaṃ karoti” //
GK16visa10cu:4529: paryavasāne tu jaladhitīre śaivālasthiteḥ sambhāvanānupapattau sambhāvanotthāpanamityutprekṣā /
GK16visa10cu:4534: pārejalamiti---murāriḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ nīranidheḥ samudrasya pārejalaṃ jalasya pāre kūle vanāvalīrapaśyat /
GK16visa10cu:4543: ityanenaivopamāparyavasānasambhave utkūlatvakathanamanupayuktamata utkūlitaśaivalābhā iveti paryavasāne utprekṣetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4555: evaṃ virahavarṇane--“keyūrāyitamaṅgadaiḥ--” ityatra “vikāsinīlotpalatisma karṇe mṛgāyatākṣyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣaḥ” ityādau ca jñeyam /
GK16visa10cu:4569: bhrāntimadalaṅkāre “mugghā dugdhadhiyā--” ityādau bhrāntānāṃ ballavādīnāṃ viṣayasya candrikāderjñānameva nāsti,
GK16visa10cu:4574: (vi, ña) bhrāntimadalaṅkāre niścayo 'tra tu utkaṭakoṭikaḥ saṃśaya iti bhedasambhave 'pi bhedakāntaramāha---bhrāntimadalaṅkāra iti /
GK16visa10cu:4578: nanu, “na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃcandrikā” ityuktitaścandrikātvena jñānamastītyata āha---tadupanibandhasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:4580: tathā ca kavyuktyā śrotṝṇāṃ ballavādīnāṃ na candrikātvena jñānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4596: (vi, ṭa) tarhi sandehālaṅkārābheda ityata āha---sandeha iti /
GK16visa10cu:4601: ityatra kalāpabhramānantarameva keśatvaviśeṣadarśanāt kalāpe'satyatā pratipādyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4604: vastutastu yonibahirbhāvarūpaprasavabādhasyeva nāyikāśirasi kalāpabhādhasyāpi sattve evāhāryatadubhayabuddhisattvenobhayatra sāmyameva /
GK16visa10cu:4607: “kathamupari” ityatra hi kalāpasyāhāryaniścaya eva kathaṃpadabodhyaḥ sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4612: “rañjitā nu vividhāstaruśalā nāmitaṃ nu gaganaṃ sthagitaṃ nu /
GK16visa10cu:4613: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhastimireṇa” //
GK16visa10cu:4616: (vi, ṭha) utprekṣālaṅkārasyaiva viṣaye kvacicchloke sandehālaṅkāraṃ kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4625: ityatra yattarvādau timirākrāntatā rañjanādirūpeṇa saṃdihyata iti saṃdehālaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4627: iha tu tarvādivyāpteḥ pratisaṃbandhibhedo vyāpanādernigaraṇena rañjanādeḥ sphuraṇaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:4628: anye tu--“anekatvanirdhāraṇarūpavicchittyāśrayatvenaikakoṭyadhike 'pi bhinno 'yaṃ saṃdehaprakāraḥ” iti vadanti sma;
GK16visa10cu:4630: tasyāścātra sphuṭatayā sadbhāvāt nuśabdena cevaśabdavattasyādyotanādutprekṣaiveyaṃ bhavituṃ yuktā,
GK16visa10cu:4639: nanu prativiśeṣyaṃ sandehā eva bahavaḥ syurityatra utprekṣāprāpakahetuviśeṣaścāstītyāha---vyāpanāderiti /
GK16visa10cu:4668: “yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ vitanute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā /
GK16visa10cu:4676: jaladalavasya jaladakhaṇḍasya jaladakhaṇḍasya sādṛśyarūpāṃ līlāṃ vitanute tad vastu,
GK16visa10cu:4679: māṃ prati tu na tathācaṣṭe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4682: tvayā vandīkṛtānāmarīṇāṃ viraheṇākrāntānāṃ tadīyataruṇīnāṃ kaṭākṣolkāpātairjāto yo vraṇastasya kiṇo vraṇasthāne prakaṭabhāgaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4711: viṣayiṇo 'bhedapratipattirarthād viṣaye adhyavasāya iha vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4715: tadapyavispaṣṭārthamato viśeṣārthakaṃ śabdaṃ vinā vyañjanayaiva viṣayaniṣedhabuddhiradhaḥ karaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:4730: (vi, tha) siddhatva ityasya vyāvṛttiṃ darśayati---tasya ceti /
GK16visa10cu:4733: utprekṣāvāraṇaṃ niścayatvavivakṣayaiva na tu nigaraṇapūrvakatvavivakṣayeti darśayati---viṣayanigaraṇaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:4735: utprekṣāyāṃ ca viṣayatāvacchedakakoṭeḥ kvacidanuktivaśāt kvaciccoktāyā api anutkaṭatvaśānniṣedhavyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:4737: ” ityatra garbhabahirbhāvarūpaprasavakoṭyā utkaṭāyā anutkaṭāyā guṇānubandhakoṭyā uktāyā eva niṣedhavyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:4739: atiśayoktiviśeṣe 'pi na tadasambhava ityata āha---ihāpi mukhaṃ dvitīyaḥ ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:4742: dvitīyapadābhāve tu nedṛśaī niṣedhapratītiriti tatra rūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:4750: (vi, da) yadāhuriti---anigīrṇasyopāttasya nigīrṇasyānupāttasya adhaḥ-- karaṇaṃ tu vivṛtameva /
GK16visa10cu:4766: kuvalayayugalaṃ tato vilolaṃ tilakusumaṃ tadadhaḥ pravālamasmāt” //
GK16visa10cu:4810: “asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svaya nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4811: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:4821: asyā nirmāṇavidhau prajāpatrirnirmātā candraḥ yato 'sau kāntipradaḥ kāntimattvenaiva tasya kāntipradatvaṃ sambhāvyoktam /
GK16visa10cu:4839: indumaṇḍale indīvarasya sambandha eva syādityevaṃ sambandhasambhāvanā /
GK16visa10cu:4843: iha yadyapi candramaṇḍalasyendīvaradvayena sambandho na sambhavati tathāpi kavinā nibaddhasya vā sambhāvanārūpeṇāsāvastītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4844: etena “yadyarthoktau ca kalpana” miti kaiścidukto 'tiśayokterbheda udāhṛtaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:4853: naceha tasyā mukhaṃ candra itivadāropamūlaṃ rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:4855: atra hī madanasya udyamaṃ vināpi kokilarutamātreṇa jagadvaśamāsīdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4858: “iyaṃ kāntā yuvajanamanaso vaśīkaraṇa” mityādau ca hetvalaṅkāro vakṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:4859: sa tasyā evāsambandhe sambandharūpeṇa bhedena saṅgṛhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4860: atra śuddhodāharaṇaṃ virahavarṇane---“dāho 'mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocita'; ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:4861: atra dāhādīnām ambhaḥ prasṛtipākādyaiḥ asambandhe 'pi sambandhaḥ siddhatvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4882: tena siṃhāsanaṃ pitryaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca kahīkṣitām” //
GK16visa10cu:4900: ityatra tatraiva tadbhedārope bhedaghaṭitaviṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāvādavyāptiriti keṣāñciduktiṃ darśayati---keśapāśādigata iti /
GK16visa10cu:4909: tathā ca bhinnatvenādhyavasāyādāropaviṣaye 'bhede tadbhinnasya bhedasyāropād bhedaghaṭīto viṣayaviṣayibhāvo 'trāpyastīti sādhitam /
GK16visa10cu:4911: atraivotprekṣāsambhavād bhedaghaṭitāropaḥ tvanmate 'pītyāha---tathā hīti---atiśayoktito vāyavṛttidarśanāya sādhyatvapradarśanam “prāgeva hariṇākṣīṇām';
GK16visa10cu:4919: iha cānyādiśabdākhyaṃ lāvāṇyādeḥ kimapi pratinidhivastvantaraṃ nāsti /
GK16visa10cu:4923: padārthānāṃ prastutānāmanyeṣāṃ vā yadā bhavet // VisSd_10.47 //
GK16visa10cu:4952: suciraṃ śayitaṃ tena samayena tādṛśarātrirūpeṇa pratibodhitaṃ jāgaritaṃ smaram anulepanādayo abodhiṣata krīḍārthaṃ bodhayāmāsurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4954: tamasaḥ kāmoddīpakatvāt tasmin prastute tatkālīnānāmanyeṣāmuddīpakānāmanulepanādīnāmapi prastutatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4962: taddraṣṭuḥ kasya janasya citte mālatyādīnāṃ kaṭhoratā na bhāsate /
GK16visa10cu:4972: (vi, ṣa) prakṛtānāmekaguṇasambandho 'prakṛtānāmevakriyāsambandhaścānudāhṛta evaślokena udāhriyate---evaṃ dānaṃ vittāditi /
GK16visa10cu:4981: iha ca tulyayogitāyāṃ “hasaścandra ivābhātī'tyādivad dvayoḥ prakṛtatve 'pyupamānopameyabhāvo vaivakṣikaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4992: iha ca dvayoḥ prakṛtāprakṛtatvādivādyabhāvādaupamyasya gamyatvaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:5001: pūrvavaddhiraṇyakaśipurūpapūrvajanmavat jigīṣuṇā śiśupālenāpi jagad bādhyata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5005: atra prastutāyāḥ suniścalāyāḥ prakṛteraprastutāyāśca yoṣita ekānugamanakriyāsambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5006: “dūraṃ samāgatavati tvayi jīvanāthe bhinnā manobhavaśareṇa tapasvinī sā /
GK16visa10cu:5007: uttiṣṭhati svapiti vāsagṛha tvadīya- māyāti yāti hasati śvasiti kṣaṇena” //
GK16visa10cu:5013: tapasvinī duḥ khānvitā sā tava priyā vāsagṛhagamanaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:5018: atra ca guṇakriyayorādimadhyāvasānasadbhāvena traividhyaṃ na lakṣitam,
GK16visa10cu:5025: “rahei mihireṇa ṇahaṃ raseṇa kavviṃ sareṇa jovvaṇaaṃ /
GK16visa10cu:5031: eko 'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak /
GK16visa10cu:5037: tayoreko 'pi sāmānyo dharmaḥ pṛthakśabdabhedena yatrālaṅkāre nirdiśyate sā prativastūpametyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5039: bodhyatā ca kvacicchabdadvayena śaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ kvaciccopameyagatasya śabdaśaktyā dhramāntare tadvaidharmyeṇa vyañjanayā /
GK16visa10cu:5043: evaṃ ca pratinirdiṣṭena vākyārthena vākyārthasya upamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanena vākyārthasyopamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanvarthā pratīvastūpamā /
GK16visa10cu:5045: pṛthak paryyāyādinā nirdiśyate pratipādyate paunaruktyanirāsāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5051: itaḥ stutiḥ kā khalu candrikāyā yadabdhimapyuttaralīkaroti” //
GK16visa10cu:5052: atra samākarṣaṇamuttaralīkaraṇaṃ ca kriyaikaiva paunaruktyanirāsāya bhinnavācakatayā nirdiṣṭā /
GK16visa10cu:5058: atra damayantī upameyā candrikā upamānaṃ tayordhorākarṣaṇameko dharmaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5068: “vimala eva ravirviśadaḥ śaśī prakṛtiśobhana eva hi darṇaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5069: śivagiriḥ śivahāsasahodaraḥ sahajasundara eva hi sajjanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:5087: (vi, ṅa) vaidharmyeṇa yatheti---upameye nirdiṣṭadharmaviparītād dharmyantare nirdiṣṭāddharmād vyañjanayā labhyenopamānaniṣṭhasādharmyeṇa ityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:5091: atra svakarmacāturyasya upameyāsu cakorīṣu nirdiṣṭasya viparīto dharmaḥ avantīyastrībhinnastrīṣu
GK16visa10cu:5092: nirdiṣṭo ratyanaipuṇyarūpaḥ tato vyañjanayā upamāneṣu avantīstrīṣu svakarmacāturyyaṃ
GK16visa10cu:5105: pratibimbanamubhayatra nirdiṣṭābhyāṃ parasparasamānābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmekasya tasya vyañjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5106: sadharmaḥ prasiddha evaṃ vivakṣita ityaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5107: prativastūpamāyāṃ tūpameyanirdiṣṭo dharmo vācya eva upamānanirdiṣṭaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā kvacicchaktyā vā sa bodhya iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5119: atra karṇe madhudhārāvamananetrahāraṇe dharmai bhinnau prītijanakatayā parasparasamānau /
GK16visa10cu:5132: upameyopamānagatābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ svasvapriyadarśane svārthaprāptitvameko dharmaḥ vyajyate /
GK16visa10cu:5133: naca vaidharmyavyaṅgyaprativastūpamāto 'syā ko bheda iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:5135: atra tūpamānaniṣṭhaṃ tathā ca tatra vaidharmyeṇaiva vyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:5136: atra tu ubhayaniṣṭhābhyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ vyañjaneti bhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:5142: (vi, jha) yatra tu samānadharmapratipādakaśabdābhyāmeko dharmo vyañjanāṃ vinaiva pratipādyate tatra pratibimbābhāvāt prativastūpamaiveti /
GK16visa10cu:5147: atra “manaḥ kuto naḥ” ityasya “kāṅkṣati vallimanyām” ityasya caikarūpatayaiva varyavasānātprativastūpamaiva /
GK16visa10cu:5148: iha tu karṇe madhudhārāvamanasya netraharaṇasya ca sāmyameva,
GK16visa10cu:5154: atra hi paranāyikā upameyā anyā bahvyaśca upamānāni tāsāṃ manoviṣayatvākāṅkṣāviṣayatvayorhetupraśraikadharmaviṣayatayā ekatvāroparūpaparyyavasānam
GK16visa10cu:5160: ityasya paryyavasāne nānyāṃ kāntāṃ kāṅkṣāmi ityetadarthatvād iha dṛṣṭānte tu punaḥ bimbapratibimbabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5190: “ko 'tra bhūmivalaye janān mudhā tāpayan sucirameti sampadam /
GK16visa10cu:5195: atra būmivalaye mudhā nirarthakaṃ janāṃstāpayan kaḥ suciraṃ sampadameti /
GK16visa10cu:5197: vedayan jñāpayan dinena caramācalaṃ tato nabhomadhyādāsasādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5207: atra karttṛtvānvayo janakatvānvayaḥ svastigamanena tādṛśavadasyānumitirūpasya janakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5211: paratāpino raverastagamanavadanyeṣāmapi paratāpināṃ vipatprāptirityevaṃ hi tat /
GK16visa10cu:5214: sa ca raverastācalagamanasya paritāpināṃ vipatprāpteśca bimbapratibimbabhāvaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visa10cu:5219: atrānyasya dharmaṃ kathamanyo vahatviti kaṭākṣavikṣepādīnāṃ kuvalayamālādigatalalitādīnāṃ
GK16visa10cu:5225: asyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣavikṣepaḥ kuvalayamālāyā lalitaṃ vinyāsaṃ kalayati tadhāti /
GK16visa10cu:5227: kaṭākṣavikṣepādīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ lalitādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ dharmatayā dharmiṇorapyatra prativimbānubimbaṃ darśayati;
GK16visa10cu:5245: tava prayāṇe yātrāyāṃ satyāṃ vairimṛgīdṛśāṃ padbhyāṃ rājahaṃsagatirmuktā drutapalāyamānatvāt . ānanena ca śaśidyutirmuktā mlānatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5252: (lo, ā) kalpyata ityataḥ pūrvaṃ prathamamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5257: “idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapustapaḥ klapaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /
GK16visa10cu:5261: (vi, tha) idaṃ kileti---āśrame tapasyocitaveśāṃ śakuntalāṃ dṛṣṭvā duṣmantasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:5263: manoharamidaṃ vapuryo munistapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitum icchati dhruvaṃ niścitaṃ sa munirnolotpalapatradhārayā komalayā kaṭhināṃ śamīlatāṃ chettuṃ vyavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5276: (lo, i) idaṃ vapuḥ tapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitumicchati yo 'nena śakuntalāyā vapuṣā tapo nirvāhayitumicchatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5289: “munestatra manobhede durlabhe surakāṅkṣite kaṭākṣā evameṇākṣyāḥ prayayuḥ smarabāṇatām /
GK16visa10cu:5296: atra bhavabhogalobhena janmano vyarthatānayanaṃ kācamūlyena cintāmaṇivikraya iveti paryavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5341: evaṃ “so 'pi tvadānanarucaṃ vijahati candraḥ” ityatra “prayāṇe tava rājendra” ityudāharaṇavannidarśanaiva,
GK16visa10cu:5344: evaṃ “sambhavan vastusambandha upamāparikalpakaḥ nidarśane“ti lakṣaṇe copamāśabdaḥ sādṛśyamātrārtho na tūpamālaṅkārārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5354: he puruṣa / tvaṃ bhogavitāne bhogasamūhe ceto vidadhad vṛṣadaṃśakasya mārjārasya mukhe śukaṃ kṣipasi /
GK16visa10cu:5355: yathā mārjāraḥ śukaṃ hinasti tathā bhogavitāno 'pi narakapātena hiṃsiṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5356: ataḥ śukasya tatra kṣepa iva bhoge cetovidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5375: ” iti śloke 'smākaṃ stanamaṇḍale sutarāṃ luṭhanamucitamityeva hi paryavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5392: upameyasyopamānādādhikyaṃ nyūnatāthavā varṇyate sa vyatirekālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5395: kvacittu eka utke 'nukte hetau punaḥ tridheti kārikā /
GK16visa10cu:5413: pratyekaṃ samudāyena vānuktau trividha iti catuvidhe 'pyasminnupamānopameyatvasya nivedanaṃ śabdena arthena ākṣepeṇa ceti dvādaśaprakāro 'pi
GK16visa10cu:5415: upamānānnyūnatāyāmapyanayaiva bhaṅgyā caturviṃśatiprakārateti militvā aṣṭacatvāriṃśatprakāro vyatirekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5432: tad dvādaśakasya śleṣāśleṣayoḥ sambhavaṃ kārikoktādapiśabdād darśayati---śleṣe 'pīti /
GK16visa10cu:5440: kalaṅkī vidhuryathā tasyā mukhaṃ tathā na,
GK16visa10cu:5480: tatra hetudvayasya pratyekaṃ samudāyānupādāne śābdaupamye yathā---“candramukhyāḥ kuraṅgākṣyā nābjavad bhaṅgurā guṇā';
GK16visa10cu:5513: tenātra “upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ” iti keṣāṃcillakṣaṇe “viparyaye vetipadamanarthakam” iti yatkecidāhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5532: tathā cāsthairyasyāpakarṣakahetutvena upameyasya nyūnatvaṃ candrasyaivādhikyamiti mayā vāyakhyāyate,
GK16visa10cu:5541: nanūddeśyārthasyādhikyameva vivakṣitaṃ prakṛte ca māninyāṃ yauvanāsthairyyaṃ pradarśayitumuddeśyaṃ tadādhikyaṃ copameyādhikyamevetyata āha---astu veti /
GK16visa10cu:5552: “calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatī rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5553: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī” //
GK16visa10cu:5556: iti māghe copamānabhūtatayā madhukararajasoḥ kṛtipadavarapadābhyāmevādhikyasyoktatvāt kāvyaprakāśasya matamatrānupādeyameva /
GK16visa10cu:5558: (lo, ai) hanūmadādyairityādi damayantī prati devadūtasya nalasya vacanam /
GK16visa10cu:5559: dviṣāṃ hasairdūtatvaṃ parityajya svayaṃ nāyakatvapratigrahāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5561: sahārthasya balādekaṃ yatra syādvācakaṃ dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.54 //
GK16visa10cu:5580: naca bhedādhyavasāyasyaiva atiśayoktitvena sā kathaṃ tanmūleti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:5589: atra tṛtīyāntapadārthe 'dharadale prathamāntapadārthe priye ca rāgavānitipadam abhedena svārthabodhakam;
GK16visa10cu:5601: kiñcātrodāharaṇe abhedādhyavasāyo 'pi kāryyakāraṇaikakālīnatāsaṃpṛktaḥ adharadalasya rāgabhajanānantarameva priyasya ragadarśanāt;
GK16visa10cu:5604: yaduktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ--“eko 'pi dharma āropamāśritya sahārthabalādanyadharmaṇyapi sambaddhaścettadā sahoktiriti,
GK16visa10cu:5630: agamat saha tailabindunā nanu dīpārciriva kṣitestalam” //
GK16visa10cu:5634: gurusammohaviluptacetanā sā indumatī narādhipena ajena samameva kṣitestalaṃ pṛṣṭham agamat /
GK16visa10cu:5636: atra narādhipo 'pi kṣitestalamagamaditi sahārthasya samaṃ padabalād bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5646: evaṃ ca yadyapi śobhanatva eva paryavasānaṃ tathāpyaśobhanatvābhāvamukhena śobhanavacanasyāyamabhiprāyo yatkasyacidvarṇanīyasyāśobhanatvaṃ tatparasannidhereva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5656: (lo, a) śobhana eva paryavasānam “abhāvasya tu yo 'bhāvo bhāva evāvaśiṣyate';
GK16visa10cu:5666: atra jaladakālādeva candro malino grīṣmarttau ca vanarājiramañjuriti pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5674: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā” //
GK16visa10cu:5683: “nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yayā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
GK16visa10cu:5684: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva dṛṣṭā vinidrā nalinī na yena” //
GK16visa10cu:5690: evaṃ sahoktirapi sahaśabdaprayogābhāve 'pi sahārthavivakṣāyāṃ bhavatīti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5703: kāntayā śūnyamālokya kasya ceto na dūyate” //
GK16visa10cu:5711: anyasya aprastutasya vastuno vyavahārasya arthād vyaṅgyasya prastute vastuni samāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5712: tad vyañjanaṃ ca samaiḥ prastutāprastutasamānaiḥ kāryaliṅgaviśeṣaṇairityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5715: samaistulyairvyavahārasya kṛtasya na tu rūpakavat svātmanaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5729: yathā vā mama---“ullāsya lāsyanilayaṃ vipuloruyugmaṃ protkṣipya bāhulatikāmatikāntagātryaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5730: yaṃ sābhilāṣamanasaḥ pramadā bhajante puṇyātmane śiśirapāvana te namo 'stu //
GK16visa10cu:5733: (lo, ṛ) vyādhūyetyatra gandhavāhe haṭhakāmukavyavahārasamārope liṅgasāmyasyāpi prayojakatve vasanavyādhūnanādikāryasāmyaprādhānyādanyodāharaṇam
GK16visa10cu:5735: kāryyaliṅgaviśeṣaṇānāṃ kvacid dvayoḥ kvacitttrayāṇāṃ vā samāveśe 'pi bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5739: anākramya jagatkṛtsnaṃ no sandhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:5770: jaraṭhalavalīpāṇḍucchāyo bhṛśaṃ kaluṣāntaraḥ śrayati haritaṃ hanta /
GK16visa10cu:5778: aindrīṃ diśaṃ dinakarakaraspṛṣṭāṃ puraḥ sammukhe nirīkṣya jaraṭhasya kaṭhinasya lavalīphalasyeva
GK16visa10cu:5779: pāṇḍucchāyaḥ san tuhinadyutiḥ kaluṣāntaraḥ kalaṅkamalināntaraḥ prāyetasīṃ pratīcīṃ haritaṃ śrayati /
GK16visa10cu:5780: lavalīphalasya paktatve sati kāṭhinyaṃ pāṇḍuratvaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:5787: svākrāntāṃ diśaṃ virodhinā'krāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khena pāṇḍuraḥsan digantaramāśrayatīti vākyārthabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5789: tathā hi---svanāyikāṃ smeramukhīm anurāgeṇa galitāṅgāvaraṇāṃ kareṇa spṛśantaṃ paranāyakaṃ
GK16visa10cu:5790: dṛṣṭvā duḥ khāt pāṇḍuracchāyo nāyakastāṃ tyaktvā nāyikāntaramāśrayatītyevaṃ vyavahārasya
GK16visa10cu:5800: atraiva hi “timirāvṛtim” ityatra “timirāśukam” iti pāṭhe etadeśasya rūpaṇe 'pi samāsoktireva,
GK16visa10cu:5802: tatra hi timirāṃśukayo rūpyarūpakabhāvo dvayorāvarakatvena sphuṭasādṛśyatayā parasācivyamanapekṣyāpi svamātraviśrānta iti na samāsoktibuddhiṃ vyāhantumīśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5806: parasya śabdārthasya vā ropaṇasya sācivyaṃ sāhāyyam /
GK16visa10cu:5809: yatra tu rūpyarūpakayoḥ sādṛśyamasphuṭaṃ tatraikadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ vinā tadasaṅgataṃ syādityaśābdamapyekadeśāntararūpaṇamārthamapekṣata eveti tatraikadeśavivartirūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:5817: na tu svasya sphuṭasādṛśyāttatraiva vācyarūpakāntarasya ākṣepatvena ekadeśavivarttirūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:5819: prakṛte tu aṃśukatimirayoḥ sphuṭasādṛśyādārtharūpakanirapekṣaḥ svato rūpyarūpakābhāva ityato naikadeśavivarttitetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5826: ragasaṃmuhī vi sahasā parammuhī hoi riuseṇā” //
GK16visa10cu:5839: raṇa eva antaḥ puraṃ tatra strīliṅgaśabdārthatvena maṇḍalāgralatayā rūpyamāṇanāyikāvyañjanāt /
GK16visa10cu:5841: tadbhraṣṭāyāṃ ripusenāyāmapi strīliṅgaśabdārthatvena rūpyamāṇa pratināyikā vyaṅgyā atra raṇe 'ntaḥ--purarūpaṇamekadeśavivartti /
GK16visa10cu:5843: (lo, ai) tarhi kaḥ punarekadeśavivarttirūpakasya viṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha---tatra tviti /
GK16visa10cu:5845: ityādau raṇāntaḥ purādikayo rūpyarūpakayorekadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ maṇḍalāgralatādiṣu rājanāyikātvādyāropaṃ vināsphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:5851: kvacicca yatra sphuṭasādṛśyānāmapi bahūnāṃ rūpaṇaṃ śābdamekadeśasya cārthaṃ tatraikadeśavivarti rūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:5858: tatra lāvaṇyamadhuno mādhuryasya upādeyatvaparyyavasannasya sādṛśyasya locanabhramarayośca cāñcalyarūpasādṛśyasya sphuṭatvādityata āha---yatreti
GK16visa10cu:5866: (vi, ta) nanu sphuṭasādṛśyādīnāṃ vahutve ekadeśavivarttitvamityatra kā yuktirityatra āha---rūpakapratīteriti /
GK16visa10cu:5867: vyāpitayā bahutvena tasyāśca bahutvavaśāt prathamotpannatvo samāsoktivirodhakatvam /
GK16visa10cu:5871: nanvasti raṇāntaḥ purayorapi sukhasaṃcāratayā sphuṭaṃ sādṛśyamiti cet?
GK16visa10cu:5883: nṛpadarśanād ripusenāparāṅmukhatvaṃ pratyarthatātparyyālocanena rājñaḥ śūratvasya tato raṇe 'bhītatvasya ca lābhena tata eva sukhasañcāralābha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5885: nahi mukhacandrayormanoharatvamiva rājño raṇe bhītatvabuddhiṃ vinā pratyakṣādinā sukhasañcāratvaṃ gamyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5886: atra raṇāntaḥ purayoriti sañcārālābhādityatra sañcāratvābhāvāditi kvacit prāmādika eva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5895: tatpakṣe ca nisargasiddhamukhasaurabheṇodbhrānto bhṛṅgo yasyāstādṛśī cāsau saṅgītaśālinī ceti samāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5897: vāsaraṃ gṛhaṃ tadadhīśe gṛhapatau udite ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5902: atra nisargetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyātsarojinyāṃ nāyikāvyavahārapratītau strīmātragāminaḥ smeratvadharmasya samāropaḥ kāraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:5935: anantaraṃ ca dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiścitetyādisamāsāntarāśrayeṇa samānaviśeṣaṇamahātmyāddhariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5939: atra dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīva ityādirītyā sarvatra puruṣavyāghrāditvādupamāsamāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5942: tathā hi---“upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti pāṇinyanuśāsanenasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge rūpakasamāsabādhād upamāsamāsasyaiva vyavasthāpanādityekaṃ bādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:5948: puṣpādibhinnaiḥ taiḥ suveṣapratītirna ghaṭate ityataḥ prathamaṃ dantaprabhādiviśeṣyake vyāghrādisamāsa evetyāha---upamāgarbhatveneti /
GK16visa10cu:5951: ayamarthaḥ---sakṛduccaritaiḥ śabdairasakṛcchaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ bodhāsambhavāddarśito 'yaṃ puṣpādiviśeṣyaka upamāsamāsārtho vyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa10cu:5953: suveṣatvopapattikatvaṃ ca samāsadvayatātparyagrāhakaṃ tena ca suveṣatvepapattau upapattimāha---samānaviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāditi /
GK16visa10cu:5959: taddhi nāyikāyāṃ mukhyaṃ natu latāyāmiti nāyikādharmiṇāmeva dantaprabhādīnāmupameyaprayojakaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:5962: anyathā dāse kṛtāgasītyādāvapi prācīnaprasiddhe 'pi rūpakasamāsaviṣaye upāttanāyikānuguṇyena pulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrairityatra upamāsamāsa eva syāt /
GK16visa10cu:5972: yatra viśeṣe tu na svīkāra ityagre vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5976: āsyasyaivātra pānamuktaṃ tasya cobhayathāpi pānāsambhava iti na vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:5987: suveṣatvasya nijadharmeṇāsambhavāttatsattve kramaśaḥ samāsadvayenaivopapattirdarśitetyatastatra na rūpakopamāyāḥ sandehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5988: parīteti pāṭhe tu parītatvaṃ vyāptiḥ puṣpairlāvaṇyaiḥ sambhavatītyatra samāsadvayenopamārūpakayorbhavatyeva sandeha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5989: naca sāmānyadharmāprayogavaśādupamā rūpakaṃ bādhata iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:5997: tadvattve lāvaṇyamadhubhiḥ pūrṇamityekadeśavivarttirūpakodāharaṇe 'pi samāsoktitvamidaṃ darśitaṃ sāmpradāyikamatānusāreṇaiva /
GK16visa10cu:6000: parītatvasya hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāyāṃ ca sādhāraṇyenaiva pravṛtteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6007: eṣu ca yaṣāṃ mate upamāsaṅkarayorekadeśavivartitā nāsti tanmate ādyatṛtīyayoḥ samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6013: tatra prathamaṃ rūpakasamāsabādhasyādarśitatvātteṣāṃ mataṃ darśayati---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6016: tadevaṃ dvitīyo lāvaṇyamadhubhairityādyukto rūpakaviṣaya eva na samāsoktiviṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6017: vyaṅgyarūpakaṃ mukhasya padmatvaṃ taddharmalāvaṇyādau madhvādirūpakaṃ vācyamityekadeśavivarttisuveṣatvaviśeṣaṇavati dantaprabhetyādau /
GK16visa10cu:6022: (vi, ma) paryālocane tu na samāsoktirnāpyekadeśavivarttirūpakaṃ kintvekadeśavivarttyupamaiva iti svamataṃ granthakṛdāha---paryālocane tviti
GK16visa10cu:6026: viśeṣaṇasāmye yatsamāsoktirityuktaṃ tatra viśeṣaṇasya sādhāraṇatvaṃ śliṣṭatvaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6029: tatra dantaprabhāpuṣpamivetyupamāsamāsabodhe hariṇekṣaṇā late veti bodhasya samāsadvayakusṛṣṭikalpanaṃ vinaivopapattirityevaṃ paryālocanā /
GK16visa10cu:6033: (lo, ū) iha caupamyagarbhasyaivaṃ traividhyasambhave 'pi dvitīyodāharaṇam ekadeśavivarttirūpakaviṣaya eveti na pūrvottaravirodha ityāha---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6038: paryālocane tattvato vivecane ucitā hariṇekṣaṇa lateveti pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6052: pāṇḍunā payodhareṇa aupamyenārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī prasannaṃ nirmalaṃ kurvatī śaradraveratyadhikaṃ tāpaṃ tatānetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6054: atra pāṇḍupayodhareṇa gaurastanenārdranakhakṣataṃ dadhānāyāḥ paranāyikāyā gantṛtvena
GK16visa10cu:6056: samāsoktyā pratītiḥ tadvyavahārasya ca śaradi pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6077: (vi, la) upamāgarbhasamāsoktyaṅgīkāre tadrarbhatve ca samāsadvayaniyame sā kathaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6079: ca aindre dhanuṣi ārdranakhakṣatatulyatvāprāptau nāyikāyāṃ ca viśeṣaṇābhāvena tadviśeṣaṇasya
GK16visa10cu:6083: kintvatra payodharasya prasādayantīti padasya sakalaṅkapadasya tāpapadasya ca śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇikā samāsoktireveyam /
GK16visa10cu:6086: nanu “ārdranakhakṣatābham” ityatra sthitamapyupamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi sañcāraṇīyam /
GK16visa10cu:6094: tathā ca tatkṣatadhāraṇaṃ stanasya sambhavatyeva ityata upamāgarbhasamāsoktirevātrāpīti kathamupamāgarbhasamāsoktivilopa ityāśaṅkate---nanviti
GK16visa10cu:6103: yathā--“dadhnā juhoti” ityādau havanasyānyathāsiddherdadhni sañcāryate vidhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6108: (vi, śa) śabdenaikatra bodhitārthasyānyatra sañcāre dṛṣṭāntamāha--yathā dadhneti /
GK16visa10cu:6111: iti vākyarūpād anyataḥ siddheḥ siddhasya ca vidheyatvāsambhavaparyālocanayā tadeva vidheyatvaṃ yattvasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:6114: tathā caivaṃ rītyā dhanurupameyanakhakṣatadhāraṇaṃ payodhare sambhavati,
GK16visa10cu:6123: atra hi hotavyamityarthe juhotinā yadyapi homavidhānopadeśaḥ pratīyate tathāpi vākyāntaralabhye
GK16visa10cu:6124: tasmin “aprāpte hi śāstramarthavadi” ti nayena piṣṭapeṣaṇavadupadeśavaiyarthyādatrānukta
GK16visa10cu:6132: ārdranakhakṣatābhamityatrārdranakhakṣatasambandhād ābhāśabdasyārthasya aupamyasya ca tatparityāgena sambaddhe indradhanuṣi sañcāraṇe dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorvaiṣamyamityanirvāhāt;
GK16visa10cu:6133: yathā kathañcinnarvāhe vā na svārasikīti kaṣṭā yā sañcāraṇasṛṣṭiḥ tasyāḥ kalpanādasyotpādānād jyāyastvādanāyasasiddhatvena /
GK16visa10cu:6135: aindraṃ dhanurityādau mukhyatayā varttamānasya upamāmātre viśeṣeṇa samāsoktyuddīpakasya prasādanakriyādeḥ sadbhāvaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:6143: ekadeśavivartyupamā tu prācīnairanuktāpyudāharaṇe 'dṛṣṭā nāṅgīkarttavyetyata udāharaṇe dṛṣṭatvaṃ darśayitumāha--astu veti /
GK16visa10cu:6146: pade pade vibhānti sma cakravākaiḥ stanairiva //
GK16visa10cu:6150: na cātrāpyutpalairiva netrairityupamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyaṃ sañcāryyatāṃ kathaṃ gatyantarabhāva iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6151: tadā saraḥ śrīṣu netrādibodhāt saraḥ śriya iva nāyikā iti paryavasāne prakrāntasaraḥ śrīvarṇanābhāvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6153: kiṃ copamāyāṃ vyavahārapratīterabhāvātkathaṃ tadupajīvikāyāḥ samāsokteḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6157: (vi, sa) nanvevaṃ “dantaprabhe” tyatra upamāgarbhasamāsoktirnetrairivotpalairityatraikadeśavivartyupamā iti kathamupamāgarbhasamāsoktivilopa ityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:6160: yatpunaruktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ saraḥ śrīniṣṭhaṃ liṅgasāmyaṃ samāsoktiprayojakamiti;
GK16visa10cu:6164: kintu prastutamapekṣyaiva samāsoktiḥ kriyate iti svayamanantaramevoktam /
GK16visa10cu:6166: samanakāryaliṅgaviśeṣaṇānāṃ lakṣyeṣu dvayoḥ trayāṇaāṃ vā sadbhāve prādhānyena vyavahāra iti /
GK16visa10cu:6170: kiñcaivaṃ “mukhena kamaleneva vibhāti hariṇekṣaṇā“ityādāvapi hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ nalinīvyavahārasamāropeṇa samāsoktyutprekṣayoḥ samaveśaḥ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:6178: aindraṃ dhanurityādau upamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyasañcāraṇokteḥ kaṣṭasṛṣṭikakalpanārūpaṃ dūṣaṇamuktvā aupamyagarbhasamāsoktyaṅgīkāre dūṣaṇāntaraṃ dadata itīyaṃ kārikā /
GK16visa10cu:6180: yad yasmāt kāvyaliṅgādisāmyahetukasamāsoktau yathāvyavahārasamāropaḥ pratīyate tadvadaupamyagarbhatvamamuṣmānna pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:6182: kintu tādṛśe sthale ekadeśopamā ekadeśavivartyupamaiva sphuṭetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6185: (lo, e) yadyasmād vyavahāraḥ samāsoktivattattvaṃ rūpakavad aupamyena pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:6188: netrairivotpalairityādau saraḥ śriyā nāyikātvapratītirna samāsoktyā viśeṣaṇasāmyābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:6193: viśeṣaṇatve sambhavatyapi aindraṃ dhanurityādau ca kaṣṭakalpitoktayuktisadbhāve 'pi
GK16visa10cu:6195: tathāca bhāṣaṇam-- “arke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet” iti /
GK16visa10cu:6201: (vi, ka) upamāyā rūpakasya ekadeśavivartitve tulyanyāyādubhayatraiva samāsoktyapraveśe tadubhayasandehasaṅkarasthale 'pi samāsoktirnāstītyāha----evaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6205: (lo, ai) tanmūlasaṅkare dantaprabhetyādau parīteti pāṭhe yatpunaruktaṃ kaiścit /
GK16visa10cu:6207: dvayorapi sādhakabādhakābhāvena paryyante 'pyanyūnānatiriktatvena vṛttau hi sandehasaṅkarāṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6208: natu sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti asaṃśayavartitvajñānadaśāyāṃ kvacit kasyacinmithyātvaṃ kvacid dvayorapi /
GK16visa10cu:6210: naca sandehasaṅkarasya nirvāhaḥ śakyakriya iti vaktuṃ na yuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:6212: kiñca kṣīranīranyāyena miśraṇena saṅkara iti prācyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6219: kāryaliṅgayostulyatve ca dvividheti catuḥ prakārā samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6223: (vi, kha) aupamyagarbhatvaṃ samāsokternirasya caturvidhameva samāsokte rūpaṃ saṃhṛtya vyavasthāpayati---viśeṣaṇasāmye śliṣṭetyādi /
GK16visa10cu:6236: diṅmātraṃ yathā--“vyādhūya yadvasanam-” ityādau laukike vastuni laukikasya haṭhakāmukavyavahārādeḥ samāropaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6246: akhilāsu vṛttiṣu saṃsāreṣu ekarūpamadvitīyaṃ tvāṃ paśyadbhiryairjanaiḥ paratvajuṣo bhinnatvaviṣayāyā vibhaktervibhāgasya lopaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6248: taireva tasya ca dhruvaṃ dhruvatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtamityahaṃ manye /
GK16visa10cu:6253: teṣāmapi hi akhilapadasāhityena vṛttiṣu sthiteṣvekarūpaṃ vikārāhityāttadarthe saṃkhyārāhityam /
GK16visa10cu:6254: parasyāḥ subvibhakterlopaśca kṛtaḥ iti dhruvaṃ niścitaṃ manye /
GK16visa10cu:6255: īdṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyadbhirvibhaktilopaṃ kurvadbhiḥ cādīnāmīdṛśatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnaṃ kṛtamityevaṃ bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6262: tatra cānyaśāstravyavahārasamāropo vedaśāstraprasiddhe vastuni īśvare yathā mama /
GK16visa10cu:6263: “yasyaujjvalyaṃ dyutibhiradhikaṃ vigraheralaṅkṛtīnāṃ yatpādānte laghurapi patat gauravaṃ samprayāti /
GK16visa10cu:6265: siddhākṣaratanurasau sadruṇaḥ śabdamūrttiḥ puṇyaśloko manasi satataṃ sannidhiṃ me prayātu” //
GK16visa10cu:6266: ityatra vākye prastutor'tho yathāsau puṇyaślokaḥ parameśvaro me manasi satataṃ sannidhiṃ prayātu /
GK16visa10cu:6267: yasya vigrahe śarīre 'laṅkṛtīnāṃ kaustubhabhūṣaṇaānāṃ dyutibhiradhikam aujjvalyaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:6268: yatpādānte laghurnikṛṣṭo 'pi patan gauravaṃ gurutvam uttamatvaṃ samprayāti /
GK16visa10cu:6270: chandasi vede siddhākṣararūpā askhalanarūpā tanuryasya tādṛśaḥ sadruṇa aiśvaryyarūpaguṇavān /
GK16visa10cu:6273: tasyāpi vigrahe samāse 'laṅkṛtīnām anuprāsopamādīnāṃ dyutibhiḥ śobhābhiradhikam aujjvalyaṃ tatpādasya caturthabhāgasyānte patato laghuvarṇasyāpi
GK16visa10cu:6279: vṛttiṣu varttante pravarttante āvirbhavantīti vyutpattyā vastuṣu strītvādiliṅgeṣu vā āvyayaṃ kṣayarahitaṃ cakārādikañca /
GK16visa10cu:6284: pratyayatvena parād bhāvinyāḥ vibhakteḥ avacchādayati nigūhati /
GK16visa10cu:6288: yatrāpakṛtavyāpāravataḥ prakṛtasya svatantrasyaiva pratītistatra samāsoktiriti spaṣṭārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6292: iha tu svāvasthāsamāropeṇāvacchāditasvarūpameva taṃ pūrvāvasthāto viśeṣayati /
GK16visa10cu:6293: ata evātra vyavahārasamāropo na tu svarūpasamāropa ityāhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6304: svāvasthāvyaṅgyasya svarūpaṃ tatsamāropeṇa tadāropeṇānavacchāditasvarūpamahnutasvarūpaṃ tat prakṛtaṃ vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6306: ekadeśavivarttirūpake vyaṅgyaṃ rūpyaṃ vācye āropite yathā vyādhūya vasanamityādau vācye gandhavahena kāmukābhedāropaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6321: prāmādikapāṭhe tu śleṣe sati tato viśeṣyādisāmyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6326: iha ca viśeṣaṇānāṃ varṇanīyārthapratipādanena prakaraṇena niyamite 'pi dvitīyārthapratīteranubhavasiddheḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6338: tacca yadyapuṣṭārthadoṣatyāgenaiva labhyaṃ tathāpi viśeṣaṇairityatra bahuvivakṣaṇād bahutve vaicitryaviśeṣānubhavād alaṅkāritvam /
GK16visa10cu:6341: sākṣād bhīmena badhyamānasya duḥ śāsanasya rakṣakatvenāṅgadeśanṛpatitvaṃ senāpatitvaṃ mahāvīradroṇopahāsitvaṃ tadā vīrasya yogyamityupahāsaḥ spaṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6343: (lo, ā) sampriti sādṛśyamūlālaṅkāralakṣaṇāvasare 'pi viśeṣaṇavicchittihetukatvena samāsoktyanantaraṃ parikaraṃ lakṣayati--uktiriti /
GK16visa10cu:6344: viśeṣaṇairiti bahuvacanasya naikasya dvābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇābhyāmidaṃ vaicitryam,
GK16visa10cu:6365: śakyaikabhinno yor'thaḥ aparārthaḥ tasya vācanaṃ lakṣaṇayā bodhanamityarthaḥ śleṣādvyavaccheda iti /
GK16visa10cu:6372: evañva śabdairitikārikāpadārtha ekībhūya bādhyabhāvamāpannairiti viśakalitānāṃ bahūnāṃ padārthānāṃ tathāvidhārthabodhanakṣamatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:6401: vibhāṃ karoti vyanaktīte vyutpattyā rājā ca vibhāyāḥ kānteḥ kārakatvāttadāśrayatvād vācyavannirddhāritatvena bodhyā /
GK16visa10cu:6404: kāryānnimittaṃ kāryaṃ ca hetoratha samātsamam // VisSd_10.58 //
GK16visa10cu:6410: sakalapañcamyantapadārthād aprastutāt sakalaprathamāntapadārthaḥ prastutaśced gamyate budhyate tadā pañcavidho 'prastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6413: (lo, u) viśe, ityādīnāṃ karmapadānāṃ prastutamiti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:6422: atrāsmadapekṣayā rajo 'pi varamiti viśeṣe prastute sāmānyamabhihitam /
GK16visa10cu:6426: apamāne 'pi svasthād dehinaḥ tadrajaḥ varaṃ śreṣṭham /
GK16visa10cu:6427: yadrajaḥ pādāhataṃ sad utthāyābhihantureva mūrddhānamadhirohati ārohatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6432: evaṃ māghakāvyoktyā śiśupālaṃ prati prayāṇābhimukhīkaraṇāya śrīkṛṣṇaṃ prati balarāmavākyam /
GK16visa10cu:6436: “stragiyaṃ yadi jīvitāpahā hṛdaye kiṃ nihitā na hanti mām /
GK16visa10cu:6443: atreśvarecchayā kvacidahitakāriṇo 'pi hitakāritvaṃ hitakāriṇo 'pyahitakāritvamiti sāmānye prastute viśeṣo 'bhihitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6455: tathāhi kiṃ na hanti ityanena hantṛviśeṣasya strajo hananasāmarthyasattve 'pi hananābhāve viśeṣa uktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6462: tathā ca dṛṣṭāntastu sadharmasya ityatra prasiddhasadharmasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6473: kārkaśyaṃ kalayā ca kokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣviva prastutaṃ sītāyāḥ purataśca hanta /
GK16visa10cu:6475: atra sambhāvyamānebhya indrādigatāñjanaliptatvādibhyaḥ kāryebhyo vadanādigatasaundaryaviśeṣarūpaṃ prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:6492: tacca kalayāpi cālpabhāvenāpi kokilayāpi kiñcin madhurasvaroccāraṇāt /
GK16visa10cu:6502: gacchāmīti yathoktayā mṛgadṛśā niḥ śvāsamudrekiṇaṃ tyaktvā tiryagavekṣya bāṣpakaluṣenaikena māṃ cakṣuṣā /
GK16visa10cu:6503: adya prema madarpitaṃ priyasakhīvṛnde tvayā badhyatā- mitthaṃ snehavivardhito mṛgaśiśuḥ sotprāsamābhāṣitaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6508: tvaṃ kiṃ prasthānanivṛtto 'sīti pṛcchantaṃ prati prasthānapravṛttasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:6509: udrokiṇamudbhaṭaṃ niḥ śvāsam muktvā bāṣpakaluṣeṇaikena cakṣuṣā māṃ tiryyagavekṣya ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6510: snehavivarddhitasya mṛgaśiśoḥ svasminnarpitasya premṇaḥ priyasakhīvṛnde vivandhopadeśasya maraṇasūcanāya sochvāsaṃ prodgatasya mamābhāṣaṇakriyāviśeṣaṇam
GK16visa10cu:6518: kasyācid arthāt kenacit kuto na gato 'sīti pṛṣṭasyāprastutenābhidhātumucitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:6521: tulye prastute tulyābhidhāne ca dvidhā śleṣamūlā sādṛśyamātramūlā ca /
GK16visa10cu:6522: śleṣamūlāpi samāsoktivadviśeṣaṇamātrasya śleṣe śleṣavadviśeṣyasyāpi śleṣe bhavatīti dvidhā /
GK16visa10cu:6526: pañcamaprakārasya traividhyaṃ vaktumādau dvaividhyamāha---śleṣamūlā sādṛśyamūlatā ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6528: samāsoktau hi viśeṣyasyāpi śleṣa upamādhvanitvāpattyā na viśeṣye śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6547: sahakāra āmravṛkṣo vasantaśrīsamāśritaḥ sana prabhūtābhirbahubhirudgatābhiḥ kalikābhiḥ
GK16visa10cu:6548: mukulaiḥ ākulo vyāptaḥ san sadāmodo vidyamānottamagandhastata eva samujjvaladīptistata eva śrīmāṃśva /
GK16visa10cu:6550: nāyako 'pi vasantalakṣmyā'śritaḥ san āmodena harṣeṇa samujjvale samyak śṛṅgāre ruciryasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6557: “puṃstvādapi pravicaledyadi yadyadho 'pi yāyādyadi praṇayane na mahānapi syāt /
GK16visa10cu:6562: sapatnāpahṛtaṃ rāvyaṃ yena kenāpi prakārāntareṇoddharttuṃ kañcidrājānamupadiśataḥ kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:6563: kenāpyanirvacanīyena puruṣottamena nārāyaṇena īdṛśītyevaṃprakārā iyaṃ dik ayaṃ prakāraḥ prakaṭitā darśitā /
GK16visa10cu:6565: puṃstvāt puruṣabhāvād yadi pravicaled yadi syāttadapi viśvaṃ saṃsāramuddharet /
GK16visa10cu:6566: purā hyasurāhṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mohinīrūpā kanyā bhūtvā nārāyaṇenoddhṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:6567: tathā yadyadho 'pi yāyāttapītyarthaḥ---purā varāhamūrttyā pātālaṃ gatvā tena pṛthivyā uddhṛtatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:6568: tathā yadi praṇayane yācane yācananimitte na mahān laghuḥ syāt tadapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6570: evaṃ ca tvayāpi puruṣaśreṣṭhena puṃstvāt pauruṣāccalanenāpi nikṛṣṭatāprāptirūpatādhaḥ pātenāpi yācanārthaṃ laghutvaprāptyāpi sapatnāpahṛtaṃ rājyamarjyatāmiti prakṛtavyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:6575: praṇayane prītiviṣaye mahān uttamo yadi na syāt /
GK16visa10cu:6578: atra puruṣottamapadena viśeṣyeṇāpi śliṣṭena pracuraprasiddhyā prathamaṃ viṣṇureva bodhyate /
GK16visa10cu:6590: yatpunaruktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ puṃstvādiśabdānāmatra bhagavantaṃ pratyadhikānvayitvamiti tanna,
GK16visa10cu:6607: kaśicidatra bahudasyuveṣṭitaḥ palāyanāsamartho vidhikaruṇāśaraṇaṃ prāpto bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6612: atra vātā dhanyā ahamadhanya iti vaidharmyeṇa prastutaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:6634: “kākalī tu kale sūkṣme dhvanau tu madhurāsphuṭe'; iti koṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6640: aprastute kokile vācye prastutasya vyaṅgyasyādhyāropaṃ vinetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6641: naca vācyārthabodhe tatkathamaprastute vācye tadāropa iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6646: kathaṃ kamalanālasya mā bhūvan bhaṅgurā guṇāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6647: atra prastutasya kasyacidadhyāropaṇaṃ vinā kamalanālāntaśchidrāṇāṃ guṇabhaṅgurīkaraṇe hetutvamasambhavi /
GK16visa10cu:6653: atra antaśchidrādimattvaṃ yat kamalanālasya vācyaṃ tatrāntaśchidrasya tantubhaṅge hetutvaṃ na sambhavati tadāha---chidrāṇāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:6657: tathā chidrāṃśa eva nirguṇasya kaṇṭakatulyaparijanavataśca prastutapuruṣasya tatrāropaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6660: (lo, i) antaśchidrāṇi madhye chidrāṇi kuṭumbasuduścaritāni ca /
GK16visa10cu:6666: sambhavi uddhriyamāṇe sūtre tat sīmni chedadarśanāt /
GK16visa10cu:6667: iha ca--- aṅga dehi lihiṇa mā api javappasi paravaiṃ ppīnaṃ yeuṃ /
GK16visa10cu:6668: amaṇḍe kohalie añjukalliṃ pi puṃ vahiṃsi /
GK16visa10cu:6676: lakṣya ityutkuśyate teṣāṃ kasyacid durmedhasaḥ pralapitenavañcitānāṃ matamatitucchataraṃ
GK16visa10cu:6682: mityādau vācyasyāsambhavitve antaśchidretyādāvavayavasyāsambhavitve kathaṃ na lakṣaṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:6683: atrocyate, yatra khalu kokilo 'hamityādau vākyabodhastatrotpatsyamānānvayabādhahetukā kathaṃ lakṣaṇā ?
GK16visa10cu:6686: kiñcātrodāharaṇe antaśchidrāṇītyādau vā yadi lakṣaṇā tadā śuddhā gauṇī vā, nādyā /
GK16visa10cu:6688: yadi dvitīyā sāpi sāropā sādhyavasānā vā,
GK16visa10cu:6692: iha khalu prabhuprabhṛtiṣu kenacid abhisandhānena karttavyor'thastātparyyam,
GK16visa10cu:6694: ata evātra samāsoktivad vyavahārasamāropa iti prācyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6697: lakṣaṇāphalasya pratipattaye kintu abhilaṣitaṃ tatsevārthaṃ vācyārthamalabdhvā pratyutāniṣṭhaprāpteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6699: kasmiṃścit prastute mahāpuruṣe hīnasya matsaro na yukta iti bodhanāya tulye 'prastute
GK16visa10cu:6700: tulyābhidhāne ca lakṣaṇāyāṃ “jaṃ de lihiṇa mā asītyādau suprasiddhe tairabhyupagate
GK16visa10cu:6703: atrāhuścaṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitāḥ “atra bāhyasya prastutaparatvāt prārambhāt prakṛtyaiva vācyārthavelay tatsamarpaṇena pratīterna dūṣyata iti /
GK16visa10cu:6708: tyādau lakṣaṇā tadā tatra mukhyārthabādhe vākyārthānvayopapādakaṃ kiṃ nāma lakṣyate kuṭumbe duścaritānīti rūpo 'prastutor'thaścet tasyāpi na kamalanālabhaṅgurīkaraṇamapāstam /
GK16visa10cu:6709: yaccaiṣāṃ mānyānāṃ mate bahutaramaskhalitamavadhāryyāpi kiñcit kiñcideva dūṣaṇamuddhuṣyate
GK16visa10cu:6713: “kā tvaṃ kuntalamallakīrttirahaha kvāpi sthitā na kvacit sakhyastāstava kutra kutra vada vāg lakṣmīrucaḥ samprati';
GK16visa10cu:6714: vāgāptā caturānanasya vadanaṃ lakṣmīrmurāreruraḥ- kāntirmaṇḍanamaṇḍalaṃ mama punaḥ nādyāpi viśrāmabhūḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6715: '; iti kvacit praśrottarikayā kalpayitvā “varṇanīyasya leśoddiṣṭasya lakṣyate” ityaprastutapraśaṃsādiviśeṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ likhitvā tadudāharaṇatvena darśitaṃ tadasmābhirupekṣaṇīyam /
GK16visa10cu:6716: atra hi praśrottarikābhāvena bhavane vastuṣu na vyavahārasamāropeṇa samāsoktiṃ prayojayati /
GK16visa10cu:6721: kuntaleśvarasya vāgādīnāṃ caturānanādigamanena “yo 'nubhūtaḥ kuraṅgākṣyā” ityādivannidarśanā iha /
GK16visa10cu:6723: tathāpyatra nidarśanāvivekaprastāve uktam---upamāparikalpanaṃ nidarśaneti lakṣaṇe upamāpadaṃ sādṛśyamātravācakamiti /
GK16visa10cu:6725: sambhavatāsambhavatā vā vastusambhandhena gamyamānaṃ pratibimbakaraṇaṃ nidarśaneti /
GK16visa10cu:6726: tathāca padbhyāṃ haṃsagatirityādau so 'pi tadānanarucamityādau ca pratikalpanā /
GK16visa10cu:6729: ityatra ca tathābhūtabhūmiṣu avanataśitikaṇṭhakaṇṭhānāṃ sambhavāpatteḥ utprekṣākalpane prakṛtodāharaṇaṃ vātiśayoktikalpane nidarśanāyāṃ na virodhaḥ
GK16visa10cu:6730: kiñca ekaikasya vāgāde rājani caturānanādau ca bhavanāt /
GK16visa10cu:6738: (vi, ba) nanu “panthia” ityādau yaḥ śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniruktastatra upabhogakṣamatve
GK16visa10cu:6739: sati yatsthityanumitirūpaṃ vastuvyaṅgyamuktaṃ tatra vaktryā uddeśyatvena tadeva prastutaṃ
GK16visa10cu:6743: na tatra vācyasya vyavahārasya vyaṅgyapuruṣādau samāropasya prāṇatvācca tatkārakatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6747: vācyor'tho 'prastutastatrāpyeva masyāḥ prasaktirevaṃ samādhānaṃ ca bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6748: upamādhvanau samāsoktau śabdaśleṣālaṅkāre tasyāḥ prasaktireva nāstītyāha---upamādhvanāviti /
GK16visa10cu:6750: upamādhvanisamāsoktau cāprastuto vyaṅgya eveti tayornāsyāḥ prasaktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6757: tathāhi “bhuktimuktikṛdekānta” ityādau yadāgama ityatra sacchāstre na sata āgamanarūpasyārthasya vyavahāraḥ samāropyate,
GK16visa10cu:6769: nindayā stutergamyatve vyājena stutiriti vyutpattyā vyājastutiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6775: yadyapi bakṣyamāṇodāharaṇayornindāstutyorekasyāpi vācyatvaṃ tathāpi nindāstutiprayojakārthābhyāṃ vācyābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6776: gamyatve vyaṅgyatve nindāvyājena stutau vyājanindātvena vyājastutiparayogārthasambhavāt samāsadvayenobhayatra tatpadārthaṃ ghaṭayati---nindayeti
GK16visa10cu:6780: tvayi kupite 'pi prāgiva viśvastā dviṭstriyo jātāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6784: he deva tāḥ prasiddhāḥ tava vairistriyaḥ tvayi kupite prāgiva viśvastāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6787: akopadaśāyāṃ dṛṣṭatvena kaṇṭakairvyāptāṅgayaṣṭayaḥ kopadaśāyāṃ tu bhayena kaṇṭakavanapraveśāttādṛśāstathākopadaśāyāṃ
GK16visa10cu:6788: viśvastā abhītā kopadaśāyāṃ tu viśiṣṭamadhikaṃ śvastaṃ śvāso yāsāṃ tādṛśāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6806: he payoda / yajjagataḥ jīvanāya tava jīvanāni jalāni iyaṃ tava mayā vyājastutirmirthyāstutirevoditā /
GK16visa10cu:6809: he ghana / yat pathikāni virahaṇo nihatya dharmarājasya yamasya sāhāyyaṃ mahimānamarjayasi
GK16visa10cu:6810: idaṃ tu te mahatstotraṃ dharmarājasya tulyakarma lokamāraṇakāritvena māhātmyādhikyāttadviruddhajagajjīvakāritve,
GK16visa10cu:6813: atra stutervācyatve 'pi stutiprayojakārthaparatayā yatstutipadaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadudāharaṇāntarasaṃgrahāya /
GK16visa10cu:6814: yathā “dānāt praśaṃsāṃ prāpto 'si karṇedānīṃ tu saṃgarāt /
GK16visa10cu:6815: apakramya yaśo dattvāraye prāptastato 'dhikā“miti karṇaṃ prati aśvatthāmna uktau stuteravācyatā /
GK16visa10cu:6825: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tacca prastutasya kāraṇarūpaṃ bodhyam bhaṅgyā prastutamapi kāryakathanarūpaṃ bhaṅgyabhidhīyate pratipādyate /
GK16visa10cu:6828: prastutakāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadā vyajyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6829: kāraṇavyañjakakāryarūpāyāmaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ tu aprastutena kāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyajyate iti bhedo vakṣyate yathā “indurlipta ivāñjanena” ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:6832: bhaṅgyā camatkāranipuṇavicchittyantarāśrayeṇa vyaṅgyam abhidhīyate bodhyate kāryādidvāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6837: atra hayagrīveṇa svargo vijita iti prastutameva gamyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaicitryaviśeṣapratipattaye sainyasya pārijātamañjarīsāvajñasparśanarūpakāryadvāreṇābhihitam
GK16visa10cu:6841: śacyāḥ keśasambhogalālitāstāḥ prasiddhāḥ pārijātasya mañjaryo yasya iyagrīvasya nṛpasya sainikairnandane vane sāvajñaṃ spṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6843: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ kāraṇarūpaṃ sāvatramañjarīsparśasya abhihitaṃ vyañjanayā pratipāditam /
GK16visa10cu:6853: ityatra madamānayorvināśa eva tayornivāsaprītiparityāga iti paryāyoktam /
GK16visa10cu:6854: evaṃ ca yadeva gamyate tasyaivābhidhāne paryāyoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6855: taduktaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā “yadevocyate tadeva vyaṅgyaṃ yathā tu vyaṅgyaṃ na tathā ucyate” iti paryāyoktalakṣaṇavyākhyāne /
GK16visa10cu:6856: ayaṃ ca kvacitkāraṇena vācyena kāryasya gamyatve 'pi sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:6860: iha tu varṇanīyasya prabhāvātiśayabodhakatvena kāryamiti kāraṇavatprastutam /
GK16visa10cu:6866: (vi, va) ślokāntareṇāpi prastutakāryeṇa prastutakāraṇavyañjanādidānīmalaṅkāraṃ darśayati---evaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:6868: anena rājñā śatruvilāsinīnāṃ staneṣu muktāphalavat sthūlatamān aśrubindūn paryāsayatā
GK16visa10cu:6869: pātayatā ākṣepasūtreṇa grathanasūtreṇavinaiva hārāḥ pratyarpitāḥ aśrubindava eva
GK16visa10cu:6872: atra varṇanīyasya rājño gamyabhūtaśatrumāraṇarūpakāraṇavatkāryabhūtaṃ tathāvidhaśatrustrīkrandanajalamapi prabhāvātiśayabodhakatvena varṇanārhamiti paryāyoktameva /
GK16visa10cu:6873: “rājan rājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumārasacivairnādyāpi kiṃ bhujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6874: itthaṃ rājaśukastavāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarā- ccitrasthānavalokya śūnyavalabhāvekaikamābhāṣate” //
GK16visa10cu:6877: (vi, śa) aprastutakāryeṇa prastutakāraṇavyañjanarūpāyā aprastutapraśaṃsāyā udāharaṇaṃ “rājan rājasutā ityādika “kāvyaprakāśakṛtā dattam;
GK16visa10cu:6882: atau'dhvagaiḥ pañjarānmukto rājaśukastadīyaśūnyavacbhau citralikhitān rājādīnavalokya ekaikamitthamābhāṣata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6884: devya iti sambodhanaṃ yūyamapi tūṣṇīṃ sthitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6892: atra prasthānedyataṃ bhavantaṃ śrutvā sahasaivārayaḥ palāyitā iti kāraṇaṃ prastutam /
GK16visa10cu:6894: anye tu--“rājaśukavṛttāntena ko 'pi prastutaprabhāvo bodhyata ityaprastutapraśaṃsaiva” ityāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6897: (vi, ṣa) keṣāñcinmate atrāripalāyanarūpaprastutakāraṇasya kāryaṃ śukabhāṣaṇaprastutameveti taddarśayati---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:6905: sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣaṇa viśeṣastena vā yadi /
GK16visa10cu:6906: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇenedaṃ kāryeṇa ca samarthyate // VisSd_10.61 //
GK16visa10cu:6914: evaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇena kāraṇaṃ vā kāryeṇa samarthyate ucitatvena pratipādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6915: uktaṃ yat sāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣe tathātvadarśanāducitamiti bodhanaṃ samarthanarītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6916: iti caturvidhaṃ samarthanaṃ samarthyasamarthakayoḥ sādharmyeṇa tayoḥ parasparavaidharmyarūpeṇetareṇa vetyāto 'ṣṭadhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6921: atra dvitīyārdhagatena viśeṣarūpeṇārthena prathamārdhagataḥ sāmānyor'thaḥ sopapattikaḥ kriyate /
GK16visa10cu:6924: (vi, ha) tatra sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇa samarthanaṃ sādharmyeṇāha---bṛhaditi /
GK16visa10cu:6935: yadyapi kṣudrasāmānyasya nedṛśaṃ samarthanamucitamityapratīteḥ tathāpi kāryāntagamanaviśiṣṭasya
GK16visa10cu:6936: tasya tat samarthanaṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśamādāyeti bodhyaṃ saviśeṣaṇe vidhiniṣedhāviti nyāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:6938: atra ca kṣudraviśeṣasya nagāpagāyāḥ kāryāntagāmitvadarśanāt kṣudrasāmānyasya kāryāntagāmitvamaucityena sambhavatīti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6958: kuruta tatnitaye didhīrṣāṃ āryaḥ karoti harakārmukamātatajyam” //
GK16visa10cu:6959: atra kāraṇabhūtaṃ harakārmukātatajyīkaraṇaṃ pṛthivīsthairyādeḥ kāryasya samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6966: āryo rāmo harakārbhukamātatajyaṃ yataḥ karoti tataḥ kāraṇāt pṛthvyādikaṃ sthirādikaṃ bhavetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6971: anyathā tu ātatajyīkaraṇe yāvān bharaḥ syāttena sarveṣāmasthairyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6973: naca pṛthvīsthairyādeḥ kathamātatajyīkaraṇasya kāryatvamasthairyādereva tatkāryatvāditi vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6975: nacaivamātatajyīkaraṇātpūrvabhūtasya viśeṣasthairyādestatrāpi kathaṃ kāryatvamiti vācyamtajjñānakāryatve ca tatkāryatvopacārāt nāndīmukhasya vivāhanimittakatvavat /
GK16visa10cu:6977: tādṛśāt krāraṇāt pṛthvyādeḥ sthirībhavanādikamucitamityevaṃ samarthanaṃ sthirībhāvādyupadeśa eka kāryam /
GK16visa10cu:6979: kāryādisamarthanacatuṣkaṃ hetvalaṅkārarūpasyaivetyataḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā tadupekṣya cāturvidhyamevārthāntaranyāsoktaṃ kāraṇasya janakahetutvāt kāryasya ca jñāpakahetutvāt,
GK16visa10cu:6982: “sahasā vidadhīta na kriyām” ityādau sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvasya vimṛśyakāritvarūpasya kāraṇasya samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6987: sahasā vimarṣaṇaṃ vinā kriyāṃ na vidadhīta,
GK16visa10cu:6989: vimṛśyakāritve tu na kevalaṃ nāpadaḥ kintu sampadaścetyāha---vṛṇate hīti /
GK16visa10cu:7000: (vi, gha) viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya samarthanaṃ vaidharmyaiṇetyasyodāharaṇamūhyamiti vakṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:7010: “sahasā vidadhīta-” ityatra sahasā vidhānābhāvasyāpatpradatvaṃ viruddhaṃ kāryaṃ samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:7015: atastadanuktvā kāryeṇa kāraṇasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇetyasyāpyudāharaṇaṃ sahas vidadhītetyatraivetyāha---sahaseti /
GK16visa10cu:7021: atra hi vimṛṣyakāriṇa eva sampadāvaraṇāt kāryāt sahasā vidhānābhāva ucita iti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7023: viśeṣaṇasāmānyasamarthanaṃ kāraṇena kāryasamarthanañca vaidharmyeṇa yadanudāhṛtaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7024: tatra viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “guṇaānābheva daurātmyāddhuri dhūryo na yujyate /
GK16visa10cu:7027: asyārthaḥ--dhūryaḥ āropyamāṇabhāravahanasamarthaśca prāṇī dhuri bhāravahane niyujyate /
GK16visa10cu:7028: tacca guṇānāmeva daurātmyād daurjanyād dhūryatvaguṇasya bhāravahanaduḥ khaprayojakatvāttasya daurjanyam /
GK16visa10cu:7029: guṇābhāve tu tādṛśaṃ duḥ khaṃ na bhavatītyāha--asaṃjāteti /
GK16visa10cu:7034: aniyujyamānaprāṇiviśeṣeṇa galigavādiyujyamānatvaviruddhadharmeṇa sukhasvāpena dhūryaviruddhadharmeṇa galitvena ca samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:7035: alasasya sukhasvapanaśīlasya dhūryasya dhuri niyujyamānatvamucitamiti pratīteḥ niyogasamarthanameva niyujyamānadhūryasamarthanaṃ;
GK16visa10cu:7037: kāraṇena kāryasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “sa vijigye raṇe sarvān rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7040: atra hi rāvaṇasya vijayaḥ kāryaṃ rāmabāṇakaṭusvādānāsvādena kāraṇena samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:7041: tadanāsvādena tasya vijaya ucitastadāsvāde sati tadasambhavāditi pratiteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7054: ye 'pi tvadramanānukārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā- stvatsādṛśyavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate” //
GK16visa10cu:7059: varṣāsu bhāvanopanītāṃ rāvaṇopahṛtāṃ sītāṃ sambodhya rāmasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7060: he priye / tvatsādṛśyenārthād dṛśyamānena yo vinodastanmātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate /
GK16visa10cu:7067: vākyatrayasyaiva kriyākārakabhāvena samāptatvād hetava ityatra hetvarthakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7071: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7088: atra paśyantītyasaṃkhyapathgāmiti tvaddānajalavāhinīmiti ca padādeva kriyānanvayenāsamāptatvāt pathatrayagamanāpekṣayā asaṃkhyāpathagamanoktarṣeṇa taddarśanaṃ gopanahetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7090: iha kecid vākyārthagatena kāvyaliṅgenaiva gatārthatayā kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaṃ nādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:7092: tathā hyatra hetustridhā bhavati--jñāpako niṣpādakaḥ samarthakaśceti /
GK16visa10cu:7101: kāryakaraṇasamarthena yānyudāharaṇāni darśitāni tatra hetūnāṃ vākyārthamātragatatvāj jñāpako 'numānasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:7102: idaṃ tu kāvyaprakāśakṛdviṣayavibhāgamanādṛtyaiva likhitaṃ tanmate hi praśrasyaiva jñāpako heturna hetvalaṅkāraḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7104: anyatra tu janako jñāpakaśca heturhetvalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:7105: ata eva--- “bhasmoddhūlana bhadramastu bhavate rudrākṣamāle śubhaṃ hā sopānaparamparāṃ girisutākāntālayālaṅkṛtim /
GK16visa10cu:7106: adyārādhanatoṣitena vibhunā yuṣmatsaparyāsukhā- llokocchedini mokṣanāmani mahāmohe nidhīyāmahe” //
GK16visa10cu:7107: iti śloke sukhālokaccheditvaṃ mokṣasya mahāmohatve heturityuktyā hetvalaṅkārodāharaṇatayā udāhṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:7108: tatra mokṣasya mahāmohatāyā alīkatvena sukhālokaccheditvasya janakahetutvāsambhavena jñāpakahetutvādeva /
GK16visa10cu:7109: anumānaṃ tu sādhyasādhanayorekadharmigatatvena nirdeśe sati hetorhetutvena nirdeśe satyeva /
GK16visa10cu:7110: iha tu sukhālokācchedinītyanena hetoreva nirdeśo natu hetutvena /
GK16visa10cu:7111: bhavatāpyanumānodāharaṇatayā vakṣyamāṇeṣu ślokeṣu hetūnāṃ hetutvenaiva nirdeśāt nahi “parvāto vahnimān dhūmāt ';
GK16visa10cu:7122: anyathā sākāṅkṣatayāsamañjasameva syāt iti pādatrayagatavākyaṃ niṣpādakatvenāpekṣate /
GK16visa10cu:7125: (vi, ṭa) yattvannaitrasamānakāntītyuktahetvalaṅkārodāharaṇe daivākṣamāṃ prati nīlotpalādīnāṃ salilamagnatvāderjanakahetutvāsambhavāt kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā janakatvamupapādayitumāha /
GK16visa10cu:7141: ityādivadupadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā svato 'pi gatārthaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ sopapattikameva karotīti pṛthageva kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaḥ kāvyaliṅgāt /
GK16visa10cu:7146: ityādipadārdhaṃ vinā pūrvārdhavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣamityata uktarityā tatrāpi kāvyaliṅgameva syānnārthantaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7148: upadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā vṛṇate hi ityādāvākāṅkṣārāhityenāpi gatārthaṃ caritārthamityataḥ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ karmabhūtaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ karttṛ sopapatikameva kurute /
GK16visa10cu:7154: parāpakāretyādau samarthanīyānirdeśāt nāstyeva tatrārthāntaranyāsa iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7156: pṛthvi sthirā bhavetyādau siddhe sthairye upadeśasambhavāt kārmukajyātatīkaraṇaṃ hetumapekṣate eveti tatra hetvalaṅkāraprasaktirdurvāraiva /
GK16visa10cu:7164: (vi, ḍa) yatra janakahetorhetutvenaiva nirdeśastatra vaicitryābhāvānna hetvalaṅkāra ityāha--ni dhatta ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:7171: yathā “yatra patatyabalānā” mityādau śarāpātena madanadhāvanasyāniṣpādakaḥ sākāṅkṣatvena siddhasya sādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7173: anyathā yattvannetra ityādi pādatrayaṃ vināsamañjasaṃ syāt tadaivāsya virahiṇo nāyikāsādṛśyavinodāsahatvasya svato 'pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7179: idañca kāvyaliṅgasya heturvaicitaryāvahanena na nivarttata iti kāvyaliṅgākhyamalaṅkaraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:7181: anumānaṃ tu vicchittyā jñānaṃ sādhyasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa10cu:7188: atra sādhyasādhanayoreva dharmigatatvaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ deyameva /
GK16visa10cu:7230: evañca darśitodāharaṇadvaye “jānīmahe” “manye” iti padayorutprekṣāvācakatve taddvaye utprekṣā naiveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7231: tatpadadvayābhāve tu dvayoḥ sandehasaṅkara iti ca bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7234: anyorudāharaṇayorhṛdaye prayasadbhāvasya smaradhāvanasya ca kāraṇarūpasya sādhyasyāpi padmakuḍmalatā śarapatanañca sādhanaṃ yathā parvato 'yaṃ vahnimān dhūmavattvādityādau /
GK16visa10cu:7238: atra svacchānāṃ patitaparihārarūpasāmānyasya jalānāmasitotpale nirasanarūpo viśeṣarūpaḥ sādhanam /
GK16visa10cu:7251: hetumatā kāryeṇa saha hetorabhedenābhidhābhidhānaṃ hetunāmālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7280: asya ca vicchittiviśeṣasya sarvālaṅkāravilakṣaṇatvena sphuraṇātpṛthagalaṅkāratvameva nyāyyam /
GK16visa10cu:7285: he tanvi / yadi kupitāsi tadā karajakṣataṃ vidhāya bhujapāśābhyāmasya nāyakasya kaṇṭhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ badhāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7300: vaktumiṣṭasya vastuno niṣedhābhāso 'niṣedhābhiprāyatvena niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7303: vakṣyamāṇasya uktasya vā vaktumiṣṭasya niṣedhābhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7307: ayamarthaḥ-vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ prākaraṇikatvādayukto niṣedhaḥ kutaḥ san bādhitasvarūpo yatrābhāsatāmavagamayati sa ākṣepo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7311: kvacid vakṣyamāṇaviṣayaḥ kvaciduktaviṣaya iti dvividha ākṣepo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7313: tatra vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye kvacitsarvasyāpi sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya niṣedhaḥ kvacidaṃśoktāvaṃśāntare niṣadha iti dvau bhedau /
GK16visa10cu:7321: atra sakhyā virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye niṣedhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7332: virahasya virahāvasthāyāḥvakṣyamāṇe viśeṣe pāṇḍutvakṛśatvādau nirdayahṛdayatvena tu sāmānyataḥ sūcanam /
GK16visa10cu:7335: (lo, u) sarvatrāpi vakṣyamāṇasya virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcanaṃ smaraśaravidhurāyā iti pratipādanāt /
GK16visa10cu:7350: “bālaa / ṇāhaṃ dūtī tua piosi tti ṇa maha vāvāro /
GK16visa10cu:7351: sā marai tujjha aaso etnaṃ dhammakkharaṃ bhaṇimo” //
GK16visa10cu:7355: (vi, ba) uktaniṣedhaviṣaye vaktumityasya vastusvarūpasya niṣedhamāha---bālaa iti /
GK16visa10cu:7356: “bālaka nāhaṃ dūtī tiṣṭha priyo 'sīti na mama vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7357: sā mriyate tavāyaśaḥ etad dharmākṣaraṃ bhaṇāmaḥ //
GK16visa10cu:7362: tathā prāṇimātradharmo vaktavyastatra svapriyatvamanyajanapriyatvaṃ vā na prayojakamityetatsūcanāya priyo 'sītyuktam /
GK16visa10cu:7364: atra sā mriyate ityuktaviṣaye vaktumiṣṭasyātmano dūtītvasya vastunā eva niṣedho natu tadukteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7366: maraṇavyāvarttakadūtītvaviṣayatvena paramparayā tadviṣayatvāt atrādharmato nivṛttaye yathārthavāditvasya viśeṣasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7377: atra tad vyaṅgyaduḥ khātiśayasya viśeṣasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7390: nanu “karttavyaṃ pratyahaṃ strānaṃ natu rātrau kadācana';
GK16visa10cu:7391: ityatra vihitasya pratyahasnānasya rātrau niṣedhavad vidhiniṣedha evāyam /
GK16visa10cu:7392: sa ca nālaṅkāratāṃ bhajata ityāśaṅkate--na ceti /

GK16visa10cu:7402: “yadvā mṛṣā tiṣṭhatu dainyameta- nnaicchanti vairaṃ marutā kirātāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7404: iha hi prathamapadyoktasya dvitīyapadena niṣedhastāttvika eva /
GK16visa10cu:7405: evañca niṣiddhavidhināpi nāsya sāṅkaryaṃ, sa hi yathā---
GK16visa10cu:7411: maṇau vajrasamutkīrṇo sūtrasthe vāsti me gatiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7412: atra padyadvayoktaniṣedhasya tṛtīyapadyena vidhāne niṣedhasyābhāsatā eva /
GK16visa10cu:7414: aniṣṭasya tathārthasya vidhyābhāsaḥ paro mataḥ // VisSd_10.65 //
GK16visa10cu:7418: aniṣṭasyārthasya vidhyābhāso niṣedhabodhako vidhistathā pūrvoktavat viśeṣapratipattaye cettadāpara ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7422: yatheṣṭasya niṣedhastathaniṣṭasya nidhiranupapadyamāna ābhāse paryavasāyī dvitīyākṣepālaṅkārabījamiti /
GK16visa10cu:7428: mamāpi. janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān” //
GK16visa10cu:7439: yatatra--- yātu yātu kimanena tiṣṭhatā muñca muñca sakhi sādaraṃ vacaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7442: atrodāharaṇavat sarvathā na yātviti tathāvidhāparādhakāle nāyikāyā niṣedhābhāsasya mūḍhānāmapi buddhyanārohāt /
GK16visa10cu:7454: (lo, ḷ) asya cākṣepasya virodhāśrayatvena tadanantaraṃ virodhamūlālaṅkārapradarśanaṃ prakriyate---vibhāvaneti /

GK16visa10cu:7490: iyañca kāraṇābhāvena paratantratayā kāryetpatterviśiṣṭatayā bhāvanādanvarthā vibhāvanā /
GK16visa10cu:7493: atraiva caturthapāde “kiyantaḥ santi bhūtale” iti pāṭhe tvanuktam /

GK16visa10cu:7502: acintyanimittodāharaṇaṃ taduktaṃ darśayati---yathā sa eka iti /
GK16visa10cu:7509: “yaḥ kaumāra-” ityādeḥ kāraṇasya ca kāryaviruddhāyā utkaṇṭhāyā nibandhanādviśeṣoktiḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7526: bhūṣaṇaviruddhasya'bhūṣaṇatvasya ca pratītāvapi na viśeṣoktiḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:7527: na hi tāralyābhāvarūpasya phalābhāvasya manohāritvābhāvarūpasya phalābhāvasya ca pratītyā viśeṣoktiḥ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:7528: tathā dhanino 'pītyādāvadhanitvāviruddhasya dhanitvasya pratītāvapi na vibhāvanāpratītiḥ,

GK16visa10cu:7531: (lo, ai) iha ca kāryābhāva ityādigranthaḥ prathamapariccheda eva viśadīkṛtaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7536: “karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimān yo jane jane namo 'stvavāryavīryāya tasmai makaraketave” //
GK16visa10cu:7537: atra dāhakāryaṃtayā śakterabhāvo 'śaktiviruddhaśaktisadbhāvamukhena upanibaddha iti viśeṣoktiḥ suphuṭā /
GK16visa10cu:7541: kriyā kriyādravyābhyāṃ yaddravyaṃ dravyeṇa vā mithaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7549: tasya jātyā saha virodhastu jāterguṇena saha virodharūpa eveti pūrvagaṇanāpraviṣṭatvānnoktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7554: paryavasāne tu āvirodha eva anyathā doṣāvahatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7555: guṇasya jātyā saha jāterguṇena saha virodha eveti guṇaviruddhasya traividhyameva /
GK16visa10cu:7563: (vi, ka) tatra jāteścaturbhiśca saha virodhamekaśloke eva darśayati---tava viraha iti /
GK16visa10cu:7570: nalinīdalamapītyatra nalinīdalatvajāternidāgharaviṇā dravyeṇa saha tādātmyena virodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7571: atrāpi viruddhadharmavyāpyatvād virodhasyaiva puraḥ sphūrttikatvādapikāreṇa virodhabodhanācca na rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:7577: dvijapatnīnāṃ kaṭhināḥ sati bhavati karāḥ sarojasukumārāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7581: he nṛpa / te pūrvaṃ santatetyādinā kaṭhinā dvijapatnīnāṃ karā bhavanti sarojasukumārāḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7609: āsecanakaṃ sekena tāpanāśakam amṛtena secanakaṃ vā /

GK16visa10cu:7627: candrasūryayorviruddhaśītoṣṇaguṇavattvena virodhasya puraḥ sphurttikatvād atrāpi na rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:7628: dinādipaścaika eva sūryo nāpare ekādeśā iti na jātivirodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7630: atra “tava viraha-” ityādau pavanādīnāṃ bahuvyaktivācakatvājjātiśabdānāṃ davānaloṣmahṛdayabhedanasūryairjātiguṇakriyādravyarūpairanyonyaṃ virodho mukhata ābhāsate,
GK16visa10cu:7634: (vi, cha) atra prathamaśloke jāteścaturbhiḥ saha virodhaṃ grāhayati--atra tava viraha ityādāviti /
GK16visa10cu:7647: “tvadvāji-” ityādau “haro 'pi śirasā gaṅgāṃ na dhatte” iti virodhaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7656: viruddhatvena bhāsamānatvād virodhābhāsatvaprasaktau tata enaṃ viśeṣayitumāha---vibhāvanāyāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:7660: viśeṣoktyudāharaṇeṣu yadyatkāraṇaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiva sāmagrītvenādhyāse evaṃ vaicitryāt /
GK16visa10cu:7671: tenānyadā bhinnadeśayordaṇḍaghaṭayoḥ sarvadaiva bhinnadeśayoḥ kāryayośca bhinnadeśatve 'pi nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7674: “sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarā sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam /
GK16visa10cu:7675: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśrayairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam” //
GK16visa10cu:7681: bālā bālyadharmamṛdutvavatī tatkāryaṃ tasyā eva vaco 'prāgalbhyaṃ taccāsmākaṃ virahadaurbalyāt /
GK16visa10cu:7689: (lo, ā) bhinnadeśasthatvamāptatāyāṃ yaddeśameva kāraṇaṃ taddeśameva kāryamityevameva niyamaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7692: guṇau kriye vā cetsyātāṃ viruddhe hetukāryayoḥ // VisSd_10.69 //

GK16visa10cu:7709: “sadyaḥ karasparśamavāpya citraṃ raṇe raṇe yasya kṛpāṇalekhā /

GK16visa10cu:7715: tamālavannīlā kṛpāṇalekhā lekhākāraḥ kṛpāṇo khaḍgo raṇe raṇe yasya rājñaḥ karasparśamavāpya śaradinduvatpāṇḍu yaśaḥ sadyaḥ prasūte idaṃ citram
GK16visa10cu:7721: nanu viruddhatve kiṃ vaicitryamityata āha--kāraṇaguṇā iti /

GK16visa10cu:7736: tathā ca strītajjanyavirahayoḥ kāraṇakāryayorānandadānatāpakriye ca viruddhe ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7758: taruvalkalameva bhūṣaṇaṃ yatra tādṛśāṃ vanaṃ kva nṛpetyādikaṃ kka /

GK16visa10cu:7765: madavibhramāsakalayā pape punaḥ sa purastriyaikatamayaikayā dṛśā” //
GK16visa10cu:7769: sāgaraśayasya viṣṇorvipulena kukṣiṇā udareṇa yugakṣayakāle bhuvanāni papire /
GK16visa10cu:7770: sa punarviṣṇuḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ ekatamayā purastriyā kartryā madavibhrameṇāsakalayā ekadeśarūpayā ekayā dṛśā pape ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7771: atra bhuvanapānasamarthakukṣimata ekastrīkaṭākṣeṇa peyatvayogo viruddha ityarthaḥ /
