GK16visa10cu:7779: viṣamālaṅkāraṇāmeṣāṃ sūtroktaprakāraṇāmupalakṣaṇatayā sambandhinorananurūpatayā takṣyānusāreṇānye 'pi prakārā udāhartavyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7787: yogyayoḥ parasparocitayoḥ vastunorānurūpyeṇaucityena yā ślāghā sā samanāmālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7798: iti samaguṇayogaprītayastatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇāmekavākyaṃ vibavruḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7803: rasaguṇayoryogena prītiryeṣāṃ tādṛśāḥ paurā ityekavākyamekasya janasya prāthamikaṃ vākyaṃ vivavruḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7809: kaumudī tu śaśino na pṛthak siddhā,
GK16visa10cu:7820: duḥ khīyati sukhahetoḥ ko mūḍhaḥ sevakādanyaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7827: yadyapi prāṇavimoko na jīvitasya hetustathāpi prāṇavimokakriyāparamatra vimuñcatipadam /
GK16visa10cu:7831: (lo, ṛ) iṣṭaphalasya prakṛtodāharaṇādau unnatyādeḥ prāptyarthaṃ tadviruddhasya praṇāmādeḥ karaṇaṃ vicitrālaṅkārabījaphalam /
GK16visa10cu:7836: yat punaḥ kaiściduktaṃ vastutaḥ tanutve 'pi yadekasyādhikyaṃ tadadhikamucyate iti tanna /
GK16visa10cu:7837: “dyauratra kvacidāśritā pravitataṃ pātālamatra kvacit kvāpyatraiva dharādharādharajalā dhārāvalirvarttate /
GK16visa10cu:7838: sphītasphītamaho nabhaḥ kiyadidaṃ yasyetthamevaṃvidhair- dūre pūraṇamastu śūnyamiti yannāmāpi nāstaṃ gatam” //
GK16visa10cu:7845: ajñāta eva śete kukṣau nikṣipya bhuvanāni” //
GK16visa10cu:7851: bhuvanāni kukṣau nikṣipya hariryatrājñāta eva śete /
GK16visa10cu:7852: jalanidheḥ kiñcidavacchedenaiva śayanājjalanidhidraṣṭṛbhirajñāta eva śeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7854: atra kukṣinikṣiptabhuvanasyāpi harestu kiñcidavacchedenaiva śayanādāśrayasya jalanidherādhikyaṃ varṇitam /
GK16visa10cu:7863: yugāntakāle pratisaṃhṛtāḥ svakukṣau praveśitā ātmānaḥ prāṇino yena tādṛśasya kaiṭabhadviṣo
GK16visa10cu:7864: viṣṇoryasyāṃ tanau jaganti savikāśamayantraṇamāsata tatra tasyāṃ tanau tapodhanasya
GK16visa10cu:7865: nāradasyābhyāgamasambhavā bhudo na mamuḥ na sthātumavakāśaṃ lebhire ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7870: “tvayā sā śobhate tanvī tayā tvamapi śobhase /
GK16visa10cu:7890: kiñcitprakurvataḥ kartturdaivāditarasyāśakyasya kāryasya karaṇaṃ vā yadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7894: ramayanti jaganti giraḥ kathamiva kavayo na te vandyāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7898: divamupayātānāmapi yeṣāṃ kavīnāmanalpaguṇagaṇā giraḥ jaganti ramayanti te kavayaḥ kathamiha na vandyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7899: atra karttṛtāsambandhenādhāraṇāṃ kavīnāmasattve 'pi tadādheyānāṃ girāṃ sthitiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7909: “gṛhiṇī sacivaḥ sakhī mithaḥ priyaśiṣyā lalite kalāvidhau /
GK16visa10cu:7910: karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā haratā tvāṃ vada kiṃ na me hṛtam” //
GK16visa10cu:7915: tvāṃ haratā karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā mama kiṃ na hṛtaṃ vada /
GK16visa10cu:7920: vyāghātaḥ sa tu kenāpi vastu yena yathākṛtam // VisSd_10.74 //
GK16visa10cu:7926: kenāpi kartrā yad vastu yenopāyena yathākṛtaṃ tenaivopāyenānyaścettadanyathā kurute tadā tadanyathākaraṇaṃ sa vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7930: dṛśā harasyā yāḥ kaṭākṣarūpayā dṛśā jīvayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7935: jetrīṇāmakṣiṣu manojñatvarūpaṃ vāmatvamityeva tatrāpi jaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7936: atra yena dṛgupāyena dāhastenaiva dṛgupāyena jīvanarūpaṃ dāhānyathākaraṇaṃ strībhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7938: saukaryeṇa ca kāryasya viruddhaṃ kriyate yadi // VisSd_10.75 //
GK16visa10cu:7944: anyoktakāryasya viruddhaṃ kāryamanyena yadi taduktakāraṇasya saukaryeṇa viśiṣṭaṃ kriyate pratipādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7947: “ihaiva tvaṃ tiṣṭha drutamahamahobhiḥ katipayaiḥ samāgantā kānte /
GK16visa10cu:7950: bhavatā gantumadhikaṃ na mṛdvī soḍhā yadvirahakṛtamāyāsamasamam” //
GK16visa10cu:7952: nāyikayā ca pratyuta sahagamane tato 'pi saukaryeṇa hetutayopanyastam /
GK16visa10cu:7956: videśaṃ jigamiṣuṇā patyā saha jigamiṣuṃ patnīṃ prati nāyakasyoktiḥ pūrvārddham /
GK16visa10cu:7957: tvamihaiva tiṣṭha na mayā saha gaccha /
GK16visa10cu:7963: bhavatā saha gantuṃ sahagamane eva mama mṛdutvaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7964: yad yasmān mṛdvī asamaṃ virahāyāsaṃ na soḍhā na sahiṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:7974: (lo, ḷ) iha tu kiñcinniṣpādayituṃ sambhāvyamānasya kāraṇasya tadviruddhaniṣpādakatvena samarthanam /
GK16visa10cu:7975: ihaiva tvamityudāharaṇe nahi mṛdutvasya nāyakasahagamanasya kāryatvaṃ pratīyate kintu sahagamanasya nirvāhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7979: evaṃ virodhamūlālaṅkārān nirṇoya śṛṅvalābandhena vicitratā alaṅkārā lakṣyante /
GK16visa10cu:7981: paraṃ paraṃ prati yadā pūrvapūrvasya hetutā /
GK16visa10cu:8006: pūrvatra pūrvatra yadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasya tasya viśeṣaṇatayā yadi paraṃ paraṃ sthāpyate,
GK16visa10cu:8008: tena pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ yadyuttarottarasya uttarottarābhāvasya vā viśeṣyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8010: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ prati viśeṣaṇatvena paraṃ param // VisSd_10.77 //
GK16visa10cu:8020: “na tajjalaṃ yanna sucārupaṅkajaṃ na paṅkajaṃ tadyadalīnaṣaṭpadam //
GK16visa10cu:8021: na ṣaṭpado 'sau na juguñja yaḥ kalaṃ na guñjitaṃ tanna jahāra yanmanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8025: atra sarojarāje yāni vikasitāmbhojādīni tadekadeśānāmambhojādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇāni paraṃparaṇi /
GK16visa10cu:8034: na tajjalamityādau jalasya sucārupaṅkajaṃ niṣedhatvena nibaddham /
GK16visa10cu:8037: kvacidviśeṣyamapi yathottaraṃ viśeṣaṇatayā sthāpitamapohitaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GK16visa10cu:8044: (vi, ha) anayoḥ pūrvapūrvoktaviśeṣaṇānāṃ paratra paratra viśeṣaṇe viśeṣyatāpohaśca darśita ityāha---kvacid viśeṣyamapīti /
GK16visa10cu:8050: atra vimalatvādau viśeṣyabhūtā vāpyādayaḥ sphuṭatkamalādau bhedena viśeṣaṇāni /
GK16visa10cu:8052: yathā---“na tā vāpyaḥ sphuṭanti yāsu padmāni samprati /
GK16visa10cu:8061: “rājye sāraṃ vasudhā vasudhāyāmapi puraṃ pure saudham /
GK16visa10cu:8068: tat kiṃ tribhuvanasārā bālā'rādhitā bhavatetyatra tu jahalliṅgatā /
GK16visa10cu:8070: nanvatra rājye ityādau yadyadhikaraṇasaptamī tadā rājādyapekṣayā sāratvāpratītyā niṣprayojakasāratvānupapattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8072: puruṣeṣu kṣatriyaḥ śūra ityādiṣu sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvasattve eva nirdhāraṇāt /
GK16visa10cu:8073: ucyate---rājye rājatvaviṣaye yad yad vastu teṣu vasudhā sāram /
GK16visa10cu:8074: vasudhāyāṃ yad yad vastu teṣu puraṃ sāramityādirītyā yad yad vastu teṣivatyadhyāhāreṇa nirdhāraṇāt teṣu ityatra nirdhāraṇasaptamī /
GK16visa10cu:8082: prathamoddiṣṭānāṃ yaḥ prathamadvitīyādikramastena krameṇa tadanvitānāmanu paścād uddeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8090: “unmīlanti nakhairlunīhi vahati kṣaumāñcalenāvṛṇu krīḍākānanamāviśanti valayakvāṇaiḥ samutnāsaya /
GK16visa10cu:8096: nāyake nāyikāvirahakālīnān tatsakhīnāṃ sāṅketikavyavahārān kathayantyāḥ kasyāściduktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:8097: he subhaga / tvadīyavirahe tasyāḥ sakhīnāṃ tattatkriyayā vañjulāditraye saṅketitā mithaḥ itthaṃ vāyavahārā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8101: iyamekasyāḥ sakhyāḥ prathamoktavañjulapuṣpakartṛke unmīlane saṅketitā prāthamikī uktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8103: vahatīti dvitīyoktadakṣiṇānilakartṛke vahane saṅketitā iyaṃ sakhyā dvitīyoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8109: bhavati kriyate vā cettadā paryāya iṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:8113: kvacit śloke ekamanekasmin kramāt bhavet kāraṇakramāt kriyate vā cet tathā anekamekagamekagami vā kramāt bhavati kriyate vā cet tadā paryāya iṣyate ityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8117: valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire krameṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindhavaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8124: pakṣmaṇāṃ nibiḍatvena tatra kṣaṇaṃ sthitāḥ tataste tāḍitādhāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8128: tayoḥ kaṭhinatvena tatra nipātena tataḥ cūrṇitāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8129: tatra valīṣu skhalitāḥ tāsāmuccanīcatvānnābhergabhīratvena tato nānyatra gamanam /
GK16visa10cu:8132: (lo, ā) sthitāḥ kṣaṇamityādāveke prathamodabindavo 'vo 'nekeṣu pakṣmādiṣu krameṇābhavan /
GK16visa10cu:8153: yato visṛṣṭarāgād adhare rāgadānārthameva prāgadhare karadānād kandukakrīḍābhāvācca tato nivartanam /
GK16visa10cu:8155: stane 'ṅgarāgopīdānīṃ ca na dīyate ityetatsūcanārthaṃ vā /
GK16visa10cu:8181: (vi, jha) eṣvādhārā'dheyānāṃ saṃhatatvāsaṃhatatve sambhavatastad bhedābhedo na vivakṣitaḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa taddarśayati---eṣviti /
GK16visa10cu:8186: yeṣāmanekatvaghaṭitoyamalaṅkārasteṣāmeva saṃhatatvāsaṃhatatvāyorviśeṣakatvād bindūnāṃ tvanekāśrayeṣu ekasyaiva ghaṭitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8187: ādhārāṇāṃ saṃhatatvaṃ yathā “svayaṃvare sāmiliteṣu rājasu krameṇa cakṣurnidadhe patiṃvarā” iti /
GK16visa10cu:8193: vṛkādayāḥ saṃhatarūpā iti bahuvacanena milanabodhanāt kramastu vilāsinīcaraṇāpekṣayā /
GK16visa10cu:8201: (vi, ña) nanu kvacidekamanekasminnityuktarūpasya paryāyasyaikaṃ cānekagocaramityuktarūpād viśeṣālaṅkārāt ko viśeṣa ityata āha--atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8213: nyūnādhikavinimayaśca nyūnaṃ dattvādhikagrahaṇamadhikaṃ dattvā nyūnagrahaṇamiti dvidhā /
GK16visa10cu:8217: mayā tu hṛdayaṃ dattvā gṛhīto madanajvaraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8220: (vi, ṭha) tatra samābhyāmadhikaṃ dattvā nyūnagrahaṇācca vinimaye ekamudāharaṇamāha---dattvā kaṭākṣamiti /
GK16visa10cu:8225: “tasya ca pravayaso jaṭāyuṣaḥ svargiṇaḥ kimiva śocyate 'dhunā /
GK16visa10cu:8234: yena jarjarasya jarājīrṇasya kalevarasya śarīrasya vyayād indukiraṇojjvalaṃ candrakiraṇavat śubhraṃ yaśaḥ krītam /
GK16visa10cu:8235: atra jarjarasya śarīrasya dānena ujjvalasya yaśāsaḥ krayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8245: praśravaśāt tadabhāvādvā kathitaṃ yad yad praṣṭavyasya viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyabhūtaṃ
GK16visa10cu:8246: vastu pareṇa kathitāt tasmād hetoḥ kathitasadṛśasyānyasya praṣṭavyaviśeṣaṇānvayavyavacchedaḥ
GK16visa10cu:8247: śābda ārtho vā pratīyate cettadā savyavacchedaḥ parisaṃkhyālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8250: “kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ sudṛḍhamatra yaśo na ratnaṃ kiṃ kāryamāryacaritaṃ sukṛtaṃ na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8251: kiṃ cakṣurapratihataṃ dhiṣaṇā na netraṃ jānāti kastvadaparaḥ sadasadvivekam” //
GK16visa10cu:8256: atra loke kiṃ sudṛḍhaṃ bhūṣaṇamiti praśraḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8263: tadīyacāṇḍālīgamanarūpadoṣasya tadā caraṇīyatvena sukṛtasadṛśasya vyavacchedo na doṣa iti śābdaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8266: jānātīti tvadapara iti pāṭhe pratyuttaraparituṣṭasya praṣṭuruttarakartṛjanapraśaṃsāvākyamidam /
GK16visa10cu:8274: ko dhyeyo bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kiṃ kāmyaṃ paramaṃ padam” //
GK16visa10cu:8280: yadyapi ārādhyatvamārādhanāviṣayatvamārādhanā ca devatāprītihetuḥ kriyā tathāpi ārādhyatvamatra puruṣapravṛttiviṣayatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8281: tena ārādhyamupārjanīyaṃ puṇyamiti uttarasya nānyaditi vyavacchedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8286: “bhaktirbhave na vibhave vyasanaṃ śāstre na yuvatikāmāstre /
GK16visa10cu:8287: cintā yaśasi na vapuṣi prāyaḥ paridṛśyate mahatām” //
GK16visa10cu:8290: (vi, tha) apraśnapūrvakatve vyavacchedasya śābdatve āha---bhaktirbhava iti yuvatirūpe kāmāstre /
GK16visa10cu:8291: bhaktirityādau sarvatra prāyo mahatāṃ paridṛśyata ityāsyānvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8294: vasu tasya na kevalaṃ vibhorguṇavattāpi paraprayojanam” //
GK16visa10cu:8296: “yasmiṃśca rājani “jitajagati pālayati mahīṃ citrakarmasu varṇasaṅkaraścāpeṣu guṇacchedaḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:8303: ato na kevalaṃ tasya rājño vasu dhanameva paraprayojanam,
GK16visa10cu:8308: anayorvarṇaguṇapadaśleṣaḥ na brāhmaṇaādiṣu na prajāsu iti vyapohapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8321: asakṛdityanena praśrapūrvasyāsambhavottarasya sakṛd nirdeśe na cārutvam /
GK16visa10cu:8324: “vībhituṃ na kṣamā śvaśrūḥ svāmī dūrataraṃ gataḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8330: vācyārthe śvaśrvāḥ vīkṣaṇāsāmarthyapradarśanaṃ tava randhanabhojanasthale 'pi gamanāsambhāvanāpradarśanārtham /
GK16visa10cu:8334: “kā visamā devyagaī kiṃ laddhavvaṃ jaṇo guṇaggāhī /
GK16visa10cu:8335: kiṃ sokkhaṃ sukalattaṃ kiṃ duggojjhaṃ khalo loo” //
GK16visa10cu:8339: “kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ labdhavyaṃ jano guṇagrāhī /
GK16visa10cu:8347: “kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ labdhavyaṃ jano guṇagrāhī /
GK16visa10cu:8348: ki saukhyaṃ sukalatraṃ kiṃ durgrahyaṃ khalo lokaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8358: idaṃ ca jñāpakahetīḥ kāvyaliṅgatvābhāvatvakathanaṃ prāgevārthāntaranyāsavicāre smartavyam /
GK16visa10cu:8359: paraṃ praśnajñāpakatve uttarālaṅkāreṇa bādhanānna tatra kāvyaliṅgatvāvakāśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8374: “mūṣikeṇa daṇḍo bhakṣita” ityanena tatsahacaritamapūpabhakṣaṇamarthādāyātaṃ bhavatīti niyatasamānanyāyādarthāntaramāpatatītyeṣa nyāyo daṇḍāpūpikā
GK16visa10cu:8381: tathā tat sahacaritapiṣṭakabhakṣaṇamāvaśyakamato mūṣikeṇa daṇḍo bhakṣita ityanenārthāt kenāpyukteneti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8383: iti yat niyataṃ tasya samānanyāyādarthāntaramuktabhinnortha āpatati pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8388: yena kena vidhinā ca vastvantarasyāgamor'thādāpatanaṃ siddhiriti yāvat /
GK16visa10cu:8391: tathāhi yena khalu mūṣikeṇāpūpasahacarito daṇḍo bhakṣitastena kathamapūpaḥ parityakta iti tathehāpi boddhavyam /
GK16visa10cu:8411: evaṃ muktānāṃ nārīṇāṃ stanamaṇaaḍalaluṭhanena pūrvanyāyāt smarakiṅkarāṇāmapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8414: atitaptamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṇām” //
GK16visa10cu:8423: atra ca samānanyāyasya śleṣamūlatve vaicitryaviśeṣo yathodāhṛte-“hāro 'yam-” ityādau na cedamanumānam,
GK16visa10cu:8428: hāroyamityādau muktāpadaṃ smarasyākiṅgaramuktarūper'the mauktike ca śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:8429: luṭhatīti padaṃ ca sāvajñasthitirūpe āliṅgane cārthe śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:8430: vilalāpetyādau ca taptapadamagnisaṃyoge virahaduḥ khe ca śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:8434: hāroyamityatra stanasaṅgihāraluṭhanena stanasaṅgikāmukaluṭhanasya vilalāpetyādau cābhitāpena mārdavasyānumeyatvaprasakteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8439: tathā nyāyasya puraḥ sphūrtikatvāt sādhyahetubhāvena nirdeśābhāvācca nānumānamityābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8443: tasya hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte pīnatvabhojanādikayoravinābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8451: ata eva asyāḥ sargavidhau ityatra candramadanayoḥ prajāpatitvavikalpe 'pyalaṅkārāntarāghaṭitatvānna vikalpālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8454: “namayantu śirāṃsi dhanūṃṣi vā karṇapūrīkriyantāmājñā maurvyo vā” /
GK16visa10cu:8455: atra śirasāṃ dhanuṣāṃ ca namanayoḥ sandhivigrahopalakṣaṇatvāt sandhivigrahayoścaikadā kartumaśakyatvādvirodhaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8457: tulyabalatvaṃ cātra dhanuḥ śironamanayordūyorapi spardhayā sambhāvyamānatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8464: praṇipātārthaṃ te rājānaḥ śirāṃsi vā namayantu yuddhārthaṃ dhanurvā namayantu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8465: tathā ca bhamājñā cākarṇapūrīkriyatāṃ karṇaṃ pūrayitvā śrūyatāṃ yuddhārthaṃ maurvo vākarṇaparyantaṃ nīyatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8494: atra virodhaprasaktiranavadhānamūlikaiveti manyāmahe---ekadaiva devabrāhmaṇebhyo vittadānasambhavena virodhābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8495: davāyovetyādiniyamagarbhatvena ekavyaktikavittābhiprāyeṇa vā virodho darśita iti vā /
GK16visa10cu:8500: guṇau kriye vā yugapatsyātāṃ yadvā guṇakriye /
GK16visa10cu:8506: guṇadvayaṃ vā kriyādvayaṃ vā guṇakriyādvayaṃ vā yadi yugapad varṇitaṃ syādityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8515: hanta jananaṃ te candanakṣmābhṛto dākṣiṇyaṃ jagaduttaraṃ paricayo godāvarīvāribhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8516: pratyaṅgaṃ dahasīti me tvamapi ceduddāmadāvāgniva- nmattoyaṃ malinātmako vanacaraḥ kiṃ vakṣyate kokilaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8519: (vi, sa) haṃho dhīreti . mandasyaiva dhairyavattvenākāryanivṛttirūpeṇa sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8526: īdṛśastvamiti virahe me mama pratyaṅgaṃ dāvāgnivad dahasi cet tadā matta unmatto malinātmakaḥ kuṣṇavarṇa eva kuṭilasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8527: vanacaratvena ca lokavyavahārānabhijñaḥ kokilaḥ kiṃ vakṣyate ?
GK16visa10cu:8536: atra dāhe ekasmiṃścandanakṣmābhṛjjanmarūpe kāraṇe satyapi dākṣiṇyādīnāṃ hetvantarāṇāmupādānam /
GK16visa10cu:8550: “śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8551: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me” //
GK16visa10cu:8555: ete sapta dhūsaratvaviśiṣṭaśayyādayaḥ sapta manasi śalyānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8559: evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā anucitam /
GK16visa10cu:8568: tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyasyāsattvam /
GK16visa10cu:8573: sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8574: galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā,
GK16visa10cu:8575: vidheyasya khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyatvāda śobhanatvamiti vidheyānāmeva sadasattvam
GK16visa10cu:8577: iha kecidāhuḥ--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti sadasadyogaḥ”
GK16visa10cu:8578: iti anye tu--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /
GK16visa10cu:8579: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam /
GK16visa10cu:8581: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
GK16visa10cu:8583: samādhyalaṅkāre tvekakāryaṃ prati sādhake samagre 'pyanyasya kākatālīyanyāyenāpatanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8586: (vi, kha) pūrvoktaślokepi vidheyānāmeva tathātvād bhinnābhiprāya granthakṛnmanasi kṛtvāparoktaṃ sadasadyogaṃ darśayati---iha keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:8591: uddeśye sattvāsattvābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ matena camatkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8597: khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatvasya vidheyatā gatatvasya vidheyatāpakṣa eva nṛpāṅgaṇagatade khalatvasya vidhayatā pakṣetūddeśyaḥ śobhana eveti naiṣa doṣa iti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8598: ekakāraṇādeva sukare kārye daivāt kāraṇāntarā'gamanarūpāt samādhyalaṅkārādasya bhedamāha---iha ca khaleti /
GK16visa10cu:8600: kāryaṃ prati ekasyaiva samagre sādhakatve 'samagrakāraṇavṛttirna sādhakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8603: viśeṣyasya śaśikāminīprabhṛteḥ sūtrasya tṛtīyapādaṃ viśadayati--iha ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8606: “aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
GK16visa10cu:8607: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8612: (vi, ga) guṇayoḥ kriyayośca yogapadyarūpaṃ samuccayamāha---aruṇe ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8614: tau ca yayoruttarabhūtau tayoryaugapadyabodhakau ityata āhaatrādye iti /
GK16visa10cu:8643: ete guṇākriyāyaugapadye ye samuccayaprakārāste kāryakāraṇayoryaḥ paurvāparyyarūpaḥ kālaniyamaḥ tadviparyyayarūpātiśayoktimūlā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8644: darśitodāharaṇeṣu sarvatraiva guṇayoḥ kriyayorvā kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvepi yaugapadyokteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8647: tathā cet taddvayābhāve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8665: ripoḥ pratīkāre pratyapakāre 'śaktena kenāpi yadi tatsambandhino 'nyasya tiraskāraḥ tasyaiva riporevotkarṣatāsādhakaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8672: tenābhiyojyatayā pratinidhibhūtortho ripoḥ sambandhī varṇyate iti pratyanīkaṃ nāmālaṅkaraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:8683: atra madhyena svamadhyajayāt nāyikā siṃhasya ripuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8687: svasambandhaḥ kucakumbhasambandhaḥ sādṛśyasambandhādidaṃ ca kvacidanukūlasya vāñchitācaraṇepi sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:8688: yathā viraha vidhurāpi satataṃ bhavataḥ śvāsānuhāriṇī patati ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:8695: prasiddhasyopamānasya upameyatvakalpanaṃ vā niṣphalatvakathanaṃ veti dvividhaṃ pratīpamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8707: “tadvaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā hā hema sā ceddyutiḥ;
GK16visa10cu:8709: dhikkandarpadhanurbhruvau yadi ca te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe yatsatyaṃ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ sargakramo vedhasaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8714: tad vaktrādisattve śaśikathādīnāṃ mudritatvādikaṃ vaiphalyaṃ paryavasitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8731: atyutkṛṣṭasya vastuno 'tyantamutkarṣamuktvāpi upamānatve 'pi kalpite nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8740: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhuvane 'smin vacanāni durjanānām” //
GK16visa10cu:8750: nanu bho asmin bhuvane durjanānāṃ bhūyo bahūni vacanāni api bhavādṛśāni bhavattulyāni santītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8760: (vi, ḍha) atra bhavadiva dṛśyante yānītyanena halāhalasyopamānatvenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8767: brahmā yathā vedaṃ vadati tathā brāhmaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8794: kopoparaktānyapi kāminīnāṃ mukhāni śaṅkāṃ vidadhurna yūnām” //
GK16visa10cu:8798: śoṇa upalo maṇiḥ khacito yatra tādṛśakuṇḍalasya mayūkhaiḥ sadaivāruṇīkṛtāni yasyāṃ puri kāminīnāṃ kopoparaktānyapi mukhāni yūnāṃ kopaśaṅkāṃ na vidadhurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8828: balabhadravadanacchadmano vadanavyājasya padmasya paryantapātino mudhuliho bhramarān udaṃśūnām udratāṃśūnāṃ daśānānāṃ dantānāmaṃśubhiḥ śvaityaṃ nayan jagādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8832: iha tu vastvantaraguṇenākrāntatā pratīyata iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8849: guṇagaura / niṣaṇṇo 'pi kathaṃ nāma na rajyasi” //
GK16visa10cu:8853: ananuraktaṃ nāyakaṃ prati anuraktāyā nāyikāyā utkiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:8856: guṇo gauro yasyeti samāsena ca sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8863: rājahaṃsa / tava saiva śubhratā cīyate na ca na cāpacīyate” //
GK16visa10cu:8864: pūrvatrātiraktahṛdayasaṃparkāt prāptavadapi guṇagauraśabdavācyasya nāyakasya raktatvaṃ na niṣpinnam,
GK16visa10cu:8865: uttaratrāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi gaṅgāyamunāpekṣayā prakṛtasya haṃsasya gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃparke 'pi na tadrūpatā /
GK16visa10cu:8871: atiriktahṛdayaṃ rāgabhṛtatvenātiriktaguṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ prāptavat prāptaprāyaṃ raktatvaṃ na niṣpannam,
GK16visa10cu:8873: itthamatra prakṛtena nāyakasya prakṛtasya hṛdayasya guṇāgrahaṇaṃ darśayitvā prakṛtato 'prakṛtaguṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvamuttaraśloke darśayati---uttaratreti
GK16visa10cu:8874: yadyapi rājahaṃsopyaprakṛtastathāpi sambodhyatvenā'pekṣikaṃ tasya prakṛtatvaṃ darśayannāha---aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:8875: sati hetau phalābhāvarūpāyā viśeṣokterasya bhedamāha--atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8876: viśeṣoktausāmānyata eva phalābhāvaḥ iha tu guṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvarūpo bhaṅgiviśeṣa iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8877: nanu kāryasya kāraṇavirodhiguṇavaśāt kāryasya kāraṇaguṇāgrahaṇaṃ viṣamālaṅkārepyasti
GK16visa10cu:8878: ced yadyapi darśitodāharaṇadvaye kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvāt tādṛśasyātadruṇasya viṣamālaṅkāratvāviśeṣa
GK16visa10cu:8883: kayāpi sūcyate bhahgyā yatra sūkṣmaṃ taducyate // VisSd_10.91 //
GK16visa10cu:8894: puṃstvaṃ tanvyā vyañjantī vayasyā smitvā pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekha” //
GK16visa10cu:8895: atra kayācitkuṅkumabhedena saṃlakṣitaṃ kasyāścitpuruṣāyitaṃ pāṇau puruṣacihnakhaḍgalekhālikhanena sūcitam /
GK16visa10cu:8899: kācid vayasyā sakhī kasyāścinnāyikāyāḥ kaṇṭhe vaktrasyandibhiḥ svedabindupravāhaiḥ
GK16visa10cu:8900: bhinnaṃ dvidhākṛtaṃ kuṅkumaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ nāyikāyāḥ pustvaṃ ratau puruṣāyitatvaṃ
GK16visa10cu:8901: vyañjayantī smitvā hasitvā tasyāḥ pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8909: atra viṭasya bhrūvikṣepādinā lakṣitaḥ saṅketakālābhiprāyo rajanīkālabhāvinā padmanimīlanena prakāśitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8913: viṭaṃ dhūrtam upanāyakaṃ tadjijñāsārthaṃ saṃketakālamanasaṃ jñātvā vidagdhayā nāyikayā hasatā netrārpitākūtaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:8924: āḥ śaityaṃ tuhinācalasya karayorityūcivān sasmitaṃ śailāntaḥ puramātṛmaṇḍalagaṇairdṛṣṭo 'vatādvaḥ śivaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8930: śailendreṇa pratipādyamānāyā utsṛjyamānāyā girijāyā hastasya upagūḍhane upagūhanena
GK16visa10cu:8931: svarśeṇa ullasaddhiḥ romāñcādibhiḥ romāñcavepathusvedaiḥ visaṃṣṭhulasya vyastasya
GK16visa10cu:8932: akhilavaivāhikavidheḥ vyāsaṅgasya vyāpārasya bhaṅgenākulaḥ san āḥ āścarthaṃ tuhinasambandhino
GK16visa10cu:8933: 'calasya karayoḥ śaityam ityūcivān san śailāntaḥ pureṇa tadratastrībhiḥ gauryyādimātṛmaṇḍalena
GK16visa10cu:8943: prakṛtāpahnavakārī yo viṣayo vastu sthāpyamānamaprakṛtaṃ vastu,
GK16visa10cu:8950: yadi śleṣeṇānyathā vānyathayet sāpyapahnutiḥ“ityuktalakṣaṇāt“kāle vāridharāṇām” ityudāharaṇād dvitīyāpahnavādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8952: gopanīyārthasya mopanakṛtā prathamamabhihitatvācca vyājokteriti likhanena darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8953: iha tu gopanīyārthasya romāñcādeḥ śivena prathamamanabhidhānāt /
GK16visa10cu:8972: “lāṅgūlenābhihatya kṣititalamasakṛddārayannagrapadbhyā- mātmanyevāvalīya drutamatha gaganaṃ protpatan vikrameṇa /
GK16visa10cu:8973: sphūrjaddhuṅkāradhoṣaḥ pratidiśamakhilān drāvayanneṣa jantūna kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamaruṇocchūnacakṣūstarakṣuḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8977: aruṇe ucchūne sphārite cakṣuṣī yasyā tādṛśaḥ eṣa tarakṣuḥ vyāghraḥ pratibalaṃ pratipakṣasamūhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8978: kīdṛśaḥ kṣititalamasakṛd lāṅgūlenābhihatya agrapadbhyāṃ dāhayan vilikhan /
GK16visa10cu:8979: athānantaraṃ ātmanyevāvalīya kuñcitāṅgo bhūtvā drutaṃ gaganaṃ vikrameṇa ca protpatan
GK16visa10cu:8980: tathā sphūrjatā visphuratā phūtkāreṇa ghoraḥ tathāsvilān jantūn pratidiśaṃ drāvayan
GK16visa10cu:8990: bhūtasya bhaviṣyato vā adbhutasya padārthasya yat pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyamānatvaṃ varṇitaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8998: ekacaluke pīyamānasamudrarūpe gaṇḍuṣe matsyakacchapāvīśvārāvatārau bhūtabhāvinau yogabalena dṛṣṭau /
GK16visa10cu:9008: bhūṣaṇena bhaviṣyantyāḥ śobhāyā tadvināpi darśanād bhāvibhūṣaṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:9014: (vi, ga) nanu bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyogyayorapi pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ śīghrapratītiviṣayatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9015: tathācedṛśārthasya viṣayatvena śabdabodhitopi sortho viśada eva /
GK16visa10cu:9016: tathā cārthavaimalyaṃ prasādo yaḥ paroktaḥ prasādaguṇaḥ sa evāyaṃ tadbhinnavaicitryaviśeṣābhāvād bhāvikanāmālaṅkāro nāstītyāśaṅkate---na cāyamiti
GK16visa10cu:9043: bhūte bhāvini rūpe bhūtabhāvitvena jñāpanāt bhrāntimattvamāśaṅkate--na ca bhrāntīti /
GK16visa10cu:9045: prakṛtasyānyatādātmyabhrama eva bhrāntimānna cātrābhūtabhāvipadārthāḥ prakṛtāstatra bhūtabhāvitāvibhramaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9052: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9057: laukikaṃ vastu ḍimbhavyāghrādi tadgatasya sūkṣmadharmātmakasvabhāvasya kavibhinnajanāvedyatanmātravṛttidharmarūpasya tatra yathā varṇitaṃ tasya svarūpamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9062: ityatra ḍimbhamātrakriyāderbhāvibhūtasya ko 'laṅkāraḥ syāditi manasikṛtya samādhatte--yadi punariti /
GK16visa10cu:9069: (vi, cha) yatra bhūtabhāvivastunorna pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ kintu tadvastuna eva pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ varṇita tatra nāyamalaṅkāra ityudāhṛtya darśayati---anātapatro 'pīti /
GK16visa10cu:9070: ātapatrarahitopyayaṃ rājā sarvadikṣu sitātapatraiḥ sarvato veṣṭita iva lakṣyate,
GK16visa10cu:9071: vilāsahetukavyajanena vījyamāna iva lakṣyate iti pūrvato 'nuṣaṅgaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:9076: yatpunarapratyakṣāyamāṇasyāpi varṇane pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ tatrāyamalaṅkāro bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:9090: tathā cātra virodhālaṅkāra eva iti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:9093: yadvāpi prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhavet // VisSd_10.94 //
GK16visa10cu:9098: mahatāṃ caritaṃ vā prastutasyāṅgaṃ prakarṣakaṃ yadā bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9106: yasyā puri adhaḥ kṛtamambhodharāṇāṃ meghānāṃ maṇḍalaṃ yaistādṛsmānāṃ candrajyotsnānipātāt
GK16visa10cu:9107: kṣaratāṃ śaśāṅkopalakuṭṭimānāṃ candrakāntamaṇiyamagṛhāṇāṃ payobhiḥ kelīvanaṃ vṛddhimurarīkaroti prāprotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9111: kuṭṭimairadhaḥ karaṇameva puryā adhaḥ karaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:9120: yugānte ucitā yoganidrā yasya sāḥ puruṣo viṣṇurlokān saṃhṛtya amuṃ samudram adhiśete /
GK16visa10cu:9124: lokasaṃhārāt sūryābhāve 'pi nayanaraviṇa padmavikāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9125: atra varṇanīyo 'mbhodhiḥ prakṛstasya prakarṣakamīdṛśaṃ brahma stūyamānedṛśaviṣṇuśayanarūpaṃ taccaritam /
GK16visa10cu:9149: (vi, ḍa) priyaśabdātprakarṣārthe iyasunpratyayena sādhitasya preyaḥ śabdārthamāha /
GK16visa10cu:9152: nāyikāyā ratyuttarāvasthaāṃ smṛtvā cintayato virahiṇa uktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:9153: tāṃ ratyuttarāvasthāṃ priyāṃ saṃsmṛtya tiṣṭhato mamāntarmānasamaniśameva na śāntimeti /
GK16visa10cu:9154: kaudṛśāvasthāṃ ratipraśamādāmīliti alasād vivartitā ca tārakā yatra tat tādṛśamakṣi yasyāḥ tādṛśīm /
GK16visa10cu:9155: matkaṇṭhabandhane daraślathā cālpaśithilā bāhuvallī yasyāḥ tādṛśī,
GK16visa10cu:9181: tena balātkāraṃ vinā paroḍhāpravṛttau tadabhāvipi saṃjñāśabdasyāsya prāyikī vyutpattirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:9190: (vi, ta) vane tvadvairivanitādavṛnde pulindā nijastriyaḥ parihatya ratiṃ kurvate /
GK16visa10cu:9194: vairistrīviḍambanena rājñaḥ prakarṣāt tata eva tadviṣayabhāvaprakarṣāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9195: evaṃ bhāvābhāsepīti yathā--- “kiṃ brūmaste mahārāja māhātmyamanyadurlabham /
GK16visa10cu:9202: dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt” //
GK16visa10cu:9208: tavekṣaṇe tavadarśane sati kṣaṇāt sa madaḥ kvāpi gato na dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9214: yadyapi tatpraśamopagatapadasya lakṣyārthena madasya cātyantābhāvena tatpraśamasya
GK16visa10cu:9216: vastutastu aparāṅgabhūtavyaṅgyasyaiva rasavadalaṅkāratvaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛdādisakalālaṅkārikasammataṃ na guṇībhūtalakṣyārthasya /
GK16visa10cu:9217: tadā atraiva śloke kaveratirūpo bhāvastasyaiva tanmadanāśānnāśo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9220: bhāvasya codaye saṃdhau miśratve ta tadākhyakāḥ // VisSd_10.96 //
GK16visa10cu:9223: (vi, dha) bhāvodayādayastu guṇībhūtāḥ svakhanāmāna evālaṅkārā ityāha---bhāvasya codaye iti /
GK16visa10cu:9229: śrutvā kuto 'pi tvannama lebhire viṣamāṃ daśām” //
GK16visa10cu:9235: prathamajñātasya kṣāsasya ślokamadhye udayapratītya udayaḥ sarājaviṣayabhāvaprakarṣakamaṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:9238: salajjā cāntike sakhyāḥ pātu naḥ pārvatī sadā” //
GK16visa10cu:9245: “asauḍhā tatkālollasadasahabhāvasya tapasaḥ kathānāṃ viśrambheṣvatha ca rasikaḥ śailaduhituḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9246: pramodaṃ vā diśyātkapaṭavaṭuveśāpanayena tvarāśauthilyābhāyāṃ yugapadabhiyuktaḥ smaraharaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:9250: kā tvārahaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ kvāsi yāsi /
GK16visa10cu:9258: araṇyaparivṛtterbhavadvidviṣaḥ bhakṣaṇārthaṃ phalakiśalayāni ādadānā kañcidarthādākṛṣṭakāmā itthamabhidhatte /
GK16visa10cu:9268: anyeṣu tu pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pratyuttarottarasya bādhakatvena balavattayā śabalatā /
GK16visa10cu:9272: rasādayastu vācyavācakābhyāmupakāryā eveti na teṣāmaṅkāratā bhavituṃ yuktā” iti /
GK16visa10cu:9283: aparāṅgānāṃ rasādīnāmalaṅkāratvaṃ svīkurvatāmanyeṣāṃ tu matamāha---anye tviti /
GK16visa10cu:9290: apare ca--“rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkāratvaṃ mukhyato rūpakādau tu vācyādyupadhānam,
GK16visa10cu:9294: (vi, bha) aparāṅgarasādāvapi alaṅkārapadaṃ śaktameva na bhāktamiti vadatāṃ matamāha--apare ceti /
GK16visa10cu:9306: etanmate tu upamāderivāṅgabhūtarasoderapi śabdārthomayopakārakadvāraiva rasopakārakatayālaṅkārapadavācyateti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9310: aṅgabhūtarasādīnāṃ śabdārthabhyāmupakāro vyañjanāvaśādeva taiḥ śabdārthayorupakārastadvyaṅgyatvavaiśiṣṭyeneti parasparamupakāro darśitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9318: (vi, ya) samāsoktau tu yo nāyakanāyikāvyavahāro vyaṅgyastasya rasādyupakāranirapekṣamevālaṅkāratvāmityāha---samāsoktāviti /
GK16visa10cu:9328: yatra kāvye pradhāne aṅgini anyatra rasādirūpe rasādayo 'ṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9330: smin kāvye rasādiralaṅkāro 'laṅkārapadavācya iti me matirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9332: yadi ca rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkṛtitvaṃ tadā vācakadiṣvapi tathā prasajyeta /
GK16visa10cu:9334: aṅgatve tu dvitīyodāttālaṅkāraḥ” iti tadapi parāstam /
GK16visa10cu:9343: kecittu aṅgirasasyaiva rasavadalaṅkārāditvamaṅgabhūtarasādestu “yad vyaṅgayaṃ prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhave';
GK16visa10cu:9346: “āmīlitālasavivartitatārakākṣī” ityatra yaḥ smaraṇākhyabhāvo vipralambhāṅgatvenoktastasya kasyāpi mahataścaritatvābhāvenodāttālaṅkāratvasya tatrāvyāpteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9352: (vi, va) idānīmanekālaṅkāraṇāmekapadasthitirūpamiśraṇe kvacit saṃsṛṣṭināmā kvacicca saṅkaranāmā pṛthagalaṅkāro bhavatītyāha--yadyeta eveti /
GK16visa10cu:9358: yathā laukikālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśraṇe pṛthakcārutvena pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ tathoktarūpāṇāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśratve saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkārākhyau pṛthagalaṅkārau /
GK16visa10cu:9389: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
GK16visa10cu:9392: (vi, ṣa) saṅkaraśca trividho bhavatītyāha---aṅgāṅgitve iti alaḍkṛtīnāmaṅgāṅgitve evavidhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9401: yadyapyaṅgāṅgibhāvo janyajanakabhāvaḥ prakṛṣyaprakarṣakabhāvo jñāpyajñāpakabhāvaśceti trividhastathāpi jñāpyajñāpakabhāvarūpamevodāharati /
GK16visa10cu:9408: yasya mandaraparvatasya gadamūle 'dhobhāgarūpamūle eva śleṣaṇa caraṇasya mūle prānte mandākinī aceṣṭata sevārūpāṃ ceṣṭāmakarodityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9410: mama patyuramburāśeramanthajanyāyā vyathāyā āśu śīghraṃ vyupaśamāya ityeva tadarthamivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9411: manthato nivṛttasya tenaiva pūrvaṃ janitā manthavyathā āśu naṃkṣyatītyevaṃrūpā prārthanā /
GK16visa10cu:9412: nanu mandākinī manthanātpūrvamapi mandarasya pādamūle vartate /
GK16visa10cu:9414: bhāvaktāntatvād ākarṣaṇavegena vigalan yo rajjubhūtasya bhujagendrasya vāsukerbhogāt
GK16visa10cu:9415: kāyānnirmokaścarmakañcukaṃ tadrūpasya paṭṭasya vastraviśeṣasya pariveṣṭanayā udveṣṭanaprakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9417: kintu mandākinyeva paritaḥ pādamūlaṃ sevarathaṃ veṣṭitavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9420: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:9438: iyaṃ tu prakarṣakamaṅgaṃ sevājñānaṃ vinā manthavyathopaśamanārthatāyāḥ veṣṭanamātrasyāsambhavenātprekṣāyāstathā prakarṣaṇaāt /
GK16visa10cu:9457: puraḥ paścādbhāvena sthitayorekadā milarūpasya samāgamasyaiva dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9465: ttu yathā-- “pulindāste ripustrīṇāṃ vane hāraṃ haranti no /
GK16visa10cu:9466: bimboṣṭhakāntyā śoṇaṃ taṃ guñjamālāṃ hi manyate //
GK16visa10cu:9477: kīdṛśaṃ santataṃ vistṛtaṃ tamaḥ andhākāram ajñānaṃ ca bhindānamamandanayanānandakaraṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:9481: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
GK16visa10cu:9485: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9488: (vi, gha) atrālaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃśayakoṭitāṃ darśayati--atreti . idaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalamarthānnāyikāyāmābhātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9490: mukhasyedaṃ padena nirdeśe tu rūpakamityāha uteti /
GK16visa10cu:9492: tathāṃ ca idaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ mukhaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cābhātītyartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9495: mukhasyaiva prakrāntatve tadupamānatayaiva candranirdeśe tu tasyāprakṛtatvāt prakṛtāprakṛtayorekadharmānvayarūpaṃ dīpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9501: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
GK16visa10cu:9507: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9511: mukhacandraṃ cumbatīti mukhasyānukūlaṃ candratulyamukha eva sākṣādanvitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9517: saca dharmaścandre eva sākṣāstītyato viśeṣyatvena pratīyamāne candre sākṣādanvitatvādrūpakasya sādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9518: upamāyāstu na bādhaka ityata āhamukhe upacaritatveneti /
GK16visa10cu:9522: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
GK16visa10cu:9539: cañcalaṃ locanaṃ yatreti vigraheṇa cañcalalocanavattvasyāmbujatulye vadane eva sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatetyāha--atreti /
GK16visa10cu:9541: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā bādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9546: sundaraṃ vadanāmbujamityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge upamāsamāso na sambhavatītyatra upamāyā bādhaka ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9551: atrahīti vacanāt sundaraṃ vahanāmbujamiti prayoge upamāsamāse sati na sambhavatītyataḥ sundaratvarūpasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge upamāyā bodha ityarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:9553: ityādyārthe vyaṃsakatvādibhāvād yatropamānasya pūrvanirdeśastatraiva mayūravyaṃsakaditvamupamānasya paranirdeśe tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9556: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9567: sā nāyikā kṣaṇamarthānmāmīṣadalpaṃ yadi nirīkṣeta tadā pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ sāndra ānandaḥ sphurati /
GK16visa10cu:9568: tadā tasyā ambujākṣyāḥ parīrambhārambhaḥ ka iva bhavitā,
GK16visa10cu:9573: saromāñcābhyāmata evodañcadbhyāṃ kucakalaśābhyāṃ nirbhinnaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ vasanaṃ yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9579: (vi, ña) atra vākyārūpaikāśrayasattvaṃ dvividhānuprāsayordarśayati---atreti chekātuprāso 'nekasya vyañjanasya svarūpataḥ sāmye sati tacchekānuprāsoktatvāt
GK16visa10cu:9580: saṃyuktānevarṇasya tu ānupūrvyasambhavāttādṛśe 'nekasya kṣakāramātrasya sakṛcchekānuprāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9587: kaṭākṣapātenāpi sāndrandasphuraṇād daṇḍāpūpikayā siddhe stanaparirambhe 'nirvacanīyānanda ityevamarthāpattyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9591: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9602: tyatrāpi lakalo lakalo kalola kalola iti yamakadvayam /
GK16visa10cu:9613: prasāritaṃ gītaṃ yatreti tādṛśaṃ mayūravṛndānāmānartitakaṃ nṛtyayuktaviśeṣaṇakeṣu divaseṣu mahati pūjyaṃ bhavati śobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9616: abhinavapayoda eva rasikā rasavanta eka nṛtyadarśanārthaṃ rasavanto yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:9617: tathā pathikāḥ sāmājikā iva nṛtyādididṛkṣisamājapradhānānīva yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:9618: atra rasikasāmājikānāṃ samājapradhānatulyānāṃ ca tṛtyadarśināmāśrayatvena divasānāṃ nṛtyasattārūpakaṃ vyaṅgyamavadheyam /
GK16visa10cu:9632: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
GK16visa10cu:9639: śrīcandretyādikṛtamamuṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṃ pustakaṃ vilokya akhilaṃ sāhityatattvaṃ sukhameva sukhaviśiṣṭameva yathā syāttathā vitta jānītetyarthaḥ
GK16visa10cu:9644: “āḥ kiṃ kampamurīkaroṣi vasudhe dhūrardite vā bhava- drovindena tu nandamandirakṛtakrīḍāvatāreṇa te /
GK16visa10cu:9645: vikhyātaḥ kavirājirāja iti yaḥ śrīviśvanāthaḥ kṛtī tasyākarṇya giraḥ śirāṃsi bhujagādhīśo dhunīte 'dhunā” //
GK16visa10cu:9649: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
GK16visa10cu:9654: tāvatkavīnāṃ manaḥ sammadayannayaṃ prabandho loke prathitostu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9656: (lo, ṛ) samprati granthasya samāptau svābhīṣṭapūrvakaṃ śubhāśaṃsanaṃ karoti--- yāvaditi /
GK16visa10cu:9657: sammadayan samyak prīṇayan--- āstāmanantakṛtinā kṛta eṣa dhīre- ṇāsādya tātaśaraṇāmburuhaprasādam /
GK16visa10cu:9664: akhilabhāṣaiva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāmukastadanuśīlakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9665: iti maheśvaratarkālaṅkāraviracitāyāṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṭīkāyāṃ daśamaparicchedavivaraṇam suśliṣṭasaṃskṛtavaśena sukhādhirohā vaiṣamyadustarataraṅgavibhedadakṣā
